name: Alan
story:
Alan

A youth born into a family of knights and training hard to become one. Acts out of a belief that killing dragons is the best way to protect the people. In order to do that, he enters the tournament that is also the entry exam for the Knights.

name: Alan, Warrior
story:
Alan the Warrior 

A youth whose victory in the tournament has earned him a place in the knights. Often clashes with other new recruits because of his uncompromising sense of justice, but that same mentality is also attracting attention for his future as a knight.

name: Alan, Royal Knight
story:
Alan the Royal Knight

Alan has become the leader of the knights. His bravery is unwavering, and his newfound skill allows him to survive even greater perils. He never involves his allies, and maintains the “come back in one piece” motto of his forbearers.

name: Cain
story:
Cain

A youth who lost his parents at a young age and has lived alone ever since. Believes power is everything, and has no interest into anything else. Heads to the Capital in order to find the Evil Dragon's Eye.

name: Cain, Brave man
story:
Cain the Brave man

A youth who winds up joining the knights after successfully competing in a tournament he joined while seeking info about the Evil Dragon’s Eye. He is now more interested in Alan, the one who defeated him in the tourney. They are rivals in everything.

name: Cain, Cavalryman
story:
Cain the Cavalryman 

A knight who has awoken to darkness after obtaining the Evil Dragon's Eye. The eye brings certain death to all it looks upon, and gets stronger with each dragon it slays. Cain must always seek more dragons to kill. But when they are all dead...

name: Luka
story:
Luka

A girl from a bloodline of ancient dragons. With a lifespan much greater than the average human, she is already over 100 years old. Her search for the ancient dragon has brought her to the capital. She hopes to end the conflict between dragons and humans.
cutin: I see each puff of wind!

name: Luka, Master Archer
story:
Luka the Master Archer

A girl from a line of dragons who has now joined the knights. The battle between a fire swordsman and dark warrior she happened to see at a tournament matched exactly with a legend of her people, so she joined the knights to see how it will end.

name: Luka, Sniper
story:
Luka the Sniper 

Head of the dragon tribe and now leading 100 of her kind. After the fire swordsman and dark warrior resolved their conflict, she left the knights, collected her scattered tribe, and returned. Now she prepares for the last battle in the Forbidden Library.

name: Maria
story:
Maria

The daughter of the king and already a mistress of magic. She has a great respect for her mother who died protecting the Capital from a dragon. She's also a little bored of her conservative father, so she often watches tournaments for excitement.

name: Maria, Priestess
story:
Maria the Priestess 

A young leader who protects the Capital with her holy power and commands the knights.  Along with a fire swordsman, dark warrior, and water archer, she helped drive off a dragon that attacked the capital during a tournament. She now vows to end the war.

name: Maria, Holy Woman
story:
Maria the Holy Woman

A holy woman who leads the people against the dragons in place of the mysteriously ill king. Has saved the Capital with many miracles, and trusts her allies completely. She actually has the same sickness as her father, but she keeps it a secret.

name: Rabby
story:
Rabby

Growing up with his friends Aaron, Anastasia and Carrol, a lively village boy trained in swordsmanship against adults, he's quite skilled. Dreams of slaying dragons and becoming a hero who will bring peace to the world.

accessory.name: Red Feather
accessory.detail: A token of friendship received from Arlong. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Karl
story:
Karl

A youth born into a household of fishermen. Unable to forgive dragons and monsters for disturbing the seas, he strikes out on a journey to eliminate their evil. Alone against the waves, he finds solace in his late father's stories of a sea princess.

accessory.name: Waterguard Pen
accessory.detail: Given to him by his father. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Aleksy
story:
Aleksy

A youth who came to the Royal Capital, together with his friend Michael, to join the Royal Knights. Having failed the entrance exam, however, he realizes Michael's superiority. This realization drives him to redouble his training efforts.

accessory.name: Musketeer Talisman
accessory.detail: Given by Michael when Aleksy was a child. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Viktor
story:
Viktor

A young watchman who serves with Erving. Drawn to Erving's strength and charisma, he lives to fight by his side. He doesn't take kindly to Erving's interest in Ludmilla, and is planning to drive her from the village.

accessory.name: Lavender Scarf
accessory.detail: A scarf that Victor stole from Irving. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yuri
story:
Yuri

A youth interested in the life cycle of animals. Often explores the mountains behind the village. Originally not interested in dragons, but after learning of a dragon that looks like a wild boar, he becomes obsessed with discovering its origins.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Helm
accessory.detail: A cap designed to look like a Bahamutton. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Rabby Prana
story:
Rabby Prana

A youth seeking to bring peace to the world by driving out the dragons. He has honed his skills after years of fighting. The loss of his dear Anastasia teaches him to care for his allies and keep a cool head, earning him his comrades' trust.

accessory.name: Red Feather+
accessory.detail: With this, the rival became a worthy foe. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Karl Valna
story:
Karl Valna

A youth who respects his fisherman father, and seeks to protect the seas from the dragons. At the same time, he collects word on the legends of the sea princess that his father always spoke of. He hopes one day to share that story with his own children.

accessory.name: Waterguard Pen+
accessory.detail: Every ship's log entry is written with this. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Aleksy Crest
story:
Aleksy Crest

A young knight defending Knight King Artorius in the Capital. Works directly for the King, who trusts him implicitly, and is now a skilled and powerful fighter. His stance of putting his all into his defense has also earned Aleksy support from the people.

accessory.name: Musketeer Talisman+
accessory.detail: Emblem of the rascally Three Musketeers. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Viktor Straff
story:
Viktor Straff

Viktor worked for a long time under Erving, but never managed to truly catch his attention. In fact, he was even ordered to search for Ludmilla, whom he himself drove out of the village, and this has sunk him into a perpetual, explosive rage.

accessory.name: Lavender Scarf+
accessory.detail: The skull electrifies the wearer's soul. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yuri Valrotz
story:
Yuri Valrotz

A youth who is now scared of animals after being chased around in his childhood by a boar-like dragon. However, he still likes animals, and now continues his own investigations - leading him to learn that large numbers of dragons have been disappearing.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Helm+
accessory.detail: Too shoddily made to serve as a disguise. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Aaron
story:
Aaron

An ambitious youth who sees his childhood friend, Rabby, as his rival. He seeks to slay a dragon faster than anyone else. An excellent fighter, he's also a hard worker who is constantly training outside of the sight of others.

accessory.name: Red Bangle
accessory.detail: Carol's gift to Aaron for his promotion. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Leonard
story:
Leonard

A youth seeking excitement in the towns, bored of the unchanging sea. Bold and full of fun, his friends trust him implicitly, and he's well known across the region. Sets out alongside his friend kirill to find fame by killing a dragon.

accessory.name: Seabreeze Headguard
accessory.detail: Headgear passed on from Cyril to Leonid. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rolan
story:
Rolan

Mightiest in the village, a youth whose lance skills are spoken of even in the Capital. One day the Knight King came and sparred with Rolan. Seeing the King's strength and benevolence, Rolan determines to fight for him.

accessory.name: Guard's Spaulder
accessory.detail: A gift from the King for joining the Guard. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Erving
story:
Erving

A youth whose parents died protecting their village from a dragon attack. Following in their footsteps, Erving became the youngest Captain in history. His next goal is to bring Ludmilla under his control.

accessory.name: Captain's Belt
accessory.detail: Given out of the blue by Victor one day. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Igor
story:
Igor

An iron chef who eagerly hunts the wild boar dragon known as "Bahammut". The flesh of this beast is soft, tender and juicy - dripping with fat when roasted, and it is said to be the ultimate meat for the culinary inclined.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Roast
accessory.detail: Grilled Bahamutton, with head attached. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Aaron Prana
story:
Aaron Prana

Started out competing with Rabby, but the difficulties of the journey and loss of valued comrades have now forged them into excellent partners - each guarding the other's back. His lance now stands to protect his allies, rather than make himself look good.

accessory.name: Red Bangle+
accessory.detail: Offers Aaron a great grip on his spear. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Leonard Valna
story:
Leonard Valna

A youth who has made a name for himself by defeating a dragon and protecting his town. However, he still tends to fritter away his money, so he now makes a living as a mercenary. Even when hired by his former partner Kirill, they remain solid friends.

accessory.name: Seabreeze Headguard+
accessory.detail: Heavy, sturdy, and impenetrable. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rolan Crest
story:
Rolan Crest

A youth who leads Knight King Artorius's guards. One of the Three Musketeers, alongside Angelica and Aleksy, he now spends his days fighting dragons with the King. Though mighty power may come to threaten the people, Rolan uses his spear to protect them.

accessory.name: Guard's Spaulder+
accessory.detail: Only one true of will can equip this item. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Erving Straff
story:
Erving Straff

A youth who continues the search for his friends, Ludmilla and Sigmund, after their sudden disappearance. Although years have now passed, he still has no clue of their whereabouts. There are rumors that an ominous executioner pursues them.

accessory.name: Captain's Belt+
accessory.detail: An item that offers no discomfort whatsoever. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Igor Valrotz
story:
Igor Valrotz

An iron chef renowned for his work in Bahammut cookery. His lance & cooking knife skills have already gone beyond mortal limits, pushing toward the realm he so desires to reach - that of Izanagi, the God of Cooking.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Roast+
accessory.detail: The aroma of meat whets the appetite. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Anastasia
story:
Anastasia

A young girl very interested in dragons, and who really wants to just see them for herself rather than slay them. Also loves ruins and dungeons, often slipping off into them before Rabby and her other friends even realize she is gone.

accessory.name: Red Ring
accessory.detail: A toy given by Rabi when they were kids. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Anya
story:
Anya

A young girl who sets out to find her ambitious father who gave up being a noble in order to hunt dragons. The dependable Anya was left to look after her home in place of her crippled mother, but after her mother passed away Anya finally set out.

accessory.name: Foreign Amulet
accessory.detail: A gift given to Anya by a foreign friend. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Eleonora
story:
Eleonora

The daughter of a small village's lord. Raised in a life of luxury, she knows little of the real world. This concerned her parents, so they sent her to a girl's boarding school in the Capital. A genius with a bow, she is quickly adapting to her new life.

accessory.name: Locket of Parting
accessory.detail: Engraved with the name of the man she loves. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ludmilla
story:
Ludmilla

The leader of the village youths. A tough, charismatic and stubborn girl. Treats those beneath her, boy or girl, almost like slaves, and sets out to slay dragons. Only shares her true self with Sigmund, her childhood friend, and she obeys him meekly.

accessory.name: Purple Hair Clip
accessory.detail: A self-made hair clip with no significance. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Eva
story:
Eva

A young cook who helps out the iron chef Igor. Has a remarkable tongue, and though ostensibly an assistant, her role is a vital one. In fact, Eva usually thinks of the recipes and Igor cooks them. This has proven to be a good arrangement so far.

accessory.name: Cold Leekle Soup
accessory.detail: Garnished with chopped leekle. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Anastasia Prana
story:
Anastasia Prana

A young woman who is very interested in dragons and continues her journey to study them. Coming to realize that strength is also required in order to study the beasts, she has trained herself hard. Her recklessness can cause trouble for Rabby.

accessory.name: Red Ring+
accessory.detail: The vermillion glass has chipped a little. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Anya Valna
story:
Anya Valna

Anya has ventured to the islands in the east. There she heard tale of a warrior from a distant family who fought for peace - her father. Upon hearing this, she did not exactly forgive him, but she was filled with a sense of pride.

accessory.name: Foreign Amulet+
accessory.detail: The gem resembles the ore of Anya's village. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Eleonora Crest
story:
Eleonora Crest

Her years at the academy have matured Eleonora into a fine young woman. Her innate cheerfulness remains, however, and she often makes comments to those around her. She has also formed an excellent partnership with Edwards.

accessory.name: Locket of Parting+
accessory.detail: Has not been opened since they separated. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ludmilla Straff
story:
Ludmilla Straff

Still as stubborn as ever, her reckless fighting style has also made her allies a little afraid of her. Those who fight alongside her know how strongly she wishes for peace, however, so they continue to support her.

accessory.name: Purple Hair Clip+
accessory.detail: Given out of the blue by Irving one day. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Eva Valrotz
story:
Eva Valrotz

An elite young cook who has now gone out on her own, parting ways with Igor after starting to dislike all of his talk about the God of Cooking. Believing that a grateful heart is most important in cooking, she goes to the far eastern islands to train.

accessory.name: Cold Leekle Soup+
accessory.detail: A rich sweetness hides beneath the coldness. [5ef5f7]+250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Carrol
story:
Carrol

A youth who became involved in the fighting thanks to his childhood friend, Rabby. Very laidback, he would rather be napping in the village's apple orchard. Skilled with magic and a vital member of the group as the overall mood maker.

accessory.name: Red Spell Book
accessory.detail: A birthday gift from Anastasia. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kirill
story:
Kirill

A youth born into a longstanding magical family. Bored of the many traditions forced upon wizards, he often sneaks out at night to find fun in town. Uninterested in fame, he joins his friend Leonard to slay a dragon for fun.

accessory.name: Wavecrash Gloves
accessory.detail: Given by Leonid after Cyril's first job. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Burckhardt
story:
Burckhardt

A youth born in a small village. Lived happy, peaceful days with his childhood friend Patricia. One day, the faithful of the Holy Kingdom came to the village and took Patricia away. Burckhardt decided to learn magic and set out to save her.
cutin: I can do this! I can!

accessory.name: Incomplete Map
accessory.detail: A map to the Holy Land, half blank. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Sigmund
story:
Sigmund

A youth with amnesia who arrived in the village after a fight with nearby dragons just a few years ago. Knows nothing about himself, aside from his name, and rarely speaks. The only one he talks to is Ludmilla.

accessory.name: Black Dragon Cure
accessory.detail: A painkiller made from black dragon scales. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Effim
story:
Effim

A youth who longs to see the land of Zipang across the distant sea - a country closed off to the outside with unique customs and culture. His father Marty has filled his head with tales of things like "samurai," so now he studies daily in the library.

accessory.name: Dragon Wing Shard
accessory.detail: Inherited by Effim from his father. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Carrol Prana
story:
Carrol Prana

Once a laidback kid who watched Rabby and Aaron clash, their arduous journey has transformed him into someone who now strikes enemies first in order to protect his friends. He fights dragons so he may also live to lay flowers at his fallen friends' graves.

accessory.name: Red Spell Book+
accessory.detail: "Spells" are birthday wishes from friends. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kirill Valna
story:
Kirill Valna

A youth who has used his innate magical abilities to defeat numerous dragons and make a name for himself. He's now busy as the mayor of a harbor town. Still firm friends with his former partner Leonard, they often stand together against dragons.
cutin: Just a bit of bad luck.

accessory.name: Wavecrash Gloves+
accessory.detail: A cheap pair and an uncomfortable fit. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Burckhardt Crest
story:
Burckhardt Crest

His years of travelling for nothing, Burckhardt has yet to reach the Holy Kindgom. As he travels, defeating dragons along the way, the information he gathers reveals that he must meet the infamous witch Ideia in order to reach his destination.

accessory.name: Incomplete Map+
accessory.detail: The blanks are filled through his travels. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Sigmund Straff
story:
Sigmund Straff

A youthful magician who accompanies Ludmilla. Now speaks even less than before, since he lives in the mountains with little human interaction. Some claim to have seen Sigmund howling at the moon and turning into a dragon, but the truth remains unclear.

accessory.name: Black Dragon Cure+
accessory.detail: Use twice a day to greatly reduce pain. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Effim Valrotz
story:
Effim Valrotz

A youth hoping to reach the distant land of Zipang. With so little information to go on, he relies on the stories of a young dragon rider from Peace. He hopes to find a way for humans and dragons to coexist.

accessory.name: Dragon Wing Shard+
accessory.detail: The dragon was friends with Effim's father. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Johan
story:
Johan

A young swordsman who fights in a group of dragon slaying knights. As opposed to the almost demonic fervor of Dominic, who joined at the same time, Johan is calm and collected, almost angelic, and the only one who truly understands Dominic and his methods.

accessory.name: Red Horn Shard
accessory.detail: A horn broken off of the Red Dragon. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Claus
story:
Claus

A taciturn young man who has made it through the harsh youth knight training to become a true knight. Has a wife and child in his distant homeland, and hopes to return home proud of his deeds as a knight.

accessory.name: Homeland Amulet
accessory.detail: Fashioned from the ore of Klaus's homeland. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Michael
story:
Michael

A young knight who arrived in the Capital with Aleksy a few years ago. A genius who easily passed the Royal Knight Exam, one of the hardest tests in the realm. However, he's also unable to understand those not so advantaged, causing constant clashes.

accessory.name: Hallowed Crown
accessory.detail: A great royal treasure that Michael seeks. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Elvin
story:
Elvin

A young swordsman who joined the Imperial Army to save his brother who is infected with the extremely rare and ever-worsening Dragoturn Sickness. The cure is boiled dragon scales, so Elvin requests posting to the front line.

accessory.name: Doom Dragon Cure
accessory.detail: A cure made from the Doom Dragon's claws. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Theodore
story:
Theodore

A youth who has sworn to fight the Republic for the liberation of humanity in the Empty Age. Alongside Clemence and Rudolph, he operates a resistance movement called the "White Hunters." However, their inability to achieve their goal is causing tension.

accessory.name: Emblem of Freedom
accessory.detail: A coat of arms drawn by a young Theodore. [5ef5f7]+8%[-]chance of special move.

name: Johan Marls
story:
Johan Marls

An aged fighter, 82 years old and long since retired from the knights. Hearing that his old partner Dominic has returned to the front lines, he is spurred back into action himself. Still the opposite of Dominic, his warm personality remains.

accessory.name: Red Horn Shard+
accessory.detail: The horn could pierce through any armor. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Claus Strohm
story:
Claus Strohm

The fight with the dragons is getting worse, leading to the potential for even Claus's own distant homeland to be attacked. In order to protect his wife and child Claus heads even further away from them - into the raging conflict of the eastern islands.

accessory.name: Homeland Amulet+
accessory.detail: The stone changes color with time. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Michael Vyce
story:
Michael Vyce

His talents have led to Michael being promoted to Captain. As well as leading the knights, he is also in a position to comment on politics. In fact, his opposition to King Artorius has now divided the country into two factions.

accessory.name: Hallowed Crown+
accessory.detail: Offers eternal glory to those who wear it. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Elvin Schwarz
story:
Elvin Schwarz

One morning, Elvin awoke to find her house empty, her younger brother gone. Years later, she finally uncovered a rumor about him - a youth who had turned into a dragon, travelled with a girl, and who 's name was "Sigmund," the same as her brother.
cutin: I know I can do this!
I know I can do this!

accessory.name: Doom Dragon Cure+
accessory.detail: Slightly slows down dragonization. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Theodore Zeele
story:
Theodore Zeele

The leader of an anti-government organization known as the "White Hunters." Confident that his goals are noble, he has vowed to take down the Republic. Believing sacrifices are necessary to achieve this, he orders the death of the rebellious Clemence.

accessory.name: Emblem of Freedom+
accessory.detail: Depicts the Savior who will free the world. [5ef5f7]+12%[-]chance of special move.

name: Dominic
story:
Dominic

A demonic instructor feared by all new members of the knights. Knows no mercy and is always harsh and strict. However, this is based on his own sense of justice as he carries on the will of his former master.

accessory.name: Red Claw Shard
accessory.detail: A set of claws broken off of the Red Dragon. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Friedell
story:
Friedell

Having only just joined the Royal Knights, Friedell immediately found himself thrown into danger. His unit was wiped out by dragons. Just as he was about to be chomped, a knight cut in and saved him - Claus, the man who would be his future Captain.

accessory.name: Blue Lion Helm
accessory.detail: Worn by the Blue Lion, Suicide Unit Captain. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alphonse
story:
Alphonse

A former prince, stripped of his royal rank and forced to join the army as rank-and-file. Treated badly by his comrades, he cries himself to sleep every night. His commander, Michael, has promised to return him to royalty if he can kill 100 dragons.

accessory.name: Pillow of Sadness
accessory.detail: Alphonse's pillow, stained with tears. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Edgar
story:
Edgar

A stoic soldier who rarely speaks. Will do whatever is required to achieve his ends, including sacrificing his comrades. Only shows emotion when fighting dragons, roaring with anger and attacking violently with his lance.

accessory.name: Demon Helm
accessory.detail: Given to Edgar to help cover his facial scar. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Clemence
story:
Clemence

A youth who fights alongside his comrades as one of the White Hunters. During the Empty Age, dragon hunting is forbidden, but they continue to flout that prohibition. Now a skilled lance user, he forms a vital part of every dragon hunt.

accessory.name: Dove Helm
accessory.detail: Clement crafted this as a symbol of peace. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Dominic Marls
story:
Dominic Marls

Special advisor to the knights, alongside his former partner Johan. Though 84 years old, his body remains muscular and strong. Under the "come back in one piece" credo of his master, he treats new recruits as harshly as ever to ensure their survival.

accessory.name: Red Claw Shard+
accessory.detail: The claws could parry any spear attack. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Friedell Strohm
story:
Friedell Strohm

A special captain in the unit led by Claus. His Royal Machine Lance has allowed him and his allies to win many battles. Each battlefield provides the next testing ground for his skills, but he also feels bad about Claus's concern for him.

accessory.name: Blue Lion Helm+
accessory.detail: Only those who are worthy may wear it. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alphonse Vyce
story:
Alphonse Vyce

An unlucky former prince who killed his 100 dragons, but still hasn't made much headway in the world. He has reached Vice-Captain, but the mocking attitude of his subordinates makes him cry himself to sleep every night. His only respite is fishing.

accessory.name: Pillow of Sadness+
accessory.detail: A childhood memento, wet with sad tears. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Edgar Schwarz
story:
Edgar Schwarz

A proud warrior who has killed many dragons and sacrificed those above and below him without a second thought. His lack of emotions means he cares nothing for those who fall. He considers it to be the natural law of the world.

accessory.name: Demon Helm+
accessory.detail: Hides a large scar on Edgar's face. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Clemence Zeele
story:
Clemence Zeele

A former rebel fighter who is now faced with his execution. Though the dragon war was meant to be over, questioning why they had to continue fighting against humans incurred Theodore's anger and led to his current predicament.

accessory.name: Dove Helm+
accessory.detail: It lay forgotten until the day it was needed. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Raquel
story:
Raquel

A young huntress who lives in a secluded valley and flies through the sky with her dragon while being careful to avoid contact with others. Was saved by her dragon from a landslide when she was small, and they have been together ever since.

accessory.name: Helm of Fire
accessory.detail: Fiery headdress of the Endless Vale Queen. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cerim
story:
Cerim

A young huntress born in a valley where humans and dragons live together. Flies through the skies with her dragon and hunts animals or monsters to make a living. The valley is generally self-sufficient and secluded, but conflict is now creeping toward it.

accessory.name: Helm of Water
accessory.detail: Aquatic headdress of the Endless Vale King. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maximilian
story:
Maximilian

A young huntress who continues to plead to the King that dragons and humans can coexist as they do in the valley where she was born - where conflict between them is unthinkable. She goes with her dragon to the capital to stop the futile war.
cutin: I don't want to do this!

accessory.name: Helm of Light
accessory.detail: Shiny headpiece of the Endless Vale Warriors. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Izark
story:
Izark

A young female Captain of the Imperial Dragon Riders. Born in a special valley where dragons and humans coexist, she worked with her dragon as a bounty hunter before joining the army. Leads the capture unit to find dragons to fight on the front line.

accessory.name: Ears of Detection
accessory.detail: A dragon detector worn on the head. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Rudolph
story:
Rudolph

A female White Hunter who break the law forbidding dragon slaying. Loves to hunt dragons, and considers the ideals of human liberation touted by Theodore as nothing but an excuse. All she thinks about every day is how best to take down dragons.

accessory.name: Rabbit Hood
accessory.detail: A hood fashioned from Ruda's favorite doll. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Raquel Marls
story:
Raquel Marls

A female hunter and leader of the Perpetual Valley, where orphaned children and gentle dragons live together in harmony. She manages the human and dragon populations by giving them appropriate roles to help keep life in the valley safe and stable.

accessory.name: Helm of Fire+
accessory.detail: A dragon's head motif with motherly eyes. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cerim Strohm
story:
Cerim Strohm

A huntress who continues her research into the cause of the conflict between humans and dragons. She is accompanied by her own dragon. The war is hard for her to bear, and she is aware that some sacrifices will be required in order to end it.

accessory.name: Helm of Water+
accessory.detail: A dragon wing motif gives it a regalness. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maximilian Vyce
story:
Maximilian Vyce

A warrior who hunts other dragons with the aid of her own. Tried to persuade the king that humans and dragons can live together, but the knight captain found out about her home. Cursing her mistake, she continues the hunt to protect the children there.

accessory.name: Helm of Light+
accessory.detail: The dragon claw motif exudes ferocity. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Izark Schwarz
story:
Izark Schwarz

A female Imperial Captain who hunts dragons. She sometimes works alongside dragons, but considers them nothing more than tools, and has no special feelings toward them. She's now planning to capture the rich variety of dragons in her home valley.

accessory.name: Ears of Detection+
accessory.detail: The device detects the heartbeat of dragons. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Rudolph Zeele
story:
Rudolph Zeele

A female fighter who has grown bored of dragons and has started to hunt humans too. The reason the population considers the White Hunters to be extremists is largely due to her. She has a high bounty on her head, often attracting bounty hunters.

accessory.name: Rabbit Hood+
accessory.detail: Very comfortable, and cozy in the winter. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Liselotte
story:
Liselotte

A young girl training diligently in the art of fire magic under the tutelage of Sage Rachael. The Dragon Pyromancy that Rachael sometimes shows her casts beautiful fire into the night sky, and Liselotte dreams of creating that same fire herself.

accessory.name: Scarlet Gunpowder
accessory.detail: An enhancer for the Flora Incendia spell. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Flora
story:
Flora

A young girl raised with great expectations of being a shaman. Passionate in her magic training, she has achieved substantial results, but now it is raining continuously in her homeland. This is at least serving to keep dragons away.

accessory.name: Rain Ward Doll
accessory.detail: A rain ward made by Flora's mother. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Patricia
story:
Patricia

A young magician who was captured and held by the devout from the age-old country known as the Holy Kingdom. Her powers were manifested at a young age, and after losing control of them, she has spent each day living in fear of herself.

accessory.name: Cloth of Holiness
accessory.detail: Holy cloth gifted by the Holy Land's queen. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Walpurgis
story:
Walpurgis

A cheerful young girl born into a long line of magicians. She is already among the strongest in her family's history, but she has no interest in being their next leader, preferring to play in the nearby mountains and rivers with her friend Edgar.

accessory.name: Tiara of True Self
accessory.detail: A heartfelt gift from Edgar to Walpurga. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Octavia
story:
Octavia

A homunculus created by Sage Rosa. Similar to other spirits in most ways, but unique in that she is self aware. Although she was created  by Rosa on a whim, Octavia continues to seek answers regarding the meaning of her existence.

accessory.name: Cloth of Comfort
accessory.detail: Dropped by a disciple of the Blue God. [5ef5f7]+1%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Liselotte Marls
story:
Liselotte Marls

A talented magician among the knights and no stranger to dragon-slaying. Her true passion is Dragon Pyromancy. This high level magic requires all of her natural talent to master. She continues to hunt so she can perfect her art.

accessory.name: Scarlet Gunpowder+
accessory.detail: The powder is absorbed by the victim's body. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Flora Strohm
story:
Flora Strohm

A shaman who uses her gifts to deliver precipitation to various regions. Bringing endless rain wherever she goes, she is worshipped by the inhabitants of arid lands. While Flora has accepted her role, she still dreams of seeing blue skies once more.

accessory.name: Rain Ward Doll+
accessory.detail: A travel mascot made by Flora's mother. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Patricia Vyce
story:
Patricia Vice

A beautiful magician raised with the doctrine of the Holy Kingdom. Now with complete control of her magic, she has ended her days of living in fear. She has also learned of the First Dragon, so she endeavors to save the world from this threat.

accessory.name: Cloth of Holiness+
accessory.detail: The cloth helps one control one's magic. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Walpurgis Schwarz
story:
Walpurgis Schwarz

A great magician and the most powerful matriarch in her family's history. Thanks to her legendary skill, she is often asked to help slay dragons and create new spells. Learning that Edgar has joined the Empire, she travels back to see him.

accessory.name: Tiara of True Self+
accessory.detail: The shawl now guides its wearer's heart. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Octavia Zeele
story:
Octavia Zeele

A doll who wants to become human. Octavia has become aware of her existence, seeing all that she is and striving toward what she could be.

accessory.name: Cloth of Comfort+
accessory.detail: A secret signal, tied around the leg. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Sakura
story:
Sakura

A girl raised by a dragon-slaying samurai. Thanks to his strict tutelage she is already able to train others at their dojo. Though always at odds with her childhood friend, Nijo, she isn't stubborn enough to deny his combat prowess.

accessory.name: Ornament of Trials
accessory.detail: Nabbed from Nijo at the end of a fight. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kasumi
story:
Kasumi

Having been saved by a knight from a foreign land, this girl vowed to take up the sword to defend others. Once dragon-slaying is recognized as an official profession, she convinces her parents to let her become a samurai.

accessory.name: Blue Hair Clip
accessory.detail: A gift given to Kasumi by a foreign friend. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Tsubaki
story:
Tsubaki

Descended from the bloodline of a legendary chef, this potential cooking genius is still in training. Rivals with Himeji, another up-and-coming cook, their culinary battles draw attention from across the land of Zipang.

accessory.name: Mythic Chopsticks
accessory.detail: Cooking utensil used by a legendary chef. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ayame
story:
Ayame

As a child, this girl was saved by Type Zero. The two wander the land slaying dragons as she hones her assassin skills. She desires to please her benefactor, though she has often put his life at risk with her terrible cooking.

accessory.name: Homemade Rice Ball
accessory.detail: Ayame's homemade rice ball. Very hazardous. [5ef5f7]+5%[-] chance of First Strike.

name: Botan
story:
Botan

A nameless girl born in a village of dragon slayers. The name "Botan" was passed down to her and is treated more like a number than an actual name. She acts almost like a puppet, simply killing dragons as ordered - devoid of any emotion.

accessory.name: Bloody Peony
accessory.detail: Has been with Botan as long as she remembers. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Sakura, Inferno Blade
story:
Sakura the Inferno Blade 

A samurai who takes after her father by fighting to defend others. She is known as “The Executioner” for having felled a dragon in a single decapitating blow. Since it was actually Nijo who accomplished this feat, she resents the nickname.

accessory.name: Ornament of Trials+
accessory.detail: Lovely hair ornament with a flower motif. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kasumi, Flowing Water
story:
Kasumi the Flowing Water 

A young samurai who hunts dragons to protect others. In her travels, she meets Anya, the daughter of the foreign knight who previously saved her. Anya is pleased to know that someone so far from home still champions her father’s beliefs.

accessory.name: Blue Hair Clip+
accessory.detail: Emits a foreign scent when winds blow past. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Tsubaki, Solar Flash
story:
Tsubaki the Solar Flash 

The true successor to the legendary chef Izanagi. This title, as well as great fame, was won by defeating Himeji in a cooking battle. He now spends his days gathering ingredients so he can save the world through cooking as the Chef of Light.

accessory.name: Mythic Chopsticks+
accessory.detail: All food they touched once turned delicious. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ayame, Dark Circle
story:
Ayame the Dark Circle 

A swordswoman who fights for the assassin Type Zero, to whom she has been loyal since he saved her as a child. She is now completing requests to slay dragons while waiting impatiently for Type Zero to return from a long voyage overseas.

accessory.name: Homemade Rice Ball+
accessory.detail: Ayame's homemade rice ball. Possibly fatal. [5ef5f7]+7%[-] chance of First Strike.

name: Botan, Shadowless Wing
story:
Botan the Shadowless Wing 

A stoic warrior who exists only to hunt dragons. She sees them as nothing but targets, and hunts the powerful beasts with a maniacal grin - the only emotional display she will ever exhibit.

accessory.name: Bloody Peony+
accessory.detail: The petals are dyed red with flying blood. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Nijo
story:
Nijo

A youth sworn to become a fine warrior to follow in the footsteps of his heroic mother who saved her lord. Using her spear techniques in battle, he claims to be the best at his dojo. Often picks fights with his friend Sakura, but usually ends up crying.

accessory.name: Headband of Trials
accessory.detail: Given by his mother the day he left home. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Nanao
story:
Nanao

A young spearman born in the Water Village. The heavy mists there kept dragons away for a long time, but the conflict has finally reached them. He sees this as a chance to test his skills and immediately signs up to fight.

accessory.name: Charm of Mists
accessory.detail: Given to all who live in the village. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Himeji
story:
Himeji

A young cook from the bloodline of a legendary chef. Born into a family of concealed cooks, his family's captivating dishes have supported politics from the shadows for generations. Confident that he is the one true successor to the legendary chef.

accessory.name: Mythic Bowl
accessory.detail: A serving dish used by a legendary chef. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Wakamatsu
story:
Wakamatsu

A Royal Knight who has come to investigate the land of Zipang. He now spends every day irritated and annoyed, wanting to get home again as quickly as he can. Upon finding a wounded dragon, he quickly settles upon the idea of flying home.

accessory.name: Black Collar
accessory.detail: A dragon collar that controls through pain. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Matsue
story:
Matsue

A young man who lives with his own dragon far from civilization. Unable to part with the baby dragon he acquired as a child, he ended up raising it into a mighty beast. The dragon still considers him its parent, and this has started to cause some trouble.

accessory.name: Dragongrass Whistle
accessory.detail: It’s sound can soothe even wild dragons. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Nijo, Double Inferno
story:
Nijo the Double Inferno 

A youth who hunts dragons with his partner Sakura. In the land of Zipang, dragon slayers are called samurai, and those loyal to a Lord are called bushi. As one must slay many dragons to become a bushi, Nijo strives to obtain this title.

accessory.name: Headband of Trials+
accessory.detail: Some parts are stained with blood and sweat. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Nanao, Double Water
story:
Nanao the Double Water 

A young hero who protects the Water Village. He trained hard to overcome his fear of fighting dragons. He still fears their appearance, but he is also the first person to boldly dive into the fray when the village is under attack.

accessory.name: Charm of Mists+
accessory.detail: Represents a hope for peace and stability. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Himeji, Double Flash
story:
Himeji the Double Flash 

A chef of the legendary Izanagi bloodline. Though he was defeated by Tsubaki, he has become a skilled Chef of Darkness. He now controls many people through his cooking, but his dishes are known for being slightly bitter.

accessory.name: Mythic Bowl+
accessory.detail: All food placed in it once turned delicious. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Wakamatsu, Double Dark
story:
Wakamatsu the Double Dark 

An investigator having trouble taming a dragon. He plans to use a dragon to escape to his homeland, but is frustrated by his lack of progress. Hearing of a lancer in the same position, he schemes to steal his dragon.

accessory.name: Black Collar+
accessory.detail: Emits noise to keep a dragon off-balance. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Matsue, D. Prototype
story:
Matsue the Double Prototype 

A young man who yearns to bring his own dragon to that distant place where humans and dragons peacefully coexist. The more he hears of other foreign lands, the more he wants to explore them. As such, he is often distracted from his original goal.

accessory.name: Dragongrass Whistle+
accessory.detail: It’s sound is like that of the wind itself. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Haruna
story:
Haruna

A trainee in a troupe of archers from the east. Joined after witnessing the prowess of the troupe’s leader, Mikasa. Enlisting at the same time as Ise, the two have become known as the “Blue Flame Snipers” when they work in tandem.

accessory.name: Red Feather Helm
accessory.detail: Mark of the Fire of the Blue Fire Archers. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ise
story:
Ise

A trainee in a troupe of archers from the east. Joined the same time as Haruna and has received extensive military training which allowed her to master the bow. Despite their different backgrounds, she gets along with Haruna very well.

accessory.name: Blue Feather Helm
accessory.detail: Mark of the Blue of the Blue Fire Archers. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mikasa
story:
Mikasa

The leader of a troupe of archers from the east. She played a decisive role in defending her homeland from an ancient dragon. While still a powerful warrior, a recent battle wound has begun to trouble her.

accessory.name: Charm of Cleansing
accessory.detail: Produced by the White Tiger Army. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nagato
story:
Nagato

A talented archer who took over for Mikasa. Avoiding reckless confidence, she punishes the dragons that ravage her homeland. While this earns her a great deal of praise, it's taking her down a path she'd rather avoid.

accessory.name: Poison Arrow
accessory.detail: Nagato carries a jar with him everywhere. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Settsu
story:
Settsu

An eastern girl in the same troupe of archers as Mikasa. Though in different units, she was injured protecting Mikasa in the one battle they fought together. Missing the rest of the fight, she spends her life in the shadow cast by Mikasa’s achievements.
cutin: I've got this on my own!

accessory.name: Hair Clip of Envy
accessory.detail: Given by Shinano when Settsu began serving. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Haruna, Flaming Shot
story:
Haruna the Flaming Shot 

A fire archer under Suzaku Emperor Akagi. Akagi’s orders are usually vague, so it can be hard to serve her properly. This challenge has helped hone Haruna’s skills as both an archer and a leader, and she now trains all new recruits.

accessory.name: Red Feather Helm+
accessory.detail: Its red hue represents a wildly blazing fire. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ise, Water Shot
story:
Ise the Water Shot 

An ice archer under Seiryu Emperor Kaga. After training hard alongside Haruna, Mikasa, Nagato and Settsu, she has risen in rank to directly serve one of the military emperors. Though they no longer fight together, she often remembers her former companions.

accessory.name: Blue Feather Helm+
accessory.detail: Its blue hue conveys a placid water surface. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mikasa, Sun Shot
story:
Mikasa the Sun Shot 

A light archer who fights dragons under Byakko Emperor Chitose. Her back is slowly being covered in painful dragon scales. Only Chitose knows of this affliction, but any help she attempts is in vain as Mikasa seems doomed to become a dragon.

accessory.name: Charm of Cleansing+
accessory.detail: Slows growth and eases pain of dragon scales. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nagato, Dark Shot
story:
Nagato the Dark Shot 

A shadow archer under Genbu Emperor Ryujo. In truth, this role is a disguise, and she is actually an assassin who secretly eliminates Ryujo’s enemies. Ryujo himself is unaware of this, but Nagato considers it recompense for his saving her from darkness.
cutin: The wind is in my favor.

accessory.name: Poison Arrow+
accessory.detail: Even just a small cut can poison the victim. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Settsu, Zero Shot
story:
Settsu the Zero Shot

A void archer under Kirin Emperor Shinano. She gained undying respect for the emperor after Shinano healed her useless, injured hand. While she has been working for the Kirin emperor, she has added a string of decisive victories to her name.

accessory.name: Hair Clip of Envy+
accessory.detail: Settsu always wears her most prized item. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Akagi
story:
Akagi

A fire mage in the eastern 88th Magic Division. Joining about the same time as Kaga, the two formed a friendly rivalry to improve their magic. The Emperor nicknamed him, “Omega Storm.” He is beloved by his hometown for his stalwart defense of their lands.

accessory.name: Fire Bird Bell
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor. [5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kaga
story:
Kaga

A mage skilled with water and ice. Joined the 88th Magic Division 5 months before Akagi, so he thinks himself more senior. Named “Obsidian Wind,” by the Emperor, he is known for his bold and aggressive battle tactics.

accessory.name: Azure Dragon Mirror
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor. [5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Chitose
story:
Chitose

A light mage who transferred to the 88th Magic Division around the same time as Shinano thanks to his performance in battle. His past remains a mystery, and he actively supports the Emperor - even earning the name, "Elysian Sage."

accessory.name: White Tiger Band
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor. [5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ryujo
story:
Ryujo

A dark mage who joined the 88th Magic Division purely out of admiration for Akagi. The Emperor named him, “Young Commander.” What he lacks in magical prowess, he makes up for with hard work. His sights are firmly set on mirroring Akagi’s achievements.

accessory.name: Black Turtle Curse
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor. [5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Shinano
story:
Shinano

A mage specialized in void magic, he joined the 88th Magic Division with Chitose. While young and inexperienced, he still managed to earn the name “Brilliant Dawn” from the Emperor. Extremely humble, he holds himself back to make his allies look good.

accessory.name: Chimera Beads
accessory.detail: One of 5 Godly Vessels gifted by the Emperor[5ef5f7]+200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Akagi, Emperor Suzaku
story:
Akagi the Emperor Suzaku 

The Military Emperor, Suzaku, who fights under the Star King. Divines the location of dragons with Kaga, Chitose, Ryujo and Shinano, then sends troops. With the bushi and samurai long gone, Akagi's archers are the only thing that can oppose the dragons.

accessory.name: Fire Bird Bell+
accessory.detail: All who hear its sound are burned by fires. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kaga, Emperor Seiryu
story:
Kaga the Emperor Seiryu

The Military Emperor, Seiryu, who fights under the Star King. Collaboration is key to defeating dragons in the land of Zipang, so if a dragon appears that is too much for his subordinates to handle alone, he will go into battle himself.

accessory.name: Azure Dragon Mirror+
accessory.detail: All that it reflects is drowned by water. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Chitose, Emperor Byakko
story:
Chitose the Emperor Byakko

The Military Emperor, Byakko, who fights under the Star King. He is also the one who helped Shinano achieve the rank of Military Emperor. Has a more philosophical view of things than the others, and for some reason also knows a lot about distant lands.

accessory.name: White Tiger Band+
accessory.detail: All who gaze reveal their true selves. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ryujo, Emperor Genbu
story:
Ryujo the Emperor  Genbu 

The Military Emperor, Genbu, who fights under the Star King. Has managed to completely seal away his personality and never speaks a single word. This sacrifice was not without reward as he is unparalleled in magical prowess.

accessory.name: Black Turtle Curse+
accessory.detail: All it is placed upon lose their souls. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Shinano, Emperor Kirin
story:
Shinano the Emperor Kirin
 
The Military Emperor, Kirin, who fights under the Star King. The Five Emperors - Suzaku, Seiryu, Byakko, Genbu and Kirin - are rarely seen together. Only once in the past, when the Old Dragon appeared, did the five of them unite and fight as one.

accessory.name: Chimera Beads+
accessory.detail: All souls it captures are trapped in cycles. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Augustus
story:
Augustus

The legendary hero Augustus, who led his allies in the defeat of countless dragons during the Age of Fire. Bold, brave and fierce, he swore a vow that all under his command would return alive. This earned him many supporters.

accessory.name: Cape of Triumph
accessory.detail: Given by his wife the day he left for war. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Luke
story:
Luke

A young hero on a journey with Sea Princess Liveia to seal away the Glutton Queen. Friends with Ursula and Mary, they have defeated many dragons and cryptids together. Although he doesn't want to fight a human, he takes up arms to keep his promise to Ursula.

accessory.name: Medal of Vows
accessory.detail: Given to Luke and one other for their deeds. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alain
story:
Alain

The hero who forged the Age of Light. The Holy Sword he carries will change form depending on who wields it, and for him it becomes a gleaming white blade of pure beckoning light. Unfortunately, it’s so bright he often has to fight alone.

accessory.name: Crystal of Deceit
accessory.detail: A dragon-shaped growth on the Holy Sword. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Eizel
story:
Eizel

A hero from the Age of Darkness, he defeated the Evil Dragon and obtained its Evil Eye. The power of the Evil Eye grows with each dragon killed, so he continues his ruthless hunt. This has also made him a target by those who covet that power.

accessory.name: Helm of Madness
accessory.detail: Controls the powers of the Evil Dragon's Eye. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Joseph
story:
Joseph

A hero born in the Empty Age - the only age with no conflict between humans and dragons. During this age, humans served under dragon masters. Joseph was a loyal knight, so he was forced to turn his blade on rebellious humans.

accessory.name: Wings of the Ether
accessory.detail: Gift for becoming one of the Five Knights. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Phyllis
story:
Phyllis

A blazing hero who would roast dragons with her flaming lance. When her home was razed by dragons, she swore to bring the same fate to all such creatures. Her own soul is the source of her flames, so she slowly sacrifices her own life as she slays.

accessory.name: Fire of Life
accessory.detail: A special item crafted  by a renowned smith. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ursula
story:
Ursula

A young hero traveling to seal the Glutton Queen. Voyaging with Liveia, Luke and Mary for the Limit Sea, she is secretly aiding the Queen. She was promised the lives of her family in exchange for her companions.

accessory.name: Crystal of Bondage
accessory.detail: The seven bonds that tie Ursula's soul. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Angelica
story:
Angelica

A female knight born to a loyalist family. She serves the Knight King, but since they grew up together, she is more like a sister to him. Having helped him overcome his crybaby tendencies, she loves that Artorious now tries to protect her.

accessory.name: Tiara of Light
accessory.detail: A vow and gift given to her by the King. [5ef5f7]+5%[-] chance of critical hit.

name: Viola
story:
Viola

An otherling master of death sent by God to help balance the mortal world. Disagrees with her other half, Fiona, and believes that all mortals and dragons should be wiped out. She spends most of her time working toward that goal.

accessory.name: Crown of Despair
accessory.detail: A mark of despair worn by a god's disciple. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Fiona
story:
Fiona

An otherling master of life sent by God to the mortal world to maintain balance. Although she was created at the same time as Viola, they never see eye-to-eye, so they always bicker. She spends her time purifying lost souls.

accessory.name: Crown of Hope
accessory.detail: A symbol of hope worn by a god's disciple. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Foster
story:
Foster

The first patriarch in the house of Apollos. His arrow shots, as the name suggests, are arrow-like bullets, easily capable of piercing dragon hide. Coating them in a certain oil also allows them to cause intense, lingering pain inside a dragon's body.

accessory.name: Wildfire Arrow
accessory.detail: A projectile that can even puncture dragons. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Turner
story:
Turner

The 63rd patriarch in the house of Apollos, he is known as the “Mighty Monsoon.” His greatest strength is his army of archers and the hundreds of arrows they rain down on foes simultaneously. This monsoon of arrows can even wipe out dragons.

accessory.name: Raindrop Charm
accessory.detail: Found by Turner in a land of constant rain. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Edwards
story:
Edwards

The 162nd patriarch of Apollos and part of the duo known as the "Golden Twin Dragons." Using the arrow shots of his ancestors, he can pierce a dragon's heart from any angle. He is among the few who recognize the true skill of his partner Eleonora.

accessory.name: Locket of Distance
accessory.detail: Engraved with the name of the woman he loves. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Smith
story:
Smith

A youth who has survived in the underworld by hunting dragons for gold. As far back as he can remember, he has faced death each day but somehow made it through. Unbeknownst to him, he is of the Apollos bloodline.

accessory.name: The Don's Bracelet
accessory.detail: Found in the belly of his first dragon kill. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Robin
story:
Robin

A bounty hunter and the last of the Apollos bloodline. The arrow shots of his ancestors are now being used on humans. He currently seeks the high bounty on a female hunter. As long as he can make money, humans and dragons are both fair game.

accessory.name: Unicorn Mask
accessory.detail: Mask of a white-horned beast made by Robin. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Rachael
story:
Rachael

There were once explosive masters that decorated festival nights with fire and fireworks. They achieved this by tying a baby dragon down and turning its blood into gunpowder before blowing it up. She is the creator of this Dragon Pyromancy.

accessory.name: Crimson Embers
accessory.detail: The scale of the first dragon she decimated. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Mary
story:
Mary

The legendary magician who sealed the Glutton Queen deep within herself, losing her three companions along the way. Some say she created a land above the clouds and tied her soul to that place while she remained to observe the world of men.

accessory.name: Shell Ornament
accessory.detail: It has been made from an unusual seashell. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rosa
story:
Rosa

The ultimate tyrannical mage from the Age of Light. Utilizing a variety of forbidden arts, she could turn people into dragons or resurrect them with mechanical bodies. Driven only by curiosity, it was virtually impossible to stop her.

accessory.name: Miracle Bouquet
accessory.detail: Given with some precious words. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nora
story:
Nora

A ray of light in the Age of Darkness. It is her life’s work to eradicate the Dragoturn Sickness birthed by Rosa in the previous age. She continues in this endeavor to atone for the sins of her mother.
cutin: No choice but to do it.

accessory.name: Cursed Blooddrop
accessory.detail: A lot of blood went into this tiny amount. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Loretta
story:
Loretta

Originally an orphan, this sage was held captive in the Holy Kingdom because of her magical power. The Holy Kingdom was actually an artificial island in the sky that Ideia created to seal herself away.

accessory.name: Laughing Cat Boots
accessory.detail: Loretta has worn these since being abandoned. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Fenris
story:
Fenris

A wolf girl with the unique ability to talk to dragons and monsters. Gentle by nature, she hates conflict and searches for a way for humans and dragons to coexist. Each year, there is a single night of which she has no memory - the night of the God Moon.

accessory.name: Moon Mementos
accessory.detail: Mysterious objects she has always had on her. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cthulu
story:
Cthulu

Queen of the Age of Water, she was sealed away for disrupting the balance of the world. She is a berserker who lived only to hunt humans and dragons. Known as the Glutton Queen for consuming the flesh of her prey, regular folk dare not whisper her name.

accessory.name: Twin Blue Pendant
accessory.detail: The pendant emits a deep, blue light. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Artorius
story:
Artorius

The greatest Knight King in history and the only one to ever draw the Holy Sword. He was the first to reach the First Dragon. Displaying power so far beyond mere mortals, he was practically divine. Despite this, he lost his beloved during his travels.

accessory.name: Memory of Solitude
accessory.detail: A vow and gift given to him by Angelica. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Type Zero
story:
Type Zero

An assassin from the distant land of Zipang. He has come for the Evil Dragon Eye that a certain individual has obtained. Type Zero's mission is to obtain its power and use it to defeat the dragons now threatening the land of Zipang.

accessory.name: Secret Medicine
accessory.detail: Pills for stomach pain made by a ninja clan. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Izanagi
story:
Izanagi

A legendary chef in the land of Zipang. The dishes he created have since become myth - even tying in to creation legends. It is said that he created land while cooking meat and life by gutting fish.

accessory.name: Mythic Topapo Stew
accessory.detail: T is for tidy. Keep your kitchen clean. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Zetterman
story:
Zetterman

Casting aside my life as a peasant, I am now reborn!\n\nEmerging from the darkness to crush dragons! The hero of steel, ZETTERMAN!

accessory.name: Field Guardian
accessory.detail: A hero who protects fields from invaders![5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: ASMK-2
story:
ASMK-2

The remnants of a human enhanced by an ancient, long-lost technology. Lacking self-awareness, it simply kills anything that comes within range, be it dragon or human. Amid that rage, it is especially fixated on the Knight King.

accessory.name: Tarnished Tiara
accessory.detail: Rust covers the tiara, its former glow faded. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Anubis
story:
Anubis

The goddess who brings repose to souls by sending them to Holy Valhalla. She also maintains balance by silencing twisted souls. In times of chaos, she may turn her spear on mortals. Because of this, she was a symbol of terror in the Age of Darkness.

accessory.name: Cat With No Name
accessory.detail: It has no name yet. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Grimdore
story:
Grimdore

A girl who works as a cryptid hunter using the machine gun her grandmother left her. Cryptids share their roots with dragons and other monsters, and she hunts them all on sight. She chose this profession after a lycanthrope wiped out her family.

accessory.name: Red Hood of Hate
accessory.detail: A red hood inherited from her late grandma. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Liveia
story:
Liveia

Legendary princess of the sea, who rules the seven seas and fights beasts with her water bow. Possessing a beauty of both body and voice, she travels to the distant eighth sea to seal away the Glutton Queen’s evil.

accessory.name: Dual Blue Pendant
accessory.detail: The pendant emits a pale, blue light. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo
story:
Mayu Hojo

A girl summoned from the distant future to become a hero in this one. Her pop culture references are gibberish in an age without pop, but she is also kind and quickly makes new friends. She oils up her mechanical body to fight dragons.

accessory.name: Mr. Skewer
accessory.detail: A popular item in the world of the future. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Chrono
story:
Chrono

The leader of an organization formed to hunt the "Sinners", abnormals created using forbidden arts. Chrono is one of them himself, and is already more than 2000 years old. Though one day he too must be erased, he goes about his missions with seemingly little concern.

accessory.name: Chronos Machina
accessory.detail: Shows the time left to the end of the world. [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, Light enemies.

name: Velvet
story:
Velvet

A servant who made a contract with Ideia in the distant past. Training magicians to serve her in the Holy Kingdom, she spends her days trying to keep up with Ideia's demands. She’s not bothered by Ideia’s plans, she just wants to complete her contract.

accessory.name: Veil of Penance
accessory.detail: Worn to do penance for one's past mistakes. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ideia
story:
Ideia

A mighty sorceress who ruled the Holy Kingdom for thousands of years. Her goals and origins are unknown, and she has been kidnapping girls with magical abilities and educating them in the ways of the Holy Kingdom. Has a terrible memory.

accessory.name: Blazing Memories
accessory.detail: Contains the stopped time of the Holy Land. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Le Fay
story:
Le Fay

Born from a 5,000 m tall World Tree planted by accident, Le Fay has a childlike innocence and curiosity that belies\nthe great knowledge she possesses. She has come to earth, drawn by the Seventh Dragon-Human War.

accessory.name: Band of Mischief
accessory.detail: Reverberates to all that seem fun. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Yurika
story:
Yurika

The master librarian who manages the mythical Forbidden Library which is hidden somewhere in the world and is responsible for all magical tomes. She often appears in historical tomes which suggest that she may be a creature of some unknown magic.

accessory.name: Rainbow Pen
accessory.detail: Made with the feather of a Moonbow Dragon. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]error[-]\nNot here anymore.

name: Silver Spirit (Sell)
story:
Silver Spirit (Sell)

[FF1493]To Sell[-]\nA rare spirit that somehow happened to get a body made of silver.

name: Gold Spirit (Sell)
story:
Gold Spirit (Sell)

[FF1493]To Sell[-]\nA very rare spirit that somehow happened to get a body made of gold.

name: Heaven Spirit (Sell)
story:
Heaven Spirit (Sell)

[FF1493]To Sell[-]\nAn extremely rare spirit that somehow happened to get the body of an angel. Really has her stuff together compared to other spirits.

name: Augustus, God of War
story:
Augustus the God of War 

An age-worn warrior who still fights on the front lines. Under his motto of "come back in one piece," he trains the young knights who he hopes will follow in his footsteps. Much to their discomfort, he often lunges into danger for his allies.

accessory.name: Cape of Triumph+
accessory.detail: It is worn with care; not a stain covers it. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Luke, Godly Knight
story:
Luke the Godly Knight 

A hero from the Age of Water who reached the Final Sea in order to seal the Glutton Queen. Cursed with an incurable wound by Ursula's betrayal, he continues his mission, preparing to face her down and uncover the truth behind her actions.

accessory.name: Medal of Vows+
accessory.detail: It was damaged during the fight with Ursula. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alain, Holy Emperor
story:
Alain the Holy Emperor 

The hero Alain, who fought tirelessly to protect his people from dragons. His burning heart of justice has earned him the name Holy Emperor. His Holy Sword has started to adopt a form that seals away his powers, reflecting his doubts in himself.

accessory.name: Crystal of Deceit+
accessory.detail: The crystal has spread to cover Alain's soul. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Eizel, Crazed King
story:
Eizel the Crazed King 

A hero who has fallen into madness through use of the Evil Eye. Half of his body has turned into a dragon, resembling the evil he defeated to obtain the eye. The eye itself has already been taken by an assassin, yet the transformation only accelerates.

accessory.name: Helm of Madness+
accessory.detail: Protects the Eye from its enemy: sunlight. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Joseph, False God
story:
Joseph the False God 

Joseph fights against rebels as a knight. The Republic he fights for places dragons as the highest authority with five knights below them. Joseph is one of the five, and he rarely agrees with his fellow knight Robin.

accessory.name: Wings of the Ether+
accessory.detail: Woven with feathers of Moonbow Dragons. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Phyllis, True Heroine
story:
Phyllis the True Heroine
 
A female knight also known as the "Blaze." She has her own escape from the world - an orphanage for those who have lost family in the war. She has little life left in her, yet she burns on with the passion to protect them.

accessory.name: Fire of Life+
accessory.detail: Exchanges one's soul for power over fire. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ursula, Savior
story:
Ursula the Savior 

Having traveled with Liveia and the others while acting as the secret emissary of the Glutton Queen, she made a promise to Luke when their journey began. That promise was to be Liveia's shield, no matter what, and to defeat all who stood before her.

accessory.name: Crystal of Bondage+
accessory.detail: Break a bond, and the crystal eats her soul. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Angelica, Holy One
story:
Angelica the Holy One 

A knight who rides with the Knight King to defeat the First Dragon. Happy to fight alongside him, she is also worried about his fixation on justice. They suddenly find themselves in a village where everyone has been affected by the Dragoturn Sickness.

accessory.name: Tiara of Light+
accessory.detail: A memory so beautiful, all pale in its face. [5ef5f7]+6%[-] chance of critical hit.

name: Viola, Scholar
story:
Viola the Scholar 

An apostle from the end of the Age of Darkness. Ordered by the gods to destroy the world along with the Hell King, she uses her weapon of despair - Pandora - to take countless lives. She hopes to cast a ray of hope into the next age.

accessory.name: Crown of Despair+
accessory.detail: Its black hue is like an abyss of despair. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Empress Fiona
story:
Fiona the Empress

The end of an age. Fiona, the Hell King, and the other apostles have renewed the world. However using the weapon of hope, Pandora, she reaches the ultimate truth after creating countless lives - this was also the start of the next cycle of despair.

accessory.name: Crown of Hope+
accessory.detail: Its white hue is like a garden of hope. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Master Foster
story:
Foster the Master

Head of the house of Apollos, he was famous for both slaying dragons and inventing many things - including arrow shots. This was caused by his desire to become a scientist, and if not for the war, he would have sought only to invent things that help others.

accessory.name: Wildfire Arrow+
accessory.detail: Its fires burn inside a dragon, roasting it. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Turner, Admiral
story:
Turner the Admiral 

The Mighty Monsoon, known for destroying foes with thousands of arrows fired by his vast army. The woman he took as his wife was also one who made it rain, and the quiet sound of the rain that gently fell around her become his own respite.

accessory.name: Raindrop Charm+
accessory.detail: Changes color based on the patter of rain. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Edwards, Field Marshall
story:
Edwards the Field Marshall

His intelligence earned him a position as a scientist for the crown. Had a child with his assistant, Eleonora, but she leaves him in order to let him pursue his career. Edwards spent the rest of his life in solitude, ending the house of Apollos.

accessory.name: Locket of Distance+
accessory.detail: Has not been opened since she left him. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Smith, Commander
story:
Smith the Commander

Dragon scales can be sold for gold. Having killed many dragons, Smith ruled the underworld. Endless days without challenge started to bore him, but one day he lost it all to a thief who appeared out of nowhere. Finally, some excitement.

accessory.name: The Don's Bracelet+
accessory.detail: Of horrible make; the gem is actually glass. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Robin, Lord Commander
story:
Robin the Lord Commander 

Now one of the Five Knights of the Republic, he has nearly achieved his goal of reviving the house of the Apollos. Two problems remain: one is the huntress who is still too strong for him, and the other is Joseph, who doesn’t believe she needs to die.

accessory.name: Unicorn Mask+
accessory.detail: Beast masks are an Apollos tradition. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Rachael, True Sage
story:
Rachael the True Sage 

Rachael was born to alchemist parents who specialized in explosives. When she was young, she enjoyed their fireworks. One day, a dragon attacked, razing the town and killing her parents. It closed in on her, but suddenly it exploded into fireworks.

accessory.name: Crimson Embers+
accessory.detail: Makes an Explosionist feel pride and fear. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Mary, Sage General
story:
