Mary the Sage General

Mary has no memories. Sometimes, she glimpses flashes of the past - the same scene: a beautiful sea princess shooting both a young hero and female knight as they grapple. It makes her feel so sad, she immediately does her best to forget it again.

accessory.name: Shell Ornament+
accessory.detail: Inside the shell is a deep, endless abyss. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rosa, Holy Sage
story:
Rosa the Holy Sage 

Rosa is totally without emotions. Discarding them was the only way to survive her childhood. She first felt emotion again when her daughter was born. In that instant, she smiled, glad to have this new subject for her experiments.

accessory.name: Miracle Bouquet+
accessory.detail: The only truth amidst all the lies. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nora, Imperious
story:
The Imperious Nora 

The Dragoturn Sickness appeared at the end of the Age of Darkness. All who catch it eventually turn into vicious dragons and experience terrible pain during the transformation. The only cure is a serum created from the blood of the carrier, Nora.

accessory.name: Cursed Blooddrop+
accessory.detail: A medicine that can treat dragonization. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Loretta, Tactician
story:
Loretta the Tactician 

Loretta has achieved military rank in the Holy Kingdom, but suffers a nightmare about a crazy king. He was sealed away for his crimes, but now appears to be consuming that seal. Loretta awoke terrified, but then gave a strange, cat-like laugh.

accessory.name: Laughing Cat Boots+
accessory.detail: Whenever they tear, she patches them up. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Johan, Bold General
story:
Johan the Bold General 

How many years has it been since he raised his voice? That had always been the role of his partner, but for the first time, that same partner was about to ignore the creed of "come back in one piece." If not now, then when should he get angry?

accessory.name: Red Horn Shard++
accessory.detail: Only an old soldier's will stopped the horn. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Claus, Blue General
story:
Claus the Blue General

A knight captain who brandishes his blade in a distant eastern land. His activities have helped the local populace, but he’s also starting to bear the weight of responsibility for bringing so many young people along with him - including his friend Friedell.

accessory.name: Homeland Amulet++
accessory.detail: The hope it symbolizes shall be passed on. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Michael, Holy General
story:
Michael the Holy General 

Often called a demon because of his incredibly strategic wit, he was the true power behind the throne. Known for using multi-tiered traps to humiliate and destroy his foes, for his final display of prowess, he has chosen the current king, Artorius.

accessory.name: Hallowed Crown++
accessory.detail: Only with death does glory become eternal. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Elvin, Black General
story:
Elvin the Black General 

An imperial warrior who hates the Dragoturn Sickness (which turns humans into dragons). He seeks to end it by finding the witch who created it. Learning that it originated from a small village, he believes that location now holds the key.

accessory.name: Doom Dragon Cure++
accessory.detail: Side effects include doubling of pain. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Theodore, Tiger General
story:
Theodore the Tiger General 

I bring you salutations!
Welcome, one and all, to the grand new age!

- Collection of Speeches by Tiger General Theodore, Chapter Three, Paragraph 4

accessory.name: Emblem of Freedom++
accessory.detail: It eventually comes to symbolize destruction. [5ef5f7]+15%[-] chance of special move.

name: Dominic, Red Deer
story:
Dominic the Red Deer 

The old soldier grips his lance more tightly. This is where he will die. At least the others have escaped. He just needs to buy them a little more time. He is ready to die - here where his own master...  but then the anger of his friend erupts.

accessory.name: Red Claw Shard++
accessory.detail: Only an old soldier's will struck through. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Friedell, Frosty Tiger
story:
Friedell the Frosty Tiger 

A knight captain who succeeds his fallen captain, Claus, and leads his men in the eastern land of Zipang. After falling out with the samurai dragon slayers in this region, he spends his days skirmishing with their female boss, Kasumi.

accessory.name: Blue Lion Helm++
accessory.detail: The crest is extended with every success. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alphonse, Heavenly Gate
story:
Alphonse the Heavenly Gate 

A former prince who's every effort to return to royalty has failed. He continues to be mocked within the army, too, but no longer cries himself to sleep. Instead, Alphonse fights on, for the sake of his wife and child who wait for him.

accessory.name: Pillow of Sadness++
accessory.detail: No longer shall tears dampen this pillow. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Edgar, Vizali Hunter
story:
Edgar the Vizali Hunter

Marginalized by the army, he is practically forced out of the service and into mercenary life. Sipping watery beer in a southern desert bar, Edgar watches a familiar looking girl dance on stage. Fearing the truth behind her presence, he leaves the bar.

accessory.name: Demon Helm++
accessory.detail: The mask no longer comes off for anyone. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Clemence, Brave Spirit
story:
Clemence the Brave Spirit 

A knight and key member of the rebel organization, White Hunters, who have finally plunged into a terrible, all-out war with the Republic. Having done all he can to prevent the war, it finally comes down to a single solution - to kill his former friend.

accessory.name: Dove Helm++
accessory.detail: People sought peace, and it began to shine. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Raquel, Bold Princess
story:
Raquel the Bold Princess 

The head huntress of a valley where dragons and humans live together. She works hard to keep peace between them. Known for her strict demeanor, she is feared by both humans and dragons. Her merciful expressions will sometimes reveal her maternal nature.

accessory.name: Helm of Fire++
accessory.detail: A symbol of mutual need and coexistence. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cerim, Imperial Star
story:
Cerim the Imperial Star

Her investigations into regional dragon behavior have led to an interesting revelation. In regards to conflicts between dragons, they seem to attack anything entering their territory, but they will not engage in hostilities with dragons of the same color.

accessory.name: Helm of Water++
accessory.detail: A symbol of peace and change. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maximilian, Dragon Seal
story:
Maximilian the Dragon Seal 

A warrior banished from her home in the Perpetual Valley where dragons and humans coexist. Keeping her promise to a certain knight captain, she spread the word of her home and helped lead others to seek it out. The valley banished her and moved.

accessory.name: Helm of Light++
accessory.detail: A symbol of struggle and exile. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Izark, Roaring Shadow
story:
Izark the Roaring Shadow

The Imperial Dragon Capture Captain who brought an end to the long history of the Perpetual Valley. Wiped out the humans living there and handed all the dragons over to the military, transforming herself into an object of fear for decades to come.
cutin: End of the line for you!

accessory.name: Ears of Detection++
accessory.detail: Hopefully one day, the device will go silent. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Rudolph, Queen Hare
story:
Rudolph the Queen Hare 

A hunter with a huge bounty on his head. He formerly hunted dragons, but he now targets humans as well - creating new tragedies each day. After leaving the White Hunters, he learned that their boss, Theodore, is after him. He plans to hunt Theodore first.

accessory.name: Rabbit Hood++
accessory.detail: Not suited to summer, as it smells of blood. [5ef5f7]+2%[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Liselotte, Wild Witch
story:
Liselotte the Wild Witch 

Dragon Pyromancy are a high level form of alchemy involving transforming the blood of dragons into gunpowder. The process requires the complete immobilization of the target, and continuously transforming the flowing blood is itself a form of art.

accessory.name: Scarlet Gunpowder++
accessory.detail: A spell causes the powder to explode. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Flora, Harvest Disciple
story:
Flora the Harvest Disciple 

Having continued to make it rain around herself, she has received gratitude, but also started to realize people think her a bit strange. Flora is accustomed to it by now, but is also wondering if the downpour around her will ever allow her to get married.

accessory.name: Rain Ward Doll++
accessory.detail: A happiness charm made by Flora's mother. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Patricia, Holy Empress
story:
Patricia the Holy Empress

The First Dragon is the progenitor of all dragons - the alpha and omega of all ages. Patricia has discovered that all calamities originate from this dragon, but there is also a shadow controlling it.

accessory.name: Cloth of Holiness++
accessory.detail: Removing this cloth is expressly forbidden. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Walpurgis, Demon Eye
story:
Walpurgis the Demon Eye 

Walpurgis is a tavern dancer who supplements her income using magic to heal and tell fortunes. After many years of living without memories, she finally recalls her own name and the smile of a boy from her childhood. She now dreams of meeting him again.

accessory.name: Tiara of True Self++
accessory.detail: Walpurga cherishes it,but she knows not why. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Octavia, Necromancer
story:
Octavia the Necromancer 

Octavia has accepted her life as something other than a human after realizing that trying to act like a human is the last thing a real person would do. She decides to use what time remains to her to explore as much of the world as possible.

accessory.name: Cloth of Comfort++
accessory.detail: Her Blue Guardian now lives on inside her. [5ef5f7]+3%[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Seyfried
story:
Seyfried

A youth who robs from the rich and gives to the poor. Travels along with the female magician who raised him, slaying dragons and doing good deeds. His massive sword, Balmung, does not cut through dragon scales but rather crushes them to pieces.

accessory.name: Evil Dragon Shroud
accessory.detail: Worn by his father who slew the Evil Dragon. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Seyfried, Bandit King
story:
Seyfried the Bandit King

Take everything. That was Seyfried's credo. After the magician who raised him was assassinated, he stopped trusting others and has lived by his own wits. His sword, Balmung, has become even stronger after being bathed in his departed guardian's blood.

accessory.name: Evil Dragon Veil
accessory.detail: Evil Dragon's shroud, dyed with its blood. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Brunhilde
story:
Brunhilde

Brunhilde was born to a human mother and dragon father who both fought to the last to save her. She has the form of a human with the powers of a dragon, and she is being closely watched by the gods since she is the only one who has the power to defeat them.

accessory.name: Hidden Fangs
accessory.detail: Mementos of her father given by her mother. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Brunhilde, Sky General
story:
Brunhilde the Sky General

A female knight who serves the gods, with the power of a dragon in a human body. Her power is now used by the gods to manage other apostles and dragons. She is actually waiting for a chance to turn on the gods to avenge her parents.

accessory.name: Bared Fangs
accessory.detail: The obedient dragon hides her fangs. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Amagi
story:
Amagi

18th successor to the throne of the land of Zipang. Amagi's talents and beauty are a match for the First Empress of old, and the people love Amagi too. Proposals come daily from princes across the lands, but there is one issue - Amagi is a man.

accessory.name: Sash of Duality
accessory.detail: A sash for bringing out one's femininity. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Amagi, Lustrous Ruler
story:
Amagi the Lustrous Ruler 

The throne of the land of Zipang has traditionally been held by a woman, and Amagi has hidden the fact he is a man to become the 18th ruler. He now aims to act more and more like a woman, but this desire only seals his fate - the same as the First Empress.

accessory.name: Girdle of Duality
accessory.detail: Wearing it brings out one's accepted form. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Maxwell
story:
Maxwell

A youth from the dragon tribe - those who predict the appearance of the First Dragon at the end of each age. Having discovered the existence of a shadow that seems to be controlling the First Dragon, he leaves the village to uncover the truth.

accessory.name: Crying Hatchling
accessory.detail: A just born baby. Extremely light. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maxwell, Elder
story:
The Elder Maxwell

An observer who has traveled for thousands of years to find the shadow controlling the First Dragon. Having seen the role his line has played, he now sees they are only one faction, and the shadowy presence is the true observer of everything.

accessory.name: Crying Bird
accessory.detail: Notable weight gain, a sign of rapid growth. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Sky Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Sky Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nA rare spirit that just suddenly came into being. It's a bit lazier than other spirits.

name: Festive Spirit (EFusion)
story:
Festive Spirit (EFusion)

[FF1493]Evolution Fusion[-]\nA rare spirit that was suddenly created on a holy night. It's a bit more excitable than other spirits.

name: Snake Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Snake Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nA rare spirit that was suddenly created at the start of a new year. It's a bit more celebratory than other spirits.

name: Evil Spirit (Big Success)
story:
Evil Spirit (B. Success)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion / Big Success[-]\nA slightly evil spirit that for some reason just broke bad. Works her wickedness when used as an enhancer to ensure big or huge success.

name: Lucia
story:
Lucia

A noble adventurer seeking the "Dengeki Game App" magazine said to be somewhere in the world. This powerful publication is said to contain all the secrets of this world, and she hopes to use it to find out what the dragons want.

name: Lisha
story:
Lisha

A magical swordswoman who uses the secret power of "Famitsu" to hunt dragons. The primary ability of this power is a "third eye" that can divine truth, and as the 832nd master of this power, Lisha is also the youngest to ever obtain it.

name: Rabby, Crimson Knight
story:
Rabby the Crimson Knight 

A youth who slays dragons in order to protect as many people as he can. The war between dragons and humans is accelerating, threatening to engulf the entire continent, yet Rabby still doesn't run away. He remains in the land of the woman he once loved.

accessory.name: Red Feather++
accessory.detail: The feather sways and brings in the spring. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Karl, Blue Knight
story:
Karl the Blue Knight

Long ago, there was a story about two beautiful twin princesses with lovely singing voices. The people called them Sea Princesses, but one of them lost her voice. She cried every day, until a small fairy called Cthulu appeared before her.

accessory.name: Waterguard Pen++
accessory.detail: The pen flows, writing down all that he sees. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Aleksy, Golden Knight
story:
Aleksy the Golden Knight 

Aleksy has grown into a fine defender of the Knight King. As he continues to fight dragons with the Knight King and his allies, he passes close to his home village and learns of a strange disease afflicting it, so he hurries homeward.

accessory.name: Musketeer Talisman++
accessory.detail: A hope that the three will someday reunite. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Viktor, Black Knight
story:
Viktor the Black Knight

Viktor, finally tracking down Erving after his disappearance from the village, is faced with a terrible sight. He was travelling with Ludmilla and Sigmund. Viktor saw him with them, saw him smiling for the first time, and something inside him snapped.

accessory.name: Lavender Scarf++
accessory.detail: A lavender scent imbues the fabric. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yuri, White Knight
story:
Yuri the White Knight 

Through his research into dragon ecology, Yuli finally captures an injured Bahammut. After learning of an evil cook on a rampage to obtain the prized meat of this beast, he approaches a female chef for assistance.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Helm++
accessory.detail: Doesn't look great, but give it a chance. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Aaron, Crimson Spear
story:
Aaron the Crimson Spear 

By the time he arrived, the warrior who led them was already dead - an injured Rabby at her side. The gruesome scene was dominated by the lead dragon and the arrow protruding from its lifeless head. Aaron wept for the sheer violence on display.

accessory.name: Red Bangle++
accessory.detail: The faded color shows the wearer's loyalty. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Leonard, Blue Spear
story:
Leonard the Blue Spear 

Leonard was glad that the surviving mercenaries made it out. Attacking a nest near the village, they had been routed by an unexpected number of dragons. They would only cause more damage if left unchecked, so the only option was to blow up the nest.

accessory.name: Seabreeze Headguard++
accessory.detail: An item that has long protected Leonid. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rolan. Golden Spear
story:
Rolan the Golden Spear 

Rolan still gives his all for the Knight King - now hated by the people. With Angelica and Aleksy dead, Rolan is sure he is the only one who can guard the King's back. He thwarts any who attack him, be they man, beast or dragon.

accessory.name: Guard's Spaulder++
accessory.detail: A symbol of a very determined will. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Erving, Black Spear
story:
Erving the Black Spear
It seemed like any another day. In the instant Erving laughed at the bickering between Sigmund and Ludmilla, two shadows attacked from the forest. One was a white-haired military man with an unfamiliar weapon, and the other was his friend Viktor.

accessory.name: Captain's Belt++
accessory.detail: Hard to remove once fastened. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Igor, White Spear
story:
Igor the White Spear

Igor killed more than 3000 Bahammut, making him widely known as a hunter. He carried out the forbidden hunting of dragons with no fear of reprisals, but one day he received a challenge - not to a feat of arms, but in the arena of his true calling, cookery.

accessory.name: Bahamutton Roast++
accessory.detail: The trick is to char it ever so slightly. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Anastasia, Crimson Bow
story:
Anastasia the Crimson Bow

Her tough training has made Anastasia strong and smart. Now she has a decision to make. The wounded comrade collapsed at her feet, or the dragon charging to attack her? Draw her bow, or retreat in fear? Her choice was an obvious one.

accessory.name: Red Ring++
accessory.detail: Vermillion memories glitter in the light. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Anya, Blue Bow
story:
Anya the Blue Bow

Anya hopes to re-forge her bonds with the land of Zipang. They once worked to solve the dragon problem together, but that path has now closed for her. She struggles to reopen it as quickly as she can while the dragons continue to cause more damage.

accessory.name: Foreign Amulet++
accessory.detail: The gem's color has changed with time. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Eleonora. Golden Bow
story:
Eleonora the Golden Bow 

A warrior who left the man she loved and raises his children alone. Struggling with quadruplets, her cheerful nature remains unchanged. This earns the support of those around her, but she secretly weeps for her loss each night.

accessory.name: Locket of Parting++
accessory.detail: The locket will never be opened again. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ludmilla, Black Bow
story:
Ludmilla the Black Bow

Travels with a lancer from her village. The two plan to research the Dragoturn Sickness, a fearsome disease that turns people into dragons. What Ludmilla hates about it most is that it also takes the victim's memories.

accessory.name: Purple Hair Clip++
accessory.detail: Given with love by Sigmund one day. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Eva, White Bow
story:
Eva the White Bow

Now training in the distant east, Eva receives a request to stop the rampage of her former comrade, Igor. Those who stray from the true path must be punished. Eva challenges him, in the traditions of the east, a cooking battle.

accessory.name: Cold Leekle Soup++
accessory.detail: The trick is to heat, cool, reheat, recool. [5ef5f7]+350[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Carrol, Crimson Wizard
story:
Carrol the Crimson Wizard 

Carrol has cast aside his former allies and now travels alone. There was no sin in staying in one same place, believing in allies, and weeping for them - but that time is gone. Strong of heart, he sets out to find somewhere he is needed.
cutin: This will be a sure hit!
This will be a sure hit!

accessory.name: Red Spell Book++
accessory.detail: An irreplaceable tome he takes everywhere. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kirill, Blue Wizard
story:
Kirill the Blue Wizard 

Kirill has grown powerful. Too busy to hunt dragons, and out of touch with Leonard for years, his friend suddenly pays him a visit. They share only a few words, but the reaffirmation of their friendship made Kirill smile.

accessory.name: Wavecrash Gloves++
accessory.detail: For Cyril, the finest and worst gloves ever. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Burckhardt, Golden W.
story:
Burckhardt the Golden Wizard 

Burckhardt finally reached the Holy Kingdom after decades of travelling, but it was already a wasteland - devoid of all life. Burckhardt collapsed to his knees in shock, and then heard a cat-like laugh behind him.

accessory.name: Incomplete Map++
accessory.detail: Will it lead to hope or the mouth of evil? [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Sigmund, Black Wizard
story:
Sigmund the Black Wizard 

A youth afflicted by Dragoturn Sickness. It starts with intense pain and scales spreading across the body. This kills most victims, but in some cases the scales fall off and they turn into a full dragon. This marks the end of the Dragoturn Sickness.

accessory.name: Black Dragon Cure++
accessory.detail: Prolonged use may lead to dragonization. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Effim, White Wizard
story:
Effim the White Wizard

A youth seeking the valley where humans and dragons live together. He hopes to find his own dragon to ride. Texts say the valley was wiped out years ago, but a letter from his father suggests it was simply relocated to the very town in which Effim lives.

accessory.name: Dragon Wing Shard++
accessory.detail: A symbol of hope for peaceful coexistence. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Sakura, Blazing Blade
story:
Sakura the Blazing Blade

Sakura now has her own dojo with many students under her strict tutelage. She is equally strict with the two children she had with Nijo, and her anger (rooted in kindness) can be heard echoing throughout the dojo.

accessory.name: Ornament of Trials++
accessory.detail: A strong woman does not wait; she takes. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kasumi, Still Waters
story:
Kasumi the Still Waters 

The land of Zipang has long rejected interaction with the outside world, but Kasumi advocates reopening their borders. Many of the supplies from overseas were used to defeat dragons, but now those supply lines have been cut.

accessory.name: Blue Hair Clip++
accessory.detail: A symbol of friendship that crosses borders. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Tsubaki, Heaven Bright
story:
Tsubaki the Heaven Bright 

Coming from the bloodline of the legendary chef, Tsubaki continues to protect the human world as the Chef of Light. His cooking brings people vigor and hope, and he dreams of saving Himeji, who has now fallen into the ways of darkness.

accessory.name: Mythic Chopsticks++
accessory.detail: A certain bowl sapped them of their powers. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ayame, Shaded Circle
story:
Ayame the Shaded Circle 

Ayame continues to kill dragons as an assassin of the land of Zipang. While waiting for Type Zero to return to her, she has polished her cooking skills up to a reasonable level. The dream of his return motivates her to live on.

accessory.name: Homemade Rice Ball++
accessory.detail: Ayame's homemade rice ball. Full of love. [5ef5f7]+10%[-] chance of First Strike.

name: Botan, Shadowless Blade
story:
Botan the Shadowless Blade

Having betrayed her village in an attempt to wipe it out, the villagers realize it’s too dangerous for her to remain alive. Having become completely self-aware, she turns on her former comrades and no longer tries to hide her insanity.

accessory.name: Bloody Peony++
accessory.detail: Only Botan is able to see this white flower. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Nijo, Dragon Flame
story:
Nijo the Dragon Flame 

Hearing the town in which his wife and children live was wiped out by dragons, Nijo hurries home. With more than 300 dragons involved, the samurai and bushi couldn't do a thing. Seeing his home, the dojo, burn, Nijo collapses in anguish.

accessory.name: Headband of Trials++
accessory.detail: Makes him think of his home and mother. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Nanao, Dragon Water
story:
Nanao the Dragon Water

Nanao is the young head of Water Village. Capable of swiftly leading his allies to take out any dragon that appears in the vicinity, he has yet to overcome his fear from the past.  This makes him very strict with those who underestimate dragons.

accessory.name: Charm of Mists++
accessory.detail: The charm protects, and so do the people. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Himeji, Dragon Flash
story:
Himeji the Dragon Flash

Himeji continues to cast people into despair as the Chef of Darkness. Those who eat his food sink into anxiety and uncertainty. However, its real terror is that it is also terribly addictive. Still dreams of using his cooking to captivate Tsubaki.

accessory.name: Mythic Bowl++
accessory.detail: A pair of chopsticks took away its powers. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Wakamatsu, Dragon S.
story:
Wakamatsu the Dragon Scale

Wakamatsu has succeeded in stealing a dragon trained by Matsue. With that dragon, he will not only be able to return to his home, he might also be rewarded for his unique success. Filled with happiness, he takes to the skies.

accessory.name: Black Collar++
accessory.detail: The dragon silently awaits its moment. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Matsue, Dragon Knight
story:
Matsue the Dragon Knight

A youth from the land of Zipang. After long years of interacting with dragons, he has come to learn that they have emotions. The only dragon he was unable to tame was stolen. Taking the rest along with him, he now leaves the land of Zipang behind.

accessory.name: Dragongrass Whistle++
accessory.detail: It’s sound can soothe the user as well. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Haruna, Flame Empress
story:
Haruna the Flame Empress 

Haruna was once one of the Blue Flame Snipers, fighting alongside Ise. She protected Ise with all her might for the sake of this moment - the moment in which the two of them could fight.

accessory.name: Red Feather Helm++
accessory.detail: Ise turned it into a crimson grave marker. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ise, Water Empress
story:
Ise the Water Empress

Ise avoided Haruna’s shot by just a hair’s breadth. Seeing the intent and conviction behind the arrow, she replies in kind. Peering over the defeated Haruna, she stays her hand. Ise turns and leaves their past glory days behind as she walks away.

accessory.name: Blue Feather Helm++
accessory.detail: Haruna saw it as an azure target to hit. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mikasa, Light Empress
story:
Mikasa the Light Empress 

Struggling to resist the Dragoturn Sickness, Mikasa awaits her three friends in the promised spot. She wanted to discuss with them the orders from the First Empress - that they must fight each other. But their arrows were already aiming at her...

accessory.name: Charm of Cleansing++
accessory.detail: The curse is then passed on to Chitose. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nagato, Shadow Empress
story:
Nagato the Shadow Empress

Word reaches Nagato that Settsu has defeated Ise. She decided what to do next. It was something she did every day, for Ryujo, sometimes without him even knowing it. To remove those in his way. Now she had her next target.

accessory.name: Poison Arrow++
accessory.detail: Dragon scale poison is very deadly to humans. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Settsu, Nil Empress
story:
Settsu the Nil Empress 

Having defeated Mikasa, Settsu sensed other archers nearby. The forest made it impossible to estimate their position. If the other two conspired against her then she would end up like Mikasa; however, that was not what ultimately transpired that night.

accessory.name: Hair Clip of Envy++
accessory.detail: Offers speed to help one serve their lord. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Akagi, Tyrant Suzaku
story:
Akagi the Tyrant Suzaku 

Akagi burned with a passion for battle. After earning the name Suzaku, he honed his skills diligently while desperately seeking an opponent worthy of facing his true might. He was extremely happy to receive the order to fight his allies - his only equals.

accessory.name: Fire Bird Bell++
accessory.detail: Controls the fires; leads to tyranny. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kaga, Count Seiryu
story:
Kaga the Count Seiryu 

Kaga, ordered by the First Empress to slay the Fire Emperors and Five Archers, immediately started making detailed plans to achieve this end. Deciding to first winnow the chaff, he fixes his sights on the Five Archers.

accessory.name: Azure Dragon Mirror++
accessory.detail: Controls the waters; leads to tranquility. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Chitose, Rebel Byakko
story:
Chitose the Rebel Byakko

Chitose had been expecting the orders from the First Empress, to kill the other Emperors. It was all to do with the fixed number of souls in the world. They had become too powerful, and needed to be culled. To resist would only create further suffering.
cutin: I can see you, you know.

accessory.name: White Tiger Band++
accessory.detail: Controls all light; leads to hope. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ryujo, Master Genbu
story:
Ryujo the Master Genbu  

Ryujo resists the oncoming blaze and kills Akagi. A report also comes in that Chitose has defeated Kaga. If only one of them can possibly survive, isn't the outcome inevitable? A moment later, a third Emperor lay dead.

accessory.name: Black Turtle Curse++
accessory.detail: Controls all darkness; leads to disaster. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Shinano, Kirin Goddess
story:
Shinano the Kirin Goddess 

The other four Emperors and the Five Archers are all dead, with only Shino, the Kirin, remaining. Soon, there would be none. The land of Zipang was doubtless heading into a new age; hopefully, one of peace...
cutin: Tis the end of the road.

accessory.name: Chimera Beads++
accessory.detail: Controls the balances; leads back to nothing. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Fenris, Beast Empress
story:
Fenris the Beast Empress 

Fenris drinks the pure blood of a certain girl on the night of the God Moon and becomes a full lycan. Her kind nature vanishes, and is replaced with that of a wild beast. That beast then races to get more of the same girl's blood.

accessory.name: Moon Mementos+
accessory.detail: Stole both items off of the Red Girl. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cthulu, Wicked Queen
story:
Cthulu the Wicked Queen

Evil. That was the best word for this fairy creature. Promising to grant the wishes of mortals, she actually took over their bodies. That was the true form of the terrible Cthulu. She once formed a contract to recover a lost voice…

accessory.name: Twin Blue Pendant+
accessory.detail: Without its twin, it is incomplete. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Artorius, Savior King
story:
Artorius the Savior King 

The Knight King lost everything for the sake of his justice. His sins rallied the people against him, and they dragged him to the ground. Still, his heart did not break. His unwavering conviction would not allow him to halt his advance - even if crushed.

accessory.name: Memory of Solitude+
accessory.detail: That day, his love and memory were shattered. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Type Zero, Demon King
story:
Type Zero the Demon King 

An assassin from the land of Zipang who's powerful mind has allowed him to become the first true master of the Evil Dragon Eye. He killed many dragons, but as the price for such power his body started to crumble and flake away.

accessory.name: Secret Medicine+
accessory.detail: Even ninja medicine cannot heal all pain. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Izanagi, Feast King
story:
Izanagi the Feast King

Chop the leaky onion into cubes.
Peel the 'taters and cut into chunks.
Fry the dragon meat and onions together, and season to taste.
Add the 'taters and water and continue to fry until all the water is gone.
A lovely meat & potatoes dish is ready!

accessory.name: Mythic Topapo Stew+
accessory.detail: A is for attentive. Cook meals with care. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Zetterman, Bravest King
story:
Zetterman the Bravest King 

* No. 2.

Giving up on harvest this season, my light now accelerates!
I am the ultimate king of the braves!
I AM HERO ZETTERMAN!

accessory.name: Field Guardian+
accessory.detail: Come rain, wind, or snow, he'll be there![5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: ASMK-2 Beta
story:
ASMK-2 Beta the Destroyer King 

Target's cardiac functions terminated.
181418 error.
181418 error. Unexpected error.
Clearing log data.

accessory.name: Tarnished Tiara+
accessory.detail: Her shattered and scattered memories. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Anubis, Phantom Queen
story:
Anubis the Phantom Queen 

The goddess of death, Anubis, appeared during the Age of Darkness, an era of conflict between humans. Having arrived with her apostles to purify the world, she first brought the dragons under her control. Now she turns her Funeral Spear on the humans.

accessory.name: Cat With No Name+
accessory.detail: It still has no name, and it never will. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Grimdore, Revenge Q.
story:
Grimdore the Revenge Queen 

The wound she received on the night of the God Moon, although almost healed, still gives her mental pain. For the first time, she works alongside other hunters. Amid the fear and trepidation, she awaits the arrival of her prey.

accessory.name: Red Hood of Hate+
accessory.detail: She swears revenge on the moonlit rainbow. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Liveia, Sea Dragon Queen
story:
Liveia the Sea Dragon Queen 

Liveia finally faces off with the Glutton Queen, losing comrades along the way. Her trembling hands draw her bow. She couldn't fire, however, because the terrible creature in front of her, with its cat-like laugh, was clearly her long-lost twin sister.

accessory.name: Dual Blue Pendant+
accessory.detail: Without its twin, it is incomplete. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo, High Queen
story:
Mayu Hojo the High Queen

A being from the future, Mayu Hojo has recently felt her body slowing down. A local blacksmith tells her it may be caused by the low grade oil in this age. Hearing that the land of Zipang can make better oil, she sets off at mach 20 to get the good stuff.

accessory.name: Mr. Skewer+
accessory.detail: In the future, people delight in skewerings. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Chrono, Emperor King
story:
Chrono the Emperor King 

The former executioner who now leads the Sinners under his control against the organization he once belonged to. His new force includes a youth afflicted by the Dragoturn Sickness and a female land of Zipang warrior with the Evil Dragon's Eye.

accessory.name: Chronos Machina+
accessory.detail: Also functions as a normal timepiece. [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dragons, Light enemies.

name: Velvet, Bound Queen
story:
Velvet the Bound Queen 

Velvet formed a contract with the fairy Cthulu, completely losing control of herself. When Ideia finally removed Cthulu from her body, part of Velvet's soul was also removed, taking her powers and memories with it. They are just now coming back.

accessory.name: Veil of Penance+
accessory.detail: When time is endless, so is penance. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ideia, Sealing Queen
story:
Ideia the Sealing Queen

A magician of the Holy Kingdom, who sealed the soul of the Glutton Queen inside herself. She gathered as many magicians as she could, planning to take the magic that stopped time in the Holy Kingdom and focus it on the Glutton Queen.

accessory.name: Blazing Memories+
accessory.detail: Time is captured and fed into the flames. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Le Fay, Fairy Monarch
story:
Le Fay the Fairy Monarch

A fairy of great intellect, born from the world tree. Observing humans out of curiosity, she also sometimes causes a commotion by getting involved in their affairs. Her whispers in one poor nation, for example, resulted in regime-ending riots.

accessory.name: Band of Mischief+
accessory.detail: Emits a floral aroma when it detects fun. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Yurika, Queen of Tomes
story:
Yurika the Queen of Tomes

Yurika's role is to observe and record the world. Preparing for the time when humans will finally defeat the dragons, she records the stories of all the heroes through history. Finally, in the Rainbow Age, she steps onto the stage herself.

accessory.name: Rainbow Pen+
accessory.detail: Can write without ink on certain paper. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yamato
story:
Yamato
A youth from the royal line of the land of Zipang. He refuses to take the path set out for him and instead wanders the world. He seeks recognition as the greatest warrior and to hone is skills so he can defeat the emperor’s legitimate son, a skilled archer.

accessory.name: Borrowed Pipe
accessory.detail: Like your pipe, Pa? Here's me takin' it![5ef5f7]+400[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Yamato God of Blades
story:
Yamato the God of Blades

Yamato was ready to take on the archer he failed to defeat in the games years before, but found himself faced with an incredibly beautiful woman. Losing his focus in the face of Amagi, Yamato ends up defeated once more.

accessory.name: Glittering Pipe
accessory.detail: I don't fight women! Here's your win![5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Valzark
story:
Valzark

Valzark was an experiment of the gods, a spirit vessel created to hold a soul. As that was his only reason to exist, he had no heart. In a certain age, this all changed when met the one who called herself Octavia.

accessory.name: Blue Core
accessory.detail: Valzark's blue heart. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Valzark, Dragon Lord
story:
Valzark the Dragon Lord

The gods did not take kindly to their tool, Valzark, getting involved with some abominable failure made by mere humans. They ordered their White and Black apostles to destroy the thing, and Valzark only learned of this when it was already over.

accessory.name: Core of Blue Dreams
accessory.detail: A device that will never actually feel. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Karma
story:
Karma

Picked up by Seyfried at a young age, he has looked after her ever since. Extremely introverted, she lost the ability to speak soon after being born. She rarely interacts with others, but she often smiles at Seyfried.

accessory.name: Tragic Concealer
accessory.detail: Worn around her neck to hide a scar. [5ef5f7]+50[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Karma, Curse Bearer
story:
Karma the Curse Bearer 

A thief who travels with Seyfried, she has been cursed since birth. Anyone who is near her for too long will develop a terrible disease. Karma herself does not know this, but Seyfried continues his quest to save her.

accessory.name: Tragic Binder
accessory.detail: She has others tie it, as she can't herself. [5ef5f7]+75[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Isabella
story:
Isabella

Isabella was a princess of a country wiped out by an uprising. Finding herself living among the poor, she learned how to survive and protect herself. Time passed, and a royal family took Isabella in. That was when she met Maria.

accessory.name: Crystal Shell
accessory.detail: A treasure handed down by her ancestors. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Queen Isabella
story:
Queen Isabella

Isabella pretended to enjoy her life with Maria, hiding her nature as a former princess. Her ancestor Michael had proclaimed himself supreme ruler, and that was unchanged in Isabella's mind. All were beneath her. She quietly prepared to take Maria's country.

accessory.name: Demonic Shell
accessory.detail: Crystals shroud this unusual seashell. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Fire Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Fire Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nA slightly rare spirit which obtained a body of fire by being burned.

name: Water Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Water Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nA slightly rare spirit which obtained a body of water by being sunk into the sea.

name: Light Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Light Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nA slightly rare spirit which obtained a body of light by being left out in the sun.

name: Dark Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Dark Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nA slightly rare spirit which obtained a body of darkness by being left in the dark for too long.

name: Blaze Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Blaze Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nAn extremely rare spirit born with the blessings of fire.

name: Liquid Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Liquid Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nAn extremely rare spirit born with the blessings of water.

name: Shine Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Shine Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nAn extremely rare spirit born with the blessings of light.

name: Abyss Spirit (Fusion)
story:
Abyss Spirit (Fusion)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion[-]\nAn extremely rare spirit born with the blessings of darkness.

name: Ogre Spirit (EFusion)
story:
Ogre Spirit (EFusion)

[FF1493]Evolution Fusion[-]\nAn Oni spirit that has been driven out of many homes. It's a bit more pitiful than other spirits.

name: Chocolate Spirit (Gift)
story:
Chocolate Spirit (Gift)

[FF1493]Gift[-]\nA spirit that makes the perfect gift, created when expressing gratitude to someone. It's a bit sweeter than other spirits.

name: Spirit Queen (EFusion)
story:
Spirit Queen (EFusion)

[FF1493]Evolution Fusion[-]\nA fun loving spirit that has been displayed in many houses for children's festivals. It's a bit happier than other spirits.

name: Lushi
story:
Lushi

A noble adventurer from a distant land seeking a text containing every secret of this world. Accompanied by her sisters Lucia and Lucy, she believes the tome lies in the Forbidden Library. Can they find it before their homeland is destroyed?

name: Lisha, Tactical Goddess
story:
Lisha the Tactical Goddess 

The 832nd master of her powers, Lisha now dresses to look the part. Her robes are worn by students of her school, with the stitches on the sleeve marking rank. Green is the color of a Third Stage, which only four people (including Lisha) have achieved.

name: Corona
story:
Corona

A young girl sent back in time after an accident in the distant future. Her dimensional shifter, Politan, requires a vast amount of power to recharge. Just when she was about to give up, Rosa appeared before her.

name: Dione
story:
Dione

A tavern in the desert where girls with no memories and mercenaries with no past seem to gather. Dione’s graceful dancing enthralls all who see her. The goddess laughs at how thoroughly she captivates the audience as she continues her dance.

accessory.name: Crimson Slasher
accessory.detail: Cheap human jewelry a friend gave to her. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Dione, World Goddess
story:
Dione the World Goddess 

The gods did not actually create this world. They were born of soul fragments from the true creator, and they act as observers. They were meant to use their apostles to keep balance, but Dione rejects this and simply enjoys the human world.

accessory.name: Crimson Slicer
accessory.detail: Received it after a farewell drink. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Natal
story:
Natal

Natal is an apostle of the land of Zipang and the youngest of three sisters. She grew up happy among the gods and her sisters, and truly enjoyed playing on earth. She honed her skills against the beasts of the forest as a youth spied on her from the trees.

accessory.name: Bear-Cat Ornament
accessory.detail: One ornament, given by her two sisters. [5ef5f7]+100[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Natal, Blazing General
story:
Natal the Blazing General 

When Natal punched down the youth who called her "Master," she realized something. During their fights, he was closing his eyes. She was taking the time to train him, and this was how he repaid her? It was only later she learned he had a phobia of women.

accessory.name: Bear-Cat Ornament
accessory.detail: Still not sure if it's a bear or a cat. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Schelk
story:
Schelk

The Valley of Light, where the last of the dragon tribe live. Schelk was born there - heir to the king. It is said that humans and dragons lived together in that valley long ago, and the conflict-hating Schelk longs to realize that idea once more.

accessory.name: Wind Feathers
accessory.detail: The traditional charm made by her people. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Schelk, Wind Lord
story:
Schelk the Wind Lord

On that day, members of the dragon tribe gathered in the Valley of Light to celebrate Schelk's 50th birthday. During the celebrations, a girl was watching him from the shadow of her father, the head of the Water Valley Tribe. She was known as Luka.

accessory.name: Gale Feathers
accessory.detail: Made from baby dragon feathers; valuable. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Noa
story:
Noa

Head of the Military R&D Section. Captured by the military, she gave up freedom in exchange for a huge budget and subordinates on whom she could test weapons. She realized her fate, and after taking a long drag on her cigarette, she laughed at the irony.

accessory.name: Science Goggles
accessory.detail: Analyzes the makeup of the displayed object. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Noa, Invention Queen
story:
Noa the Invention Queen 

Once, she had dreamed of her inventions making the world a better place. Vehicles that would move around on their own or fly through the air like birds. Dreams that can never come true. Amid clouds of smoke, Noa activates her ultimate weapon, V.

accessory.name: Science Visor
accessory.detail: Also can be used to shield from sunlight. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Draco
story:
Draco

Dracchi Diary Day 105.\n\nI finally! Today! Yes! Caught up with Dracchi! His guard (protect) is always up, but I think the spring sunlight made him relax! This time... he won't get away!

name: Super Evil Spirit (HS)
story:
Super Evil Spirit (HS)

[FF1493]Level-up Fusion / Huge Success[-]\nA super evil spirit that for some reason just broke bad. Works her wickedness when used as an enhancer to ensure huge success.

name: White Chocolate (Repay)
story:
White Chocolate (Repay)

[FF1493]Gift[-]\nA spirit that makes the perfect return gift, created when expressing gratitude to someone. It's a bit more milky than other spirits.

name: Spring Spirit (New Term)
story:
Spring Spirit (New Term)

[FF1493]New Semester (Evolution Fusion / Sale) [-]\nA well-meaning spirit that shows up along with spring. It's a bit more excited than other spirits.

name: Valtols
story:
Valtols

Valtols manages the Heavenly Realm where the gods reside. The personification of rules and regulations, he seeks to realize the world desired by his master, the creator. As he aims for true perfection, he punishes all who stand in the way of that goal.

accessory.name: Headband of Pure Gold
accessory.detail: Made of pure gold, and will never decay. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Valtols, Sky God
story:
Valtols the Sky God 

Valtols allowed no imperfection in the Heavenly Realm, sending all impurities back to the earth. That was his purpose, and that was why he so desperately sought to track down and slay the Soul Vessel that had obtained a fragment of self-awareness.

accessory.name: Headband of Purity
accessory.detail: The stone has been flawlessly polished. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nefteria
story:
Nefteria

Nefteria was an extremely difficult apostle to handle. In the distant past, she was created alongside the Hell Queen to manage the souls of the world. It was only a matter of time before the lazy, rough Nefteria fell into slovenly ways.

accessory.name: Crystal of Cycles
accessory.detail: Valuable godly jewelry a friend gave to her. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Nefteria, Fallen One
story:
Nefteria the Fallen One

Giving up on the Heavenly Realm, Nefteria cast aside her position as an apostle and descended to earth. She didn't like leaving the Black and White apostles behind, but the Hell Queen could look after them. It was then she found the nameless Soul Vessel.

accessory.name: Necklace of Cycles
accessory.detail: Received after a farewell drink. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Frau
story:
Frau

Born with the legacy of her departed mother, it always rains around Frau. This precipitation is the perfect metaphor for her feelings of loneliness and isolation. One day, from amid the rain, she suddenly hears “his” voice.

accessory.name: Snail
accessory.detail: To be exact, a snail-shaped speaker. [5ef5f7]+100[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Frau, Rain Queen
story:
Frau the Rain Queen

O-6 Instruction Manual.

"He" is an aerial biological weapon. "He" is self aware.
*Be careful not to upset him.
"He" is powered by water.
"He" houses a dimensional transportation device.
"He" seeks to fulfill his purpose and...

accessory.name: Snail-Like Speaker
accessory.detail: Gives voice to the built-in AI's will. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Amaterasu
story:
Amaterasu

The Goddess Amaterasu watched over the land of Zipang. Considered a failure by other gods, she actually liked its imperfections. This was not out of benevolence; rather she saw it as a playground to satisfy her hedonism.

accessory.name: Flaming Souls
accessory.detail: One of many pieces of impure souls she owns. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Amaterasu, Goddess
story:
Amaterasu the Goddess

Amaterasu was keen to keep outsiders away from the land of Zipang. It was her playground, and hers alone. She proceeded to separate the land of Zipang from the outside world by placing a Shrine in the eastern sea to be the only portal in or out.

accessory.name: Burning Souls
accessory.detail: If placed in a dead vessel, lives forever. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Beta
story:
Beta

Sealed Specs Source File: No.2082

.Title: The Destroyer Of Time

accessory.name: Time Core
accessory.detail: Controls time. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+1900[-] HP when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Beta, Time Weapon
story:
Beta the Time Weapon

The creator of the world also created a number of mechanical humanoids to assist in the task. They controlled matter, souls, hearts, and time. The one responsible for time was B-02, codenamed "Beta".

accessory.name: Time Core+
accessory.detail: Not of this world. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+2000[-] HP when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Life Spirit (MF)
story:
Life Spirit (MF)

[FF1493]Mega Fusion[-]\nA spirit that represents the pinnacle of science, having been created artificially. Increases the HP limit of the base unit when used as an enhancer in Mega Fusion.

name: Power Spirit (MF)
story:
Power Spirit (MF)

[FF1493]Mega Fusion[-]\nA spirit that represents the pinnacle of science, having been created artificially. Increases the Attack limit of the base unit when used as an enhancer in Mega Fusion.

name: Healing Spirit (MF)
story:
Healing Spirit (MF)

[FF1493]Mega Fusion[-]\nA spirit that represents the pinnacle of science, having been created artificially. Increases the Recovery limit of the base unit when used as an enhancer in Mega Fusion.

name: Seyfried, Thief King
story:
Seyfried the Thief King 

When Seyfried awoke, his right eye was gone. It was clear that the betrayer Eizel was the one who attacked them, seeking the eye he received from a female magician. It was unclear who had treated his arm, or where this ship's cabin-like space was located.

accessory.name: Evil Dragon Veil+
accessory.detail: The blood's pure scent draws the Evil Dragon. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Brunhilde, Sun General
story:
Brunhilde the Sun General 

Brunhilde was a faithful apostle. She obeyed the gods without question, even if it meant her great pain. That was simply to deceive them, and it ultimately enabled her to sink her fangs deep into their exposed throats.

accessory.name: Bared Fangs+
accessory.detail: The time comes, and she bares her fangs. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Amagi, Shaded King
story:
Amagi the Shaded King

Amagi struggles with his identity; is he male or female? Is there any unification between his heart and mind? He first felt the woman inside him stir when he met a certain man in his youth. Now fighting alongside him, they turn on the gods together.

accessory.name: Girdle of Duality+
accessory.detail: One then slowly turns into an Imperial tool. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Maxwell, Ancient
story:
The Ancient Maxwell

Maxwell has finally worked out how to eradicate the true Observer, and hurries to impart this to the Forbidden Library. He carefully avoids the eyes of the dragons and Observer's spies, but his trust in his partner of many years - a bird - is his downfall.

accessory.name: Crying Bird+
accessory.detail: Has grown so heavy as to feel crushing. [5ef5f7]+700[-] RE [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Yamato, Raging God
story:
Yamato the Raging God 

The land of Zipang was enveloped in the flames of conflict between the Regime and the Rebels. Yamato, head of the Rebels, burns with rage to avenge his father who was killed by the Regime and their ruler Amagi.
cutin: All of you! Out my way!

accessory.name: Glittering Pipe+
accessory.detail: You took my Pa's life! Here's my revenge! [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Valzark, Water Dragon
story:
Valzark the Water Dragon 

Valzark is now fully aware that he's a vessel of the gods, and that living heartless is the key to being a good one. He has done so for thousands of years, but was it the right choice? With everything now in ruins, he has no way of ever knowing.

accessory.name: Core of Blue Dreams+
accessory.detail: It is driven only by its programmed duty. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Karma, Compassion
story:
Karma the Compassion Queen 

When Karma awoke, Seyfried was standing in front of her. He had single-handedly protected her from the enemy forces at the cost of his arm, an eye, and... Karma held him in her trembling arms and gave a futile, voiceless scream.

accessory.name: Tragic Binder+
accessory.detail: Those who tie it must do it blindfolded. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Empress Isabella
story:
Empress Isabella

Isabella grew irritated with her plan. She succeeded in getting Maria's father infected with the Dragoturn Sickness, but Maria proved too strong of heart, holding on as the heir to the throne. She decided to turn to her backup plan, obtaining the Evil Dragon's Eye.

accessory.name: Demonic Shell+
accessory.detail: Inside the shell is a deep, endless abyss. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Matilda
story:
Matilda 

There is said to be a ship that sails on the desert. It's name, the "Lost Blonde." Crewed by fearless scum who steal, pillage and trade in slaves across the vast desert sands - it's final resting place of the terrible sand pirate, Matilda Blonde.

accessory.name: Desert Mirage
accessory.detail: A model of the Lost Blonde, in a bottle. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Matilda, Desert Raider
story:
Matilda the Desert Raider

That pretty much covers it, she laughs as she hears of her reputation in the outside world. Her thieving was simply to feed all the child slaves that she rescued. She has no intention of letting this be her final resting place.

accessory.name: Desert Mirage+
accessory.detail: Today it lies at the bottom of the ocean. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Beta type-A
story:
The Weapon Beta type-A

Who is the Creator? Noa began investigating ancient ruins to find out. In the process, she discovered a stash of over 1,000 ancient, humanoid weapons. She was shocked to discover there were also thousands of slain dragons decaying near them.

accessory.name: Standard Core
accessory.detail: The core of a weapon that controls time. [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dragons,[5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Beta type-A, MP Weapon
story:
Beta type-A the MP Weapon 

Investigations revealed that the weapons found in the ancient ruins were mass-produced units called “Beta.” Noa succeeded in repairing one of them, but there was still no explanation about the damage caused by a battle between dragons and these weapons.

accessory.name: Standard Core+
accessory.detail: Very breakable and hollow inside. [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Leena
story:
Leena

A magic lancer who leads the Shadow Dragons, a faction of the Fire Dragons led by Lisha. They grew up together and were friends in school, but that bond was abruptly sundered by the shadow resistance.

name: Lucy
story:
Lucy

The youngest of the three sisters searching for the same special book. Their failure to find the Forbidden Library has caused them much grief. Suddenly, a purple dragon appears before them. For a certain favor it promises to take them there.

name: Corona, Thunder Maiden
story:
Corona the Thunder Maiden

There are lots of magicians like me who tinker with machinery, laughed Rosa. It had been half a year since Corona arrived in this time. Politan was gradually being repaired, and the Storm Day upon which Corona would return to the future drew near.

name: Spirit Flier (Growth)
story:
Spirit Flier (Growth)

[FF1493]Level-Up / Evolution Fusion[-]\nA listless spirit that can be found floating above the roofs of many houses. Easily gets caught up and blown away.

name: Chroma
story:
Chroma

Afflicted with a disease that turns humans into dragons, Chroma was abandoned and rejected by her parents, the orphanage, and even the place where all outcasts dwell. She collapsed in the cold, snowy woods - unable to carry on.

accessory.name: Black Wing Headband
accessory.detail: Exacerbates the effect of dragonization. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Chroma Finstar
story:
Chroma Finstar

Chroma began to feel warmth again, but she stiffened when she realized her predicament. The creature warming and protecting her was undoubtedly a dragon. She tried to flee, but heard a gentle, soothing voice. The dragon introduced himself as Sigmund.

accessory.name: Black Wing Headband+
accessory.detail: Human? Dragon? Or will she choose both?[5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Alicia
story:
Alicia

Alicia lost her parents and brothers when a dragon burned her village. She was taken in by distant relatives and became mute. Living much of her childhood with little human contact, she was placed in an orphanage where she met a certain female knight.

accessory.name: Candy Bow
accessory.detail: A bow formed into the shape of a candy. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Alicia Brant
story:
Alicia Brant

A year passed since she met Phyllis and became inspired by her. The tomboy, Alicia, was returning to her old energetic self. One day, she was to meet Phyllis for their spear training, but deep into the night, she realized her friend wasn’t coming…

accessory.name: Candy Bow+
accessory.detail: A young Alicia got it from her mother. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kyte
story:
Kyte

A bard who took up the vocation of passing the true history of each region’s stories and customs, Kyte has uncovered inconsistent causes, motives, and conclusions in common legends. Unbeknownst to him, his investigations are leading him to an early demise.

accessory.name: Writer's Hat
accessory.detail: Passed from father to son for generations. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Kyte Shutral
story:
Kyte Shutral

As Kyte continued his research into the legends and stories, he came across a disturbing trend. None of the rewritten history contained outright lies, but many depictions of events were clearly twisted with ill intent.

accessory.name: Writer's Hat+
accessory.detail: Time has been kind; it is in good condition. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nicola
story:
Nicola

An alchemist serving the kingdom, Nicola was a leader in the cutting-edge field of creating something from nothing. Living with his loving wife and child and working in a captivating field should have made him happy, yet he felt something was missing.

accessory.name: Flask of Wandering
accessory.detail: Guides one towards one's desires. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Nicola Raygan
story:
Nicola Raygan

Nicola’s wife died after collapsing in their home, her young life burning out. He lost his son as well when the boy went to see and never returned. Nicola grieved for neither, and half a year later succeeded in creating a human soul from nothing.

accessory.name: Flask of Wandering+
accessory.detail: An alchemist friend once gave it to him. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alice
story:
Alice

I have fallen sick.
A rabbit dropped on you.
My dream.
The cards are burning.
A spear pierces me.
But that isn't me.
I am Alice.
You are Alice.

accessory.name: Joker of Deception
accessory.detail: A lie that eventually becomes the truth. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alice, Fallen Queen
story:
Alice the Fallen Queen 

Judging by the above symptoms, meeting her soul-copy caused Alice to have a mental break or possibly trade her sense of self.  Though this is an extremely rare case, security on the texts in question must be improved in future.\nReport by: Chrono Paladin\n

accessory.name: Joker of Deception+
accessory.detail: The self burns; the lying heart remains. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Simone
story:
Simone

Simone was an assassin in the group dedicated to wiping out the Sinners, abnormals and beast men. The group was comprised of Sinners, so any who finished their “sentence” were fated to be killed. In this twisted system, Simone’s next target - her next love - was set.

accessory.name: Love Poison
accessory.detail: A poison that robs one of one's body control. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK..

name: Simone, Love Queen
story:
Simone the Love Queen 

Simone loved all her targets. She showed it by injecting them with a deadly poison from her special needle lance and placing them in a vat filled with embalming agents to keep them forever. The Execution King escaped that fate by hiding from her group.

accessory.name: Love Poison+
accessory.detail: The poison is applied from mouth to mouth. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK..

name: Don Polta
story:
Don Polta

Legendary gunman, Don Polta. With few records of his life, it’s unclear if he even existed. In a tall tale, he was said to have shot a dragon between the eyes from an impossible distance. In another, he bested a Samurai from the land of Zipang. (01)

accessory.name: Wild Rooster
accessory.detail: Tipple of choice for outlaws of the West. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Don Polta, Westen King
story:
Don Polta the Western King

Those are all the Don Polta tales I know. After the last one, “Duel at Midnight,” it’s not really clear what happened to him. Some say he still travels with Marianne, but no one knows for sure. Still, I enjoy these legends during my own travels. (10)

accessory.name: Wild Rooster+
accessory.detail: Goes well with cigars made in the West. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Valk
story:
Valk

Valk was the last of a long, ill-fated bloodline. His family used curses, but it was their creation of Revival Juju which led to their downfall. This forbidden magic could bind souls of the dead to a special stone and restore life in this world.

accessory.name: Sapling of Binding
accessory.detail: An ancestral heirloom made from cursed wood. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Valk, Juju King
story:
Valk the Juju King

Over 10 years since Valk boarded the desert runner, “Lost Blonde,” the ship sails through the desert with Valk, two men and two women alive onboard. The rest of the crew, its female captain, and a large sword-wielder are all corpses Valk reanimated.

accessory.name: Sapling of Binding+
accessory.detail: The living wood has born rock-like fruit. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Ancient Spirit
story:
Ancient Spirit

[FF1493]Level-up/Evolution Fusion[-]\nAn ancient and by now very dated spirit.

name: Super Ancient Spirit
story:
Super Ancient Spirit

[FF1493]Level-up / Evolution Fusion[-]\nA super ancient and by now super dated spirit.

name: Divine Spirit
story:
Divine Spirit

The Divine Spirit had been on a lengthy journey. Its apostles all left, but it continued alone. Eventually, the spirit ceased to move. It forever slumbers in a distant land. With no name or memories, this fragment of life is no longer discussed.

name: Dione, Frontier Goddess
story:
Dione the Frontier Goddess 

Despite being a goddess, Dione had little interest in gods or apostles and viewed existence as nothing more than predestined actions playing out. Her only friend was executed for defying the gods, so Dione felt saddened by her own divinity.

accessory.name: Crimson Slicer+
accessory.detail: The stone changes color with time. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Natal, Inferno General
story:
Natal the Inferno General 

Natal faced off against her goddess and master. When asked the reason for the rebellion, she replied that it was no rebellion at all. Flames blazed as two apostles joined the goddess. Natal stoically prepared for the first fight she’d ever started.

accessory.name: Bear-Cat Ornament+
accessory.detail: She ties her hair, binding her resolve. [5ef5f7]+200[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Schelk, Gale King
story:
Schelk the Gale King

The valley had begun to reclaim its former glory, but now it simply burned. The king was dead and the dragons' assault would surely spread. Schelk took up his late king’s cause and bravely flew through the flames to protect the other valleys.

accessory.name: Gale Feathers+
accessory.detail: One enters adulthood by making it oneself. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Noa, Creation Queen
story:
Noa the Creation Queen

Noa’s fears were misplaced. After being restored by scientists, the ultimate weapon, “V,” used its power to make the world a better place. That was one possible future, but back in reality, with ash falling from her bloody hand, Noa shut that dream away.

accessory.name: Science Visor+
accessory.detail: Also has a function for dating objects. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Valtols, Heaven God
story:
Valtols the Heaven God

At the Heavenly Round Table, high above Babel, Valtols and the other gods listened to the apostle’s report on the Eastern Realm. It seemed as though the gods were unable to hold back these “outcasts,” and it was only a matter of time before Babel fell.

accessory.name: Headband of Purity+
accessory.detail: A godly symbol that attracts no dirt. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nefteria, Fallen Major
story:
Nefteria the Fallen Major

With the power to mimic souls, Nefteria protected the Soul Vessel in battles against the gods. Her wounds proved fatal, and in the end, she cried the name of the Soul Vessel. Holding it tightly for one last time, she passed on her power and her last words.

accessory.name: Necklace of Cycles+
accessory.detail: It shines forever, repeating the cycle. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Frau, Monsoon Queen
story:
Frau the Monsoon Queen

Frau was of the age of darkness and destined to destroy the ancient weapon the O - 6 referred to as “V.” While the O - 6 refueled, Frau stroked his smooth body. Amidst that terrible downpour, their final battle across time had finally begun.

accessory.name: Snail-Like Speaker+
accessory.detail: Made from live parts, so technically alive. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Amaterasu, Fire Goddess
story:
Amaterasu the Fire Goddess 

As her apostles (her three sisters) argued, Amaterasu enacted the rite to destroy the land of Zipang. They turned on the gods, so she would lay waste to them. As she was about to finish, an arrow flew past her. Smiling in rage, she knew who fired it.

accessory.name: Burning Souls+
accessory.detail: The people call such vessels "disciples."[5ef5f7]+600[-] RE [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Hilde
story:
Hilde

Growing up in Babel, the home of the gods, Hilde watched her swordsmith father. Though she tried making many weapons, she could never craft one that pleased her. Then, she learned of the Eastern Realm, her father’s homeland.

accessory.name: Smith's Seal
accessory.detail: The seal pressed into the works of a smith. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Hilde, Forge Queen
story:
Hilde the Forge Queen 

Her late father often spoke of an ore that could absorb the soul of whoever touched it and would change its shape accordingly. The power to craft a weapon that could perfectly suit its user, this was the goal that drove Hilde to the Eastern Realm.

accessory.name: Smith's Seal+
accessory.detail: Her father's pride and joy, and now hers. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Rindo
story:
Rindo

Raised as a female ninja (a kunoichi), Rindo was a highly talented warrior whose skill only increased with age. Despite this, her pride was crushed when a young ninja arrived from a village that had been razed by dragons. His name was Zero.

accessory.name: Gentian Flower
accessory.detail: Received from Zero on the day they parted. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Rindo, Covert Queen
story:
Rindo the Covert Queen 

Her natural talent and diligent training, coupled with the ability to calmly finish any mission, made Rindo the ultimate ninja. Earning the complete trust of the king, her reputation led to her worst mission: to defeat her childhood friend Zero.

accessory.name: Gentian Flower+
accessory.detail: Different paths, both paved with purpose. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Aria
story:
Aria

Born to a line of legendary ancestors, Aria trained hard to take over her father’s role of Knight Captain and defend the country. A leader of men despite her age, she taught the “come back in one piece” motto and cut all who could not endure her training.

accessory.name: Mask of Darkness
accessory.detail: Symbol of a firm heart and determined will. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] HP..

name: Aria, Crimson Lotus
story:
Aria the Crimson Lotus 

Known as the Crimson Lotus, Aria scorched through the battlefield as an unstoppable flame. This power led to her assignment to defeat the First Dragon. She promised her crying brother she’d return in one piece. It was the final promise between the two.

accessory.name: Mask of Darkness+
accessory.detail: Soon, the fire burning behind it shall die. [5ef5f7]+1250[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] HP..

name: Johnny
story:
Johnny

Johnny the Metal Strings - that was his name. He was a smug showoff and impossible to reign in once he got angry or upset. The long range rifle built into his guitar never let a target escape, but that wasn't the only ace up Johnny's sleeve. (04)

accessory.name: Metal Strings
accessory.detail: The suit is mightier than the gun. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK & REC.

name: Johnny, Duel King
story:
Johnny the Duel King 

Caught off guard, Johnny was at a disadvantage. The duel suddenly broke out in the middle of town, and Don took out Johnny’s good arm. Don was quicker, but as his name suggested, “Metal Strings” wore a protective wire suit that deflected Don’s shot. (08)

accessory.name: Metal Strings+
accessory.detail: An eye for an eye, and a gun for a gun. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK & REC..

name: Faust
story:
Faust
