Faust had not heard from his fellow alchemist friend since the tragic death of that friend’s wife and child six months earlier. After hearing rumors that his friend managed to create souls, Faust hurried to see him, but saw a new evil was already born.

accessory.name: Rosary of Impurity
accessory.detail: The other half of a certain object. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Faust, Evil King
story:
Faust the Evil King 

Having consumed 100 souls, he craved more as he left the decimated village. Growing stronger, and wiser as he ate, Faust moved eagerly to the next village - his next meal. No longer Faust, he had become Cthulu, the Supreme Glutton and evil incarnate.

accessory.name: Rosary of Impurity+
accessory.detail: Sin had twisted love into a distorted form. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Kylt
story:
Kylt

The young assistant to the head magician of the Magical Sciences Factory, Kylt was given permission to research his sister’s disease. There were just two conditions: he must clean the factory each day, and he must not enter a certain room.

accessory.name: Spellcraft Remedy
accessory.detail: Medicine made through spellcraft. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Kylt Blitz
story:
Kylt Blitz

Kylt managed to stockpile medicine for his sister, but he noticed that his boss had been missing for weeks. She was normally quite overbearing, so he grew worried by her absence. One day, Kylt learned that the knights of the kingdom had arrested her.
cutin: I will heal her one day.
I will heal her one day.

accessory.name: Spellcraft Remedy+
accessory.detail: Treats a malady caused by a certain flower. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Meril
story:
Meril

Vowing to forgo all sin, Meril became a nun in the convent near her hometown. She underwent severe training that drew blood and tears each day to atone for her dark, secret sin. When the other nuns visited the village, they returned pale and shaken.

accessory.name: Rosary of Penance
accessory.detail: Used to admonish and punish oneself. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Meril Grencher
story:
Meril Grencher

Hearing the terrible news, Meril rushed to the village. She saw nothing but the remains of villagers. A chill ran down her spine as a laugh rang out behind her. She turned to find a horrid thing which resembled her beloved brother. Meril readied her lance.

accessory.name: Rosary of Penance+
accessory.detail: Emotions, though bound, cannot change. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Leo
story:
Leo

He was close to death. Close enough to forget he was straving, thirsty, and alive. Left in the desert, he didn’t curse his fate, just one person. As consciousness faded, he began to hallucinate. He saw a large ship sailing the desert and moving toward him.

accessory.name: Polar Bear Bag
accessory.detail: A precious doll given to him when picked up. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Leo Catastrophe
story:
Leo Catastrophe

About a year passed since Leo was picked up by the Lost Blonde. His trip across the desert with the captain and her crew invigorated him. One day, the ship was in uproar as a swordsman and young girl came aboard. When Leo saw her, deep feelings stirred.

accessory.name: Polar Bear Bag+
accessory.detail: Hidden inside are some important things. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Bonny
story:
Bonny

Today, tomorrow, every so often, fun and smiles! Super transform into a charming girl! No one escapes me! I’ll chase you to the ends of the earth, finish you off, and peel your skin. I won’t waste a drop of blood. I am the magical girl, Pretty Witch!

accessory.name: Flitting Partner
accessory.detail: This strange creature is her producer. [5ef5f7]+300[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Strong[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Bonny the Witch
story:
Bonny the Witch

Today, yesterday, fun and hugs! Dazzling transformation into a cute girl! No one escape me! I’ll shoot your arms and legs then string you up to flay your skin! I’ll bathe in a shower of your blood. I’m the magical honey, Pretty Witch!

accessory.name: Flitting Partner+
accessory.detail: Provides outfits and general direction. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Fire Ghost
story:
Fire Ghost

[Lost Records of a Nameless Knight]\nThe knight faced off against the dragon even as his allies lay dead around him. His hands shook as he gripped his blade. Win, live, flee, or beg - whatever the choice, the massive dragon was unlikely to accept it.

name: Fire Wraith
story:
Fire Wraith

[Lost Records of a Nameless Swordsman]\nThe swordsman had a fine future with a position of esteem among knights, a beautiful wife, talented children, and peaceful twilight years. He passed blissfully in his sleep, an average life now at its end.

name: Fire Specter
story:
Fire Specter

[Lost Records of a Nameless Warrior]\nFeeling warmth, the warrior woke up- surprised to be alive. His cave was hot and steamy with spongy walls. Amid the acrid stench, the warrior steeled himself and pushed on. Time stood still in the dragon’s stomach.

name: Water Ghost
story:
Water Ghost

 [Lost Records of a Nameless Sailor]\nA lone boat drifted in the vast sea. Its sailor had a map, telescope, and oar. A bird landed on the oar, and the vessel shifted slightly. It had been five days since the sailor moved. The boat is still out there.

name: Water Wraith
story:
Water Wraith

[Lost Records of a Nameless Soldier]\nFoul air blew into his face. He completely locked up, his sight transfixed on a single point. Sweat slid down his face - no, tears. “Mother, father, I’m sorry.” The dragon’s massive jaws opened before him.

name: Water Specter
story:
Water Specter

[Lost Records of a Nameless Investigator]\nAn injury robbed him of sight, and his allies fled. Hearing only the dragon’s footsteps and roars, he ran through the grass guided by his ears. Thunder boomed, and then there was nothing- aside from the cliff.

name: Light Ghost
story:
Light Ghost

[Lost Records of a Nameless Guardsman]\nThe castle was impregnable. Foreign traders and emissaries were denied entrance. The gates were welded from the outside. Voices could be heard- the shouts of people unable to flee from the dragons inside.

name: Light Wraith
story:
Light Wraith

[Lost Records of a Nameless Noble]\nWhat did I do wrong? Nothing! I did nothing wrong! I made no mistake! If I did not make the decision right then, then I would have been eaten by the dragon too! I did nothing wrong!\nThe noble's pleas fell on deaf ears.

name: Light Specter
story:
Light Specter

[Lost Records of a Nameless Soldier]\nThe soldier had a wife. "Nice day." No reply. "Why don't you go out for a change?" He brushed her hair, and a few strands fell off. "I might be late today." The cracked eyes gazed out emptily. "Well, bye." No reply.

name: Dark Ghost
story:
Dark Ghost

[Lost Records of a Nameless Straggler]\nThe other defeated stragglers scattered. He had been without sustenance for days when he spied the village. He moved toward it with glee, but he was unable to escape the jaws of the dragon clamped around his waist.

name: Dark Wraith
story:
Dark Wraith

[Lost Records of a Nameless Peasant]\nTalk about bad luck! I was running an errand and took a shortcut. There happened to be a dragon in the forest, so that became my body’s final resting place. I suppose the animals gobbled it up by now.

name: Dark Specter
story:
Dark Specter

[Lost Records of a Nameless Hill Guard]\nShe watched the blizzard rage until the ground beneath her collapsed. She was lucky to avoid injury, and since the cave was warmer than the outside, she settled in for a nap. It was always warm in a dragon’s nest.

name: Inferno Apparition
story:
Inferno Apparition

[Records of a Forgotten Hero]\nThis hero led a thousand knights who would defend him. He pushed on toward the mountain of fire - the peak where the dragon dwelt- then he heard the growl. Looking back to his men, he saw the light fade from 2,000 eyes.

name: Inferno Legend
story:
Inferno Legend

[Forgotten Memory I]\nThese are the memories from a wide range of forgotten spirits. I am collecting and collating them. Yes, I ask - I question - Into the gaps between memories. Yes, I am the tower to which all souls are led.

name: Whirlpool Apparition
story:
Whirlpool Apparition

[Records of a Forgotten Sage]
Day 1: Arrived on vacant island. Leg, injured.
Day 5: Food and water ran out.
Day 10: Dragon ate my left arm.
Day 18: The gangrene is bad. My fever is burning hot.
Day 36: The pain. Help me. Burning.
Day 39: [illegible].

name: Whirlpool Legend
story:
Whirlpool Legend

[Forgotten Memory II]\nHowever great the individual, all are equal in death. The wise lose their wisdom, and the strong fall to the stronger. All power ends. So I ask, "Who were you- what did you do?" I am the tower of departed souls.

name: Sparkling Apparition
story:
Sparkling Apparition

[Records of a Forgotten Brave]\nShe wanted to be brave. Never straying from the path of the righteous, she fought valiantly in all battles and earned a pile of medals. Just before her head was chewed off by a dragon, she saw the truth - she was nothing.

name: Sparkling Legend
story:
Sparkling Legend

[Forgotten Memory III]\nShe was beautiful. She was taller than me, more worldly than me, more optimistic than me, more unfortunate than me, and died earlier than me. I explore my memories and wander through them. I am the Tower of Bound Souls.

name: Abyss Apparition
story:
Abyss Apparition

[Records of a Forgotten Ruler]\nHe ruled all. A girl whose father he killed shot his leg. A man whose wife he executed stabbed his belly. He was torn down by the citizens who hated him. At last, a dragon he had captured closed in on him. He ruled all.

name: Abyss Legend
story:
Abyss Legend

[Forgotten Memory IV]\nThe towers also dreamed. Warriors led to their doom. Heroes who learned they were nothing at the end. Souls who lost their minds- forever trapped. The towers never wake, but forever dream of records and memories.

name: A. the Chained Soul
story:
A. the Chained Soul

[A Knight's Last Memory]\nShe screams and throws herself in front of him; \nthe frightened villagers plunge their weapons into her. He roars and draws his Holy Sword. I must stop him, she thinks, but it is too late--the light is fading from her eyes.

name: A. the Eternal Soul
story:
A. the Eternal Soul

[Memories of the Distant Past]\nSmiling, she watched him train. He grew stronger each day- already far taller than her. He had been just a boy until recently, and sometimes he still had that boyish smile. If only that smile could remain forever.

name: Gamma
story:
Gamma

Caution: Viewing/release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No. 2594

Title: The Ruler Of Human Minds

accessory.name: Mind Core
accessory.detail: Controls the mind. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC; [5ef5f7]+1900[-] REC when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Gamma, C. Weapon
story:
Gamma the Controlling Weapon

Everything made by the Creator had a soul. Dragons, beasts, plants- even the planet itself. Only humans lacked souls. They possessed nothing resembling one. Instead, they had a mind, and a weapon was created to control their use of it.

accessory.name: Mind Core+
accessory.detail: Very, very sensitive. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Withered Spirit
story:
Withered Spirit

[FF1493]Level Up / Evolution Fusion[-]\nA slightly pitiful spirit that has been forgotten. A little less lucky than other spirits.

name: Lost Spirit
story:
Lost Spirit

[FF1493]Level Up / Evolution Fusion[-]\nA suffering spirit that has somehow gotten lost. Has a poorer sense of direction than other spirits.

name: Shultz
story:
Shultz

Shultz became a legend once he drew the Holy Sword, but he was unable to enjoy it since all of its past owners suffered violent deaths. He spent each day in anxiety, and perhaps sensing this, the Holy Sword changed into a suit of armor that covered him.

accessory.name: Cotton Handkerchief
accessory.detail: Given by Isabella, and smooth to the touch. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Shultz, Cage Armor
story:
Shultz the Cage Armor 

Protected by his holy armor, Shultz regained his confidence and achieved great things. He was eventually tasked with guarding the queen. The duty was such a high honor, that he grew a bit anxious, but his new mistress Isabella put his mind at ease.

accessory.name: Cotton Handkerchief+
accessory.detail: Kept in a drawer; has not been used once. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Loki
story:
Loki

Loki researched the Soul Chamber in Babel. Examining souls harvested by apostles and those naturally consumed, he saw that purified souls returned to the world. Whether they ended up in humans or something else depended on the will of the Creator.

accessory.name: Soul-Reveal Lantern
accessory.detail: Sheds light on souls floating in the air. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Loki, Spirit God
story:
Loki the Spirit God

Loki continued to research souls and the Soul Vessel which held them. As a result, he created a number of functional dolls, but the sanctions placed on Loki stopped him from working on real souls. As he considered his next move, the dolls came to life.

accessory.name: Soul-Reveal Lantern+
accessory.detail: All souls caught in the light will perish. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Vira
story:
Vira

Near a certain lake, beautiful singing rang out. The two sisters were in harmony with Vira’s music. She stopped to recover when she met the pair. Vira thought humans to be vile and pointless, but as these sisters treated her wounds, her heart softened.

accessory.name: Jade Dragon Scales
accessory.detail: Only one jade dragon has ever existed. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Vira, Ice Jade Goddess
story:
Vira the Ice Jade Goddess 

He turned slowly to look at me.
"You crossed a forbidden line."
No, I haven't.
"You have had feelings for humans."
Yes.
"You are no longer one of the divine."
That might be the case.

And then the lance pierced Vira's chest.

accessory.name: Jade Dragon Scales+
accessory.detail: No regrets; the scales will glow forevermore. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Jacqueline
story:
Jacqueline 

Jacqueline was the ring-master of the Jack ‘o Lantern Circus, and she led them across the world- bringing joy to many. As she did so, she sought out her long-lost parents. Though she looked like a young girl, she was the oldest member of the troupe.

accessory.name: Pumpkin Invite
accessory.detail: Come one, come all to the great show! [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Jacqueline, Show Queen
story:
Jacqueline the Show Queen  

With hopes of finding info about her parents in the Forbidden Library, Jacqueline brought the Jack ‘o Lantern Circus to the capital. As she walked with a girl from her troupe, the girl’s crimson hair billowed out suddenly. A sea of dragons flew overhead.

accessory.name: Pumpkin Invite+
accessory.detail: Tremble at the pumpkin demon Jack O'Lantern! [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Alphonse, Grieving King
story:
Alphonse the Grieving King 

A former prince who found happiness despite losing his name and rank. One morning, he and his daughter visit the grave of his wife. There he prays for peace rather than revenge. This would be the last time. Alphonse lifts his spear and moves on.

name: Alphonse,  Injured King
story:
Alphonse the Injured King 

Former prince Alphonse was kind and gentle. For the first time, his dragon-slaying lance took a human life. His former commander, aide to the current king, lay at his feet. A spear in his own body, he hoped for his daughter’s happiness as he fought on.

name: Homura
story:
Homura

The Four Divines of the land of Zipang were ordered by the First Emperor to kill each other. Only Homura, defender of the south, was pleased. She didn’t care about the other two, but her attention was fixed on her former partner, Phantom Fist Jikai.

name: Homura, Crimson Queen
story:
Homura the Crimson Queen 

In the lands of her old partner Jikai, Homura sliced her way through his men. Reaching his stronghold, she cleaned the blood from her sword and gazed about. Remembering the past, she smiled. A leaf fell -sword and fist clashed. Their death duel had begun.

name: Jikai
story:
Jikai

Jikai, defender of the east, received an unexpected order from the First Emperor. “Each Divine must slay the others.” The land of Zipang was thrown into chaos. Jikai calmly assessed the situation, and when troops reached his lands, he was ready to fight.
cutin: I won't go easy on ya!
I won't go easy on ya!

name: Jikai, Blue King
story:
Jikai the Blue King 

Eldritch Sword Homura sliced a bloody path toward Jikai. Memories flooded back - they fought dragons together. Known jointly as the Swords of Blue Flame, the irony of the current situation was not lost. He smiled, a leaf fell, and sword clashed with fist.
cutin: One blow is all I need.
One blow is all I need.

name: Kinugasa
story:
Kinugasa

Kinugasa laughed. The fact the Divines had to slay each other was cause enough, but to hear that two were already killed by an unknown third party? Pathetic! He was pleased, but he knew he had to act - the old veteran understood what was really happening.

name: Kinugasa, White King
story:
Kinugasa the White King 

They had finally come to his lands. Kinugasa’s defense was perfect, and he waited with his bow drawn. He considered meeting with them. He was troubled by the emperor’s orders and the foreign visitors, but was excited to see the Swords of Blue Flame.

name: Himiko
story:
Himiko

Himiko could no longer see her future. Looking over the battlefield, she realized that choosing the Divines was simply the start of “his” revenge. Only the remaining Divine would accompany him to the land of Zipang in that other realm. So it’s come to this…

name: Himiko, Dark Queen
story:
Himiko the Dark Queen

Star Queen and defender of the north, Himiko saw a future where she and the Emperor destroy a dragon. After helping him escape to the new land, her vision changed and she instead joined warriors to kill her Emperor and prevent this new future she feared.

name: Kotowari
story:
Kotowari

Kotowari lay dying. He rebelled against the First Empress’s order for all Empresses to slay each other and tried to stop it. He soon learned there was a great deity against which none could stand- he prayed only for peace and destruction.

name: Kotowari, First Emperor
story:
Kotowari the First Emperor

Kotowari awoke. The Star Queen had saved his life and told him her vision about the end of the land of Zipang. All his emotion vanished-replaced by pure hatred of the gods. He took the name First Emperor and planned to bring vengeance to the land of Zipang.

name: Eternal Knight
story:
Eternal Knight

Last Thoughts of a King\nA voice calls for him, and he awakens to find a knight in a mask. His right arm is useless, and all he can do is look up at the knight as snow trickles down his cheeks. The knight pulls the Holy Sword out of his chest.

name: Eternal Vow
story:
Eternal Vow

Distant Memories of a Boy\nA voice calls for him, and he awakens to find his head cradled by the girl. His right arm hurts from his reckless fall. As warm tears fall from her eyes and trickle down his cheeks, he vows never to make her cry again.

name: Artemis
story:
Artemis

Caution: Viewing/release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No. 0352

Title: Controller of Cause and Effect

accessory.name: Mark of the Cycle
accessory.detail: A singularity in time controlled by Artemis. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Artemis, Goddess
story:
Artemis the Goddess

Ranked highest among the Observers who watch over the world, Artemis shared her findings with the gods. She also had the ability to give living things souls. Observing and giving live made her rival the Creator in power, so other gods sought to kill her.

accessory.name: Mark of the Cycle+
accessory.detail: Marks that which is observed, then ended. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Deus
story:
Deus

Caution: Viewing/release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No. 0010

Title: The Ruler of all Dragons

accessory.name: Dragonization Agent
accessory.detail: Transforms soul and flesh into a dragon. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dragons, Neutral enemies.

name: Deus, Wyrm God
story:
Deus the Wyrm God 

The god Deus was progenitor of all dragons thanks to the Dragonization power of his lance. Once pierced, crystals were injected into a body that would transform it into a dragon. Appearing in the Age of Nothing, he turned many species into dragons.

accessory.name: Dragonization Agent+
accessory.detail: To be a dragon is to live through penance. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, Neutral enemies.

name: Ji'Ors
story:
Ji'Ors

Caution: Viewing/release prohibited.
Sealed Specs Source File: No. 0014

Title: The Ruler of Heaven
cutin: This is the will of god!
See the power of a god!
See the power of a god!

accessory.name: Wreath of Thunder
accessory.detail: The crown that controls the world. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ji'Ors, Ultimate God
story:
Ji'Ors the Ultimate God 

Ji’Ors dwelt in Babel, high in the land of gods. All who saw him were burned alive. He used his almighty power to rule both heaven and the lands below. He reduced the species of the earth by half and drove the remaining ones to the Eastern Realm.

accessory.name: Wreath of Thunder+
accessory.detail: Lightning for justice, laurel for blessing. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Notable[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Fenris, Spear Beast
story:
Fenris the Spear Beast

Suffering great headaches, Fenris remained lucid for just a few hours each day. This allowed “him” the freedom to “wound” the girl who could not heal. His desire for this girl grew, and she knew she must stop him. It was then, she discovered “her.”

accessory.name: Moon Mementos++
accessory.detail: Pendant belonged to the Red Girl's mother. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Fenris, Holy Beast
story:
Fenris the Holy Beast 

Fenris starved. “He” was desperate to make the girl his forever. He would control her through fear- a cold smile across his face. Before he could do that, he needed to feed. Biting the flesh of the hunted dragon, he wondered if she was eating properly.

accessory.name: Moonlight Mementos++
accessory.detail: The pendant glows like her love for the girl. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Fenris, Evil Beast
story:
Fenris the Evil Beast 

Fenris wanted it. The most important thing to “her” was that Fenris and the bloodline continued. She respected the will of Fenris to protect the girl- for now. Eventually “she” would become a problem when her deadly “maternal instincts” turned on her.

accessory.name: Shadow Mementos++
accessory.detail: The rag smolders like her anger at the girl. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Cthulu, Moon Eater
story:
Cthulu the Moon Eater

It was the night of the Twin Moons. The Glutton Queen sat bathing in their light as the Sea Princess appeared. Having just eaten, she still hungered for her- cackling her strange, feline laugh. Long ago, two moons lit the night sky. Now there is but one.

accessory.name: Twin Blue Pendant++
accessory.detail: When its owner dies, it joins its twin. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Cthulu, Holy Eater
story:
Cthulu the Holy Eater

Maria was in disbelief. What would it take to satisfy this monster’s hunger? Cthulu had already eaten everything in sight. As the newspaper hawker shouted something about a “Devourer Dragon,” Cthulu only smiled and muttered something under her breath.

accessory.name: Twin Moon Pendant++
accessory.detail: Outside, it seeks out its twin--unfulfilled. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Cthulu, Dragon Eater
story:
Cthulu the Dragon Eater

Cthulu wanted to eat that dragon-slaying knight. His soul was so appetizing, she laughed. She was willing to break with her soul distributor’s restrictions for a taste. Then the “Devourer Dragon” and its “Master” appeared - laughing her same horrid laugh.

accessory.name: Twin Shadow Pendant++
accessory.detail: Inside, it pushes its twin away--fearful. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Artorius, True Knight
story:
Artorius the True Knight 

Artorius gazed at the snowy sky. Alone, he defeated the First Dragon and stood contemplating the conflict between humans and dragons. Nothing remained- no people, no love. What was gained from his “justice?” As he pondered, a masked knight appeared.

accessory.name: Memory of Solitude++
accessory.detail: Those days of eternal joy will never return. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Artorius, Flame Knight
story:
Artorius the Flame Knight

Walking in town, Artorius asked Alan the reason behind his justice. Alan replied that justice requiring reason is no true justice. If reason is applied, justice becomes false- ultimately evil. With unfulfilled desire in his heart, Artorius followed Alan.

accessory.name: Abandoned Solitude++
accessory.detail: A king's memories, imprisoned and bound. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Artorius, Dragon Knight
story:
Artorius the Dragon Knight 

Suddenly, Artorius found himself in a vast, dark library. A dragon girl -most likely his summoner- stood before him. She asked one question. This question denied him his justice and revealed that the battle between humans and dragons had not yet ended.

accessory.name: Loathsome Solitude++
accessory.detail: A lonely man's memory, lost and forgotten. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Type Zero, Evil Dragon
story:
Type Zero the Evil Dragon

The last fell. With the Evil Dragon’s Eye, Type Zero destroyed all dragons in the land of Zipang, but his body was already crumbling. “Let’s go back in spring,” his legs buckle. “The flowers,” he falls, “even your cooking…” - his life lost in the breeze.

accessory.name: Secret Medicine++
accessory.detail: Heals not one's self, but the other's heart. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Type Zero, Flame Demon
story:
Type Zero the Flame Demon 

Type Zero traveled with the girl he once saved. A result of her injuries, she never smiled. One day, he returned from a mission to find she prepared a meal. He ate (it wasn’t very good) and thanked her. She smiled - a summer memory he’d never forget.

accessory.name: Powerful Medicine++
accessory.detail: Cleanses stomach; may burn hole in stomach. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Type Zero, Tidal Snow
story:
Type Zero the Tidal Snow 

Type Zero rushed through the snow to the village besieged by a dragon. Most of the villagers already killed, the dragon prepared to devour one last victim. Type Zero decapitated it and took the hand of the young girl. A winter memory he’d never forget.

accessory.name: Agitating Medicine++
accessory.detail: Cleanses stomach; may cause memory loss. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Izanagi, Cooking God
story:
Izanagi the Cooking God

[A B Cs of Cooking]
Always keep your knife out of the face of guests.
Berate those who do not finish their meal.
Cautiously allow guests to choose their own meal.
Dare to be bold in the kitchen.
Every meal is a chance to prove yourself.

accessory.name: Mythic Topapo Stew++
accessory.detail: S is for sum, of all that goes into a meal. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Izanagi, Ring Eater
story:
Izanagi the Ring Eater

[FF1493][Ring Eater's Menu][-]
Beverage: Phosphorous Dragon's Blood
Stew: Dragon intestines in egg coating
Roast: Sea dragon sauté (head)
Broth: Spiced dragon bile
Sweet: Blade dragon's eyes

accessory.name: Clear Topapo Stew++
accessory.detail: T is for thanks. Show gratitude when eating. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Izanagi, Eldritch Eater
story:
Izanagi the Eldritch Eater 

[FF1493][Eldritch Eater's Banquet][-]
Starter: Assorted dragon scales
Soup: Cold volt-onion soup
Seafood: Fish dragon meuniere, with tiger leaves
Shorefood: Steamed crest bird
Main Dish: Bahammut hotplate
Dessert: Crispy dragon fritters

accessory.name: Murky Topapo Stew++
accessory.detail: Y is for yum, a good response to the meal. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Zetterman, Ultimate King
story:
Zetterman the Ultimate King 

* Side B
Bidding farewell to the shining fields
a heart that will forgive no evil!

Will crush evil dragons with the justice in his heart!
We love heroic Zetterman!

accessory.name: Field Guardian++
accessory.detail: Even the birds love this miracle worker! [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Zettershine
story:
Zettershine the Shine King 

[FF1493]Next week[-]
Zetterman has rescued the souls, putting an end to their endless limbo. The hopes of Mufis continue to light the way.

Zetterman will be back in "His Name is Shine." Light makes shadow.

accessory.name: Morning Guardian++
accessory.detail: Another peaceful dawn arrives in the fields![5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Shadowzetter
story:
Shadowzetter, the Shade King 

[FF1493][Preview][-]

The rising shadow. The swallowed mind.
Mufis's plan starts to gain speed.

When overflowing malice explodes
danger closes in on Zetterman.

Next Episode "Fields of Darkness"
Shadow smothers the light.

accessory.name: Night Guardian++
accessory.detail: Another peaceful moon glows over the fields![5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: ASMK-2B, Machine God
story:
ASMK-2 Beta the Machine God 

Snow--knight--stopped--motion--lance--stab--blood--call--voice--fades----

Failed to restore log data.

If you wish to attempt to recovery again
select [FF1493]"Close"[-].

accessory.name: Tarnished Tiara++
accessory.detail: The tiara will never shine again. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: ASMK-2S
story:
ASMK-2S the Machine Devil 

A human/machine weapon found by the Third Corp. search team. It was flawless and powerful- with no history recorded in its circuits. It was rebooted without incident, but may lose control in battle. We will need to burn circuit pathways if this happens.

accessory.name: Burnt Tiara++
accessory.detail: The fires burned her flesh and memories. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: ASMK-2F
story:
ASMK-2F the Razing Machine 

Repeated burning of circuit pathways has damaged the machine. Once ranked S, it can no longer even be classified as F. We were unable to resolve the bug that requested log data output and returned “error.” In a few hours, it will be permanently dismantled.

accessory.name: Drowned Tiara++
accessory.detail: Deep in the darkness, her vow unfulfilled. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Anubis, Wraith Queen
story:
Anubis the Wraith Queen 

Anubis’s “Funeral God Strike” pierced the heart of the Empire. All functions ceased, fires flared, and it screamed in death. Anubis knew the Empire would rise again, but next time they would not settle for the planet- they would instead aim for the gods.

accessory.name: Cat With No Name++
accessory.detail: Names bind us to our pasts. So, no name. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Anubis, Inferno Queen
story:
Anubis the Inferno Queen 

In the Age of Fire, warriors known as the “Crimson Gravediggers” fought in the first clash between humans and dragons. As the dragons lost ground, the gods sent forces to earth- Anubis among them. She calmly destroyed the warriors and other humans.

accessory.name: Cat With No Anger++
accessory.detail: Not once does the cat show signs of anger. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Anubis, Funeral Queen
story:
Anubis the Funeral Queen 

The Age of Water was one of purity and selflessness. The desire to put others’ needs before one’s own was rooted in the souls of this age. Had it continued, the world would be quite different. A thousand years in this age vastly changed Anubis’s heart.

accessory.name: Cat With No Sadness++
accessory.detail: Not once does the cat show signs of sadness. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Grimdore, Beast Hunter
story:
Grimdore the Beast Hunter

In the lush forest, a lone beast slumped against a giant tree. Bleeding heavily from a gaping stomach wound, it smiled at the girl who was pointing a gun at it. Their fight would end, but the wound it gave her would remain. She pulled the trigger.

accessory.name: Red Hood of Hate++
accessory.detail: The blood of beasts dyes it even redder. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Grimdore, White Hunter
story:
Grimdore the White Hunter

She only remained human when the sun was up, but was unaware of this fact. Being pursued by the black hunter, the wounds she suffered, her nocturnal escape - these were just dreams. Waking from them, she set out for the black beast the next morning.

accessory.name: White Hood of Hate++
accessory.detail: The Red Girl gave the White Beast a child. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Grimdore, Black Hunter
story:
Grimdore the Black Hunter

She only remained human when the moon was up, but was unaware of this fact. Being pursued by the white hunter, her bruises, her daylight tumble from the cliff- these were just dreams. Waking from them, she set out for the white beast the next evening.

accessory.name: Black Hood of Hate++
accessory.detail: The Red Girl gave the Black Beast a child. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Liveia, Ocean Queen
story:
Liveia the Ocean Queen 

The past could never return. Hands gripping her bow, the shaking ceased. Her obsession with the past lead to her sister’s sacrifice. Would she make the same mistake- no, she’d come too far. With conviction, she aimed at the target and loosed her arrow.

accessory.name: Dual Blue Pendant++
accessory.detail: When its owner dies, it joins its twin. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Liveia, Light Sea Queen
story:
Liveia the Light Sea Queen 

An old tale: There was a beautiful princess who continued to watch over the sea even after death. Bringing light to the depths, she guided ships to safety. When the light of man came to illuminate the sea, her duty was fulfilled and she rose to heaven.

accessory.name: Dual Light Pendant++
accessory.detail: A light on the ocean floor guides the soul. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Liveia, Dark Sea Queen
story:
Liveia the Dark Sea Queen

An old tale: There was a princess with a beautiful voice. Even after death, she sang from below the sea to lead the souls of the seafaring dead safely to the netherworld. When less people died at sea, her duty was fulfilled and she entered the netherworld.

accessory.name: Dual Dark Pendant++
accessory.detail: A shadow on the ocean floor calms the soul. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo, Destroyer
story:
Mayu Hojo the Destroyer

Detecting a distress signal, Mayu Hojo rushed to its source. In that remote place, the signal was triggered, but she could not tell who had done so. It was too soon to give up, so she flew off to the Empire to seek aid.

accessory.name: Mr. Skewer++
accessory.detail: In the future, cutesy masochism is the rage. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo, Fire Proof
story:
Mayu Hojo the Fire Proof 

Mayu Hojo was at the mouth of the volcano which pumped toxic fumes into the air. Her orders were to recover something from one of its burning craters. Gently placing a foot in the magma, her clothes burned off, but her body was unharmed. She then dove in.

accessory.name: Mr. Burns++
accessory.detail: An autumn version of Mr. Skewer. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Mayu Hojo, Submerged
story:
The Submerged Mayu Hojo

Mayu Hojo had many orders from the future involving the sea in this time period. She noted various species with many appendages and even round-bodied dragons. Moving past them, to the deepest, darkest depths, she found the sparkling jade item she sought.

accessory.name: Mr. Dunkle++
accessory.detail: A summer version of Mr. Skewer. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Chrono, Time Emperor
story:
Chrono the Time Emperor 

Rain fell as Chrono aimed at her. She bore her needle lance at blazing speed. He fired- multiple shots hit, but she drove on until the spear pierced his belly. Before she could inject her poison, he pulled the spear through and put his gun to her stomach.

accessory.name: Chronos Machina++
accessory.detail: Also shows the year. [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dragons, Light enemies.

name: Chrono, Intruder King
story:
Chrono the Intruder King 

Chrono snuck into the Empire to find a certain text. Based in magical science and stronger than mankind’s older capital, this country could bring even dragons to heel. That was why this text couldn’t fall into their hands, lest the future of the Sinners be doomed.

accessory.name: Chronos Ignis++
accessory.detail: Also shows the temperature. [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dragons, Water enemies.

name: Chrono, Infiltrator King
story:
Chrono the Infiltrator King

Chrono infiltrated the capital to find the Forbidden Library where his old master, the Book King, lived. It was said that none could find it, but his ally apparently had. He hurried to meet her at the rendezvous point, but it was all part of her trap.

accessory.name: Chronos Aqua++
accessory.detail: Also resistant to water pressure. [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dragons, Fire enemies.

name: Velvet, Nightmare
story:
Velvet the Nightmare 

Velvet couldn’t believe her eyes. All the magicians in the Holy Kingdom were being possessed by the Glutton Queen’s soul. Strange, cat-like laughter rang out, and she awoke. It was nothing but a nightmare, but that feline laugh still echoed.

accessory.name: Veil of Penance++
accessory.detail: Penance has turned into eternal regret. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] RE [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Velvet, White Dream
story:
Velvet the White Dream

The Holy Kingdom fell. Ideia’s bold wits almost killed the Glutton Queen, but she and Tactician Loretta (their creator) lived. Mass-produced Glutton Queens escaped to the land below. Her mistress Ideia was dead, but Velvet lived on to finish their contract.

accessory.name: Veil of Regret++
accessory.detail: A personal reminder for never forgetting. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] RE [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Velvet, Black Dream
story:
Velvet the Black Dream 

The age was growing dark. The human/dragon conflict cycle continued and Velvet fought against the Glutton Queen. Killing 62 copies, she had yet to find their creator. She almost thought her dead until she heard strange rumors of a dragon eating dragon, the Devourer Dragon.

accessory.name: Veil of Guilt++
accessory.detail: A personal reminder for never giving up. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Ideia, Liberator Queen
story:
Ideia the Liberator Queen

Ideia’s plan failed. The Glutton Queen’s soul, once trapped inside her, had escaped into all magicians across the Holy Kingdom. Thousands of Glutton Queens would be unleashed, so she could not hesitate. She made the call to destroy the Holy Kingdom.

accessory.name: Blazing Memories++
accessory.detail: If the fire burns out, time will flow again. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Ideia, Light Demon
story:
Ideia the Light Demon

As the woman questioned her, Ideia’s mind raced. What age was it- why was she here- who was this woman?  It looked like she wouldn’t get answers any time soon, so Ideia started answering the woman’s questions- questions about “a spell to stop time.”

accessory.name: Shining Memories++
accessory.detail: The visible fake fire; the remains of time. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Ideia, Cunning Queen
story:
Ideia the Cunning Queen

It was all going according to plan. Since the Age of Water, her scheme to snatch the Glutton Queen was on track. After thousands of years, they finally reached this age. All she had to do was call her. Laughing like a cat, Mary walked toward her summoner.

accessory.name: Darkening Memories++
accessory.detail: The hidden dark fire; the imprisoned time. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Le Fay, Fairy of Light
story:
Le Fay the Fairy of Light

Le Fay watched over the girl. Daughter of the king and worthy of her station, she fell sick. She was becoming a dragon, but she pushed on- protecting people from the capital’s threat. She became the hope for the world, but that hope was soon eclipsed.

accessory.name: Band of Mischief++
accessory.detail: Smell of pansies is for harmless mischief. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] RE [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Le Fay, Fairy of Fire
story:
Le Fay the Fairy of Fire 

Le Fay watched over the boy. He had lost his precious sister, but he grew into a powerful knight to keep his promise to her. He finally prepared his allies to face down the calamity in the capital, but he would soon be forced to make an impossible choice.

accessory.name: Band of Order++
accessory.detail: Smell of cosmoses is for order and peace. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Le Fay, Fairy of Water
story:
Le Fay the Fairy of Water 

Le Fay watched over the girl. She was the last of the dragon tribe and prophesied to take the capital. With her allies and intellect, she stopped the calamity and became the new ruler. As darkness spread, the fate of the land rested on her decision.

accessory.name: Band of Innocence++
accessory.detail: Smell of lilies is for innocence and purity. [5ef5f7]+1100[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Yurika, Forbidden Tomes
story:
Yurika the Forbidden Tomes

Yurika came from nothing. She was an idol created from books and free from her Creator. With freedom of thought and action, she built the Forbidden Library to escape his gaze. This may have been his goal all along, but she believed it was her own plan.

accessory.name: Rainbow Pen++
accessory.detail: Has depicted many thoughts and lives. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Yurika, Flame Tomes
story:
Yurika the Flame Tomes 

Yurika wrote tomes on the Age of Fire, but this became too difficult after a time. She ended up creating five copies of herself, but perhaps because of her original personality, they ended up leaving the management of those tomes to the spirits.
cutin: What did I do with it?
What did I do with it?

accessory.name: Red Rainbow Pen++
accessory.detail: Recorded the history of the Age of Fire. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Yurika, Dragon Tomes
story:
Yurika the Dragon Tomes

It was something that had to continue. She invited this girl to the Forbidden Library because of her attraction to the girl’s strong will. A temporary soul who lived thousands of years, Yurika’s time was ending. Could this girl, Luka, take over for her?

accessory.name: Blue Rainbow Pen++
accessory.detail: Recorded the history of the Age of Water. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Blanche
story:
Blanche

[FF1493]GD7016 Month 76, Waterday[-]\nAt last, we fight the Heavens for the Western Realm they stole from us 7,000 years ago. But why, my Lord, must I escort this vile, black-hearted king into this battle for which I have prepared myself for years?

accessory.name: Snow Rabbit Cap
accessory.detail: Worn to hide an old scar on her forehead. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK..

name: Blanche, Lady of Snow
story:
Blanche the Lady of the Snow

[FF1493]GD7017 Month 3, Waterday[-]\nKing Popol continues to distract me with his devilish thoughts and deeds. He was so kind as a child but, since losing his father, Babal, in the war against the Heavens 1,000 years ago, he is a changed man.

accessory.name: Snow Rabbit Cap+
accessory.detail: The scar continues biting at her soul. [5ef5f7]+1200[-] ATK..

name: Popol
story:
Popol

[FF1493]GD7016 Month 72, Fireday[-]\nThe House of Poplion has ruled the Eastern Realm for centuries, and now we will finally take back the Western Realm we lost to the Invaders from above 7,000 years ago. I will avenge my father and his ancestors.

accessory.name: Blazing Stone
accessory.detail: The fire in the stone continues to burn. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC..

name: Popol, Conqueror
story:
Popol the Conqueror
[FF1493]GD7017 Month 5, Fireday[-]\nThe Western Realm the Invaders stole from us 7,000 years ago is now infested with dragons.\nI hear the people there have ways to defeat these dragons using souls--they may be just the allies we need.

accessory.name: Blazing Stone+
accessory.detail: The fire has not died since the Invasion. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] REC..

name: Demi Anubis
story:
Demi Anubis

[FF1493]GD5312 Month 38, Darkday[-]\nFor millennia, we have prepared to attack the Invaders in the Western Realm, and here we are.\nWe have a Kingforce with us; neither the Invaders nor the House of Poplion can stop us.

name: Lilly
story:
Lilly

[FF1493]GD5682 Month 58, Waterday[-]\nMy big sister is strong, kind, and caring. When that crybaby Popol cries, she's always there for him. Sometimes, I wish she'd take care of me in the same way, too, but it's okay. I'm tough enough on my own.

name: Lilly, Conspirator
story:
Lilly the Conspirator 

[FF1493]GD7018 Month 17, Waterday[-]\nMy sister...the king's bodyguard. I tried to prevent this. The time isn't right for them to be brought together. But, seeing as Fate has other plans, maybe I'll let this be and hope for the best.

name: Pippi
story:
Pippi

[FF1493]GD7019 Month 62, Lightday[-]\nThe 8th Company can't seem to break through the enemy lines, although our attacks do seem to have some impact on the Invaders. Some worrying reports about "dragons" destroying the entire 2nd Battalion. End report.

name: Pippi, Flutist
story:
Pippi the the Flutist

[FF1493]GD7022 Month 77, Endday[-]\nAfter a year of fighting, things don't look good. Casualties in the 8th Company have been low, but those dragons are more powerful than we expected. We need help from the Western Realm. End report.

name: Gil
story:
Gil

[FF1493]GD6006 Month 59, Fireday[-]\nI'm so hungry. I haven't eaten in days. It's dark. I think I'm on a ship. Around me are others like me. I'm writing this in the moonlight coming in through a window. If I don't eat soon, I might never write again.

name: Gil, Pot-Crowned
story:
The Pot-Crowned Gil

[FF1493]GD7016 Month 76, Fireday[-]\nI'm going off to fight those Invaders. Heard they stole the Western Realm from our ancestors years ago. Don't know who started that fight, but I heard there's good stuff to eat there. That's all I needed to hear.

name: Mui
story:
Mui

[FF1493]GD5251 Month 48, Darkday[-]\nI have decided to become a scholar, as scholars are very smart and highly knowledgeable. I shall be the top scholar and be the smartest of them all. \nI shall become a scholar and find a cure to my mother's illness.

name: Mui, Barefooted
story:
The Barefooted Mui 

[FF1493]GD ____ Month __, ___day[-]\nThank you, Mui. You are such a bright child. I'm sure there's nothing you can't do. I'm so proud of you, and reading your diary seems to have cured my illness! If you ever get out, live life the way you want to. For me.

name: Summer Spirit
story:
Summer Spirit  

[FF1493]Summer Special[-]\n[FF1493](Leveling/Evolving)[-]\nBeat the summer heat with this cool-looking Spirit. Looks a lot more chilled out than the other Spirits.

name: Belmont
story:
Belmont 

Belmont is a smart man who has solved many a difficult case, from the Case of the Missing Queen to the Murder at Black Mist Castle. Although he has caught the culprit behind every case, it has  been at the expense of the whole truth.

accessory.name: Notebook of Truth
accessory.detail: Only describes events from the past. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK..

name: Belmont, Falsifier
story:
Belmont the Falsifier

Within two seconds of getting a case, Belmont deduces the truth. But, it is the truth as he sees fit. And so, he protects the criminal and indicts the innocent. It is in his final case, the Dragon King Murder, that he meets his downfall.

accessory.name: Notebook of Truth+
accessory.detail: Nothing is written about the future. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP & ATK..

name: Jeanne
story:
Jeanne

Jeanne was both princess and commander, elegant yet reckless, and the first to wield the Holy Sword that has changed so much history over time. The weapon was not known by that name at the time, but the people heralded Jeanne as a Saint.

accessory.name: Princess Ornament
accessory.detail: Inherited from her late mother. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP..

name: Saint Jeanne
story:
Saint Jeanne

Once again, Jeanne had sneaked out of the castle to head into town, panicking her faithful servants, Noir and Alain. This lack of pretension, of course, was why her people loved her so...but there are some in the castle who disapproved.

accessory.name: Princess Ornament+
accessory.detail: The white flower will soon be dyed deep red. [5ef5f7]+1400[-] HP..

name: Palma
story:
Palma

Palma is the only one of her race in the Eastern Realm. She and her family were shipwrecked when she was a child, and she alone made it here. But the people thought her an Invader and were about to execute her, when one man pardoned her: King Popol.

accessory.name: Hunting Headdress
accessory.detail: A permit allowing her to live in the forest. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC..

name: Palma, Hunter
story:
Palma the Hunter 

Fourteen years after drifting to the Eastern Realm, Palma spends her time in remote forests, hunting beasts many times her size. Though pardoned by King Popol, the wary locals made it difficult for her to live among them, and so she left.

accessory.name: Hunting Headdress+
accessory.detail: She often loses it during her hunts. [5ef5f7]+1250[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC..

name: Gibbs
story:
Gibbs

Warrant No. 0037
Name: Gibbs the Jackal
Crime: Theft, assault
Gibbs and his brothers are partners in crime, but he is by far the more vicious of the 3. He is very likely a Visitor who came here by sea with Zamerie the Abductor.

accessory.name: Ripper Notice
accessory.detail: Describes the acts of this Ripper. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK..

name: Gibbs, Slicer
story:
Gibbs the Slicer 

Warrant No. 0037 (New)
Name: Gibbs the Jackal
Crime: Murder, human trafficking, treason
The eldest of the Jackal Brothers, Gibbs invades homes in broad daylight to kidnap girls and sell them to Zamerie the Abductor.

accessory.name: Ripper Notice+
accessory.detail: All he did was try to free his two brothers. [5ef5f7]+1450[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK..

name: FAZ-06S
story:
FAZ-06S

Magic automatons are never given the ability to think, as freedom of thought may eventually lead to revolt. The only exception are FAZ class automatons, which are part human; but the human elements are taken from former criminals.

accessory.name: Part No. 006
accessory.detail: Screws needed to link a soul to a machine. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC..

name: FAZ-06ST
story:
FAZ-06ST

Automaton FAZ-06S has been ordered to eliminate a runaway automaton. Its unit number is HOJ-021D-- too low a class to have a mind of its own. FAZ-06S deduces it could not have "run off" on its own, and sets out into the outside world to dig deeper.

accessory.name: Part No. 006+
accessory.detail: Once removed, the soul disappears at once. [5ef5f7]+650[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC..

name: Kilma
story:
Kilma

[FF1493]GD4802 Month 21, Darkday[-]\nI have discovered a power kept secret by the House of Babrios for centuries. This power should finally give us an edge over those insufferable Poplions. But first, I must discuss this with Mother.

accessory.name: Secret Plan
accessory.detail: A top secret plan for "Pertinent Eyes Only." [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK..

name: Kilma the Solver
story:
Kilma the Solver

[FF1493]GD5902 Month 68, Darkday[-]\nWe have a solution that will rid us of those Invaders, and now, a Kingforce as well. The chosen ones shall attack from the west, and us from the east. But first, I must discuss this with Mother one final time.

accessory.name: Secret Plan+
accessory.detail: To be enacted by those with the Kingforces. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK..

name: Demi Velvet
story:
Demi Velvet

[FF1493]GD5124 Month 25, Fireday[-]\nI have acquired the power of a certain Guilty King; this must be one of the Kingforces. Even in the Western Realm, you will not find a better weapon against the Invaders, or even these so-called dragons.

name: Vesper
story:
Vesper

Though not a Pureblood, Vesper's fanatical zeal has earned her command of\nthe 3rd Battalion of the Imperial Army. The means by which she won her post have earned her much hatred. She does not care; it does not affect her well-laid plans.

accessory.name: Torture Whip
accessory.detail: The hardest whippings won't wear it down. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, [d9419a]-50[-] HP.

name: Vesper, Tortured
story:
The Tortured Vesper
A little girl begs by the road, her clothes ragged and arms frail. People walk past her as if she doesn't exist. A loaf of bread is placed into her small hands. She looks up into the kindly gaze of a female soldier, who then silently walks away.

accessory.name: Torture Whip+
accessory.detail: Screams of pain soon turn into ecstasy. [5ef5f7]+1150[-] ATK, [d9419a]-50[-] HP.

name: Schneider
story:
Schneider 

As supreme commander and leader of the elite Zero Battalion, Schneider is the most powerful man in the Imperial Army. He was fated to lead by the blood he was born with; the blood that will make him sacrifice all for his cause, even himself.

accessory.name: Empire's Future
accessory.detail: Filled with the blood of a certain person. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-50[-] ATK.

name: Emperor Schneider
story:
Emperor Schneider 

The gods once destroyed the Empire for daring to create the purest form of human: the Pureblood. But now, 2,000 years later, the Empire has rebuilt itself and reactivated Schneider and the other Purebloods to seek out a certain book.

accessory.name: Empire's Future+
accessory.detail: Destruction nor defeat stops the zombie king. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] HP, [d9419a]-50[-] ATK.

name: Heu Risko
story:
Heu Risko

[FF1493]Introduction[-]\nYou have opened this book to discover who I am, but even I do not know the answer. Reading on will leave you none the wiser. But, if you insist on continuing, you will find many trivial, irrefutable truths in these pages.

accessory.name: A Certain Tome
accessory.detail: Depicts the world, from end to start. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-50[-] ATK.

name: Heu Risko, Writer
story:
Heu Risko the Writer 

[FF1493]Afterword[-]\nYour guess is neither close nor far, and not even correct. I am simply a book woven through with words that do not tell a story. For the weaver does not need a story; the words they weave speak for themselves.

accessory.name: A Certain Tome+
accessory.detail: What is written is the world itself. [5ef5f7]+1250[-] REC, [d9419a]-50[-] ATK.

name: Garce
story:
Garce

Warrant No. 0295
Name: Garce the Jackal
Crime: Robbery, abduction
Garce, one of the feared Jackal Brothers, commits robberies with the help of his younger brother Damus. Wanted dead or alive.

name: Garce, Robber
story:
Garce the Robber

Warrant No. 0295 (New)
Name: Garce the Jackal
Crime: Murder, human trafficking, treason
Garce, one of the feared Jackal Brothers, is not as vicious as older brother Gibbs, but he is the more skilled thief. Wanted dead or alive.

name: Damus
story:
Damus

Damus grew up listening to stories about the West from the tribal elder. He hoped to one day see the dragons and unique plants and beasts that could not be found in the East. His wish came true, but in the most tragic way possible.

name: Damus, Trickster
story:
Damus the Trickster

Warrant No. 0022 (Closed)
Name: Damus the Jackal
Crime: Murder, human trafficking, treason
Damus has been captured and will be beheaded in the coming days. We hope to capture his two elder brothers soon.

name: Zamerie
story:
Zamerie

The A. Smith Trading Co., a crime syndicate born in the West and raised in the East, smuggles Dolls,  people, beasts, and dragons...and their body parts. One of the 5 Dons is Rideau; and working under him is Zamerie the Abductor.

name: Zamerie, Abductor
story:
Zamerie the Abductor 

The Empire's insatiable need for soldiers ensured that humanoids from the Eastern Realm fetched high prices. Zamerie was eyeing the Royal Fangs, a tribe nearing extinction. They were trusting by nature; the job would be easy, Zamerie thought.

name: HOJ-021D
story:
HOJ-021D

[FF1493]The Laws of Robot Soldiers[-]
1. They may not disobey humans (excl. outsiders).
2. They may not harm humans (excl. outsiders).
3. They may not defend themselves (repairs cost more than manufacturing).
4. They may not dream.
That is all.

name: HOJ-021DS
story:
HOJ-021DS

HOJ-021 opened its eyes. It was in a scrap yard. Piled all around were lifeless robots with identical faces to its own. A graveyard; so why was it moving? Suddenly, something else occurred to it: It had acquired an identity.

name: Superbad Spirit
story:
Superbad Spirit

This Spirit has been forced into an outfit it never wanted, and is in a very bad mood. It'll play a trick during fusion that will always produce a Mega Success.

name: Stamina Spirit
story:
Stamina Spirit

[FF1493]For Stamina Recovery[-]\nThis somewhat optimistic Spirit has developed an ability to cheer people on. Selling it will raise your Stamina by [FF1493]1[-].

name: Sumire Hasora
story:
Sumire Hasora

Two types of artificial soldiers exist in the future. One is entirely manmade; one is built from a dead human given life through machinery.\nThere are no longer any casualties in war, except for the battered souls of these machines.

accessory.name: Part Oh Oh Six
accessory.detail: A part needed to link a heart to a machine. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK..

name: Sumire H., Steel Lady
story:
Sumire Hasora the Lady of Steel 

She continued destroying her kind without emotion, unable to show any even if she tried. She wished she had never been born.\nBut a message from the past from an HOJ class automaton gives Sumire a new reason to live: to battle history itself.

accessory.name: Part Oh Oh Six+
accessory.detail: If it breaks, the heart will disappear. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK..

name: Oswald
story:
Oswald

[FF1493]Doctor's Log 21[-]\nEvery day, patients are brought in with missing legs, eyes, heads, and even lives. I sit them down in a row, examine them, and replace the parts they are missing from humans--and dragons and beasts, if I have to.

accessory.name: Surgeon's Knife
accessory.detail: A tool for stitching on missing parts. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC..

name: Oswald, Surgeon
story:
Oswald the Surgeon 

[FF1493]Doctor's Log 862[-]\nA knight in blue armor came in with a broken Doll, asking me to fix her using his body as a part. I did so, even if she will not live long; she is a Doll, after all. Yet, she looked so happy as she left my clinic.

accessory.name: Surgeon's Knife
accessory.detail: Saving patients while spattered in blood. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC..

name: Victor
story:
Victor

Fire Valley. The most advanced and militarized descendants of the dragon people live here, led by young Queen Victor, leader of a dragon hunting team called Gurt. One day, she learns that dragons have attacked Light Valley, whose king is her friend.

accessory.name: Hunter's Earring
accessory.detail: A red dragon fang--the mark of the chief. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC..

name: Victor, Dragon Hunter
story:
Victor the Dragon Hunter 

What was once beautiful was now no more in the charred remains of Light Valley. Although Victor and the dragon hunters of Gurt slew the monsters responsible for this act, there was no sign of her friend or his people. Resigned, she moved on.

accessory.name: Hunter's Earring+
accessory.detail: Won it from her father in battle. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC..

name: Izanami
story:
Izanami

There is a legend of an island in the far east inhabited by a single old woman. Her cooking is said to bring fortune to all who partake of it. She feeds all who come to her, but on the condition they never watch her as she prepares their meal.

accessory.name: Secret Seasoning
accessory.detail: A spice that makes all food fit for the gods. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK..

name: Izanami, Seductress
story:
Izanami the Seductress 
A man once sought the old woman's cooking to bring further prosperity to his kingdom. As always, she obliged happily. He then invited her to his castle and demanded she prepare the food in front of his guests. Again, she obliged.

accessory.name: Secret Seasoning+
accessory.detail: No one knows what it is made of. [5ef5f7]+1400[-] REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK..

name: Porun
story:
Porun

[FF1493]GD5555 Month 22, Lightday[-]\nThis object seems to be  known as an "instrument" in the Western Realm. It seems one can use it to make "music" by stringing together sounds into what is called a "song." All very complicated. Well, good night.

accessory.name: Musical Part
accessory.detail: Part of a machine that once produced sounds. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC..

name: Porun, Music King
story:
Porun the King of Music
 

[FF1493]GD6666 Month 66, Lightday[-]\n"Music" is about enjoying sounds, and "songs" are its ultimate form. After many years, I've acquired a few songs. But, I long to cross the ocean to the Western Realm, where even more songs are said to exist. Well, good night.

accessory.name: Musical Part+
accessory.detail: Amplifies sound when worn on the head. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC.

name: Zorus
story:
Zorus

After years of studying these nonhumans, I'm no closer to making sense of them. I just had an F class unit taken away, and now I'll have to do it all over again with this big hunk of metal. Why must I waste my vast intelligence on such--

name: Zorus, Punisher
story:
Zorus the Punisher 

Zorus had his body and soul cut up several times by an Imperial scientist "studying" and attempting to "improve" him. But, he had never lost his pride. As soon as the scientist turned his back on him, Zorus lifted his hammer and punished his captor.

name: Rideau
story:
Rideau

The A. Smith Trading Co. is a syndicate involved in all manner of criminal activity, including the slave trade. One of the 5 Dons is Rideau, who rules the Eastern Seas. All traders are beholden to him, even as he is beholden to the sea.

accessory.name: Book of Names
accessory.detail: A list of everyone who was in his tribe. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC.

name: Rideau. Water-Bound
story:
Rideau the Water-Bound 

Rideau's people were nearly wiped out years ago at the hands of the A. Smith Trading Co., in a plan masterminded by Rideau himself. For this, he was promoted to the inner circle of Big Boss Gilva Apollos, the man he seeks to kill.

accessory.name: Book of Names+
accessory.detail: Not betrayal, but the will of his people. [5ef5f7]+750[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC.

name: Demi Cthulu
story:
Demi Cthulu

[FF1493]GD5311 Month 44, Waterday[-]\nI've been hungry since acquiring this Kingforce. I eat and eat, but I get hungrier and lonelier. But, then I burst into laughter. What a sad man the king who had this power must have been.

name: Seth
story:
Seth

Seth was a servant of the gods sent to bring order to the Western Realm. Upon arriving in a desert with his twin sister, the two decided to divide it into east and west and each rule one half as they saw fit.

accessory.name: Eternal Sun
accessory.detail: The sun was hope. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+1400[-] HP when also equipping Eternal Moon. (Stack: N)

name: Seth, Sun General
story:
Seth the Sun General  

Seth, King of the East Desert, was at war with his sister. She'd always wanted peace; why had she invaded? No answer came as their blades dug into each other. Seth turned to dust, and the sun has hovered over the East Desert since.

accessory.name: Eternal Sun+
accessory.detail: Now, the sun burns. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP when also equipping Eternal Moon. (Stack: N)

name: Isis
story:
Isis

Isis was a servant of the gods, Queen of the West Desert. Influenced by her peace-espousing brother, she had grown her kingdom into a flowering oasis. But now, she was hearing rumors that her brother intended to invade the West Desert.

accessory.name: Eternal Moon
accessory.detail: The moon was comfort. [5ef5f7]+400[-] REC; [5ef5f7]+1400[-] HP when also equipping Eternal Sun. (Stack: N)

name: Isis, Moon General
story:
Isis the Moon General 

Isis realized her brother sought the Book of Gods. If so, she must stop him. Her brother stood before her; the next moment, her blade thrust into him, and his into her. Isis turned to dust, and the moon has hovered over the West Desert since.

accessory.name: Eternal Moon+
accessory.detail: Now, the moon rots. [5ef5f7]+500[-] REC; [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP when also equipping Eternal Sun. \n(Stack: N)

name: Jett
story:
Jett

[FF1493]Do You Need Assistance?[-]
Whatever the job or task, our experienced technical staff and temps at JASON Inc. will be happy to take it on for you! Satisfaction guaranteed! 

Contact us now at:
3-535 West Panzile.

accessory.name: The Five Conditions
accessory.detail: The 5 conditions for funding his startup. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK.

name: Jett, Wolf Lord
story:
Jett the Wolf Lord 

A year ago, Jett launched JASON Inc., an odd-job agency in the industry town of Panzile. Jett has since gone into debt. One day, a man walks into his office with a generous offer: Hunt down the dragons tormenting the Eastern Realm.

accessory.name: The Five Conditions+
accessory.detail: Only 2 of 5 conditions have so far been met. [5ef5f7]+1600[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK.

name: Kukul
story:
Kukul

[FF1493]GD 6955 Month 58, Waterday[-]\nThe Seven Seas?! Pah! A bunch of kiddie pools! No ocean in the East or West can slow down the mighty Kukul! ...Wait! My ship's under repairs, so I can't take you right now! Come back later!

accessory.name: Mariner's Telescope
accessory.detail: Used by navigators to prepare for danger. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Kukul, Navigator
story:
Kukul the Navigator

[FF1493]GD7016 Month 71, Waterday[-]\nThe Eight Seas?! Pah! I can sail 'em with my hands tied behind my back while hanging upside down! I'll take you to the Western seas, no problem! ...Wait! Aren't those waters teeming with..gulp...behemoths?

accessory.name: Mariner's Telescope+
accessory.detail: Usually aimed at the terrors of the sea. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Sui
story:
Sui

[FF1493]GD2982 Month 27, Lightday[-]\nMy entire world is the scenery I see through my window, from the petals flittering in the spring wind to the smell of snow in the winter. A rare illness keeps me indoors, which is why I am writing this letter to you.

accessory.name: Yellow Overcoat
accessory.detail: Worn by a patient placed in isolation. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK.

name: Sui, Lady of Blooms
story:
Sui the Lady of Blooms 

[FF1493]GD3522 Month 33, Lightday[-]\nI suffer from an illness called Floweration, where my body slowly turns into a flower petal and then withers away. There is no cure for it yet, but I do hope they find one soon. I miss going outside.

accessory.name: Yellow Overcoat+
accessory.detail: Her dreams grow with every tear and repair. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK.

name: Ghaist
story:
Ghaist

Ghaist pulled his spear out of the dragon as it fell to the ground. How many had he killed now? It didn't matter; all he knew was it was not yet enough to lift his curse. He turned around. The people he just rescued stared at him in horror.

accessory.name: Cursed Bones
accessory.detail: Binds his flesh to this world. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Ghaist, Cursed Soul
story:
Ghaist the Cursed Soul 


A girl stared at the sky in prayer. She did not seem to see the dragon salivating over her. As it opened its maw, Ghaist thrust his spear through its jaw and forced it shut. The girl just gazed into the sky, trembling even as she kept praying.

accessory.name: Cursed Bones+
accessory.detail: Will crumble to dust when his journey ends. [5ef5f7]+1400[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Demi Chrono
story:
Demi Chrono

[FF1493]GD 5256 Month 33, Darkday[-]\nI arrived in a foreign land and stumbled upon a golden clock with its time stopped: a vessel containing the powers of a king. I had acquired a Kingforce.

name: Kurotsuchi
story:
Kurotsuchi

[FF1493]Playing: Log Entry 00001[-]
...Awake...is...OK?...
Shinano...call...not 
Ryujo...Shinano...much
of a burden...No, Shinano
...right...soul...vessel.

name: Kurotsuchi, Samurai
story:
Kurotsuchi the Samurai 

[FF1493]Playing: Log Entry 48032[-]\nKurotsuchi, this is my final order. Don't think about it too hard. I have decided to end the cycle here. Kurotsuchi, thank you, for everything. Now go. Go and live beyond this cycle.

name: G.S.
story:
G.S.

[FF1493]UNKNOWN[-]\n[FF1493]DATA LOST[-]\nerrorcode=07

accessory.name: Nostalgic Cigarette
accessory.detail: Cigarettes given by a childhood friend. Raises ATK except against bosses.

name: G.S., Warmonger
story:
G.S. the Warmonger 

There is a 7th Pureblood that doesn’t officially exist. Having staged a war in this kingdom over the Book of Gods, G.S.\nhas caught the attention of the other Purebloods. And now, he will kill them along with himself to destroy the Empire.

accessory.name: Nostalgic Cigarette+
accessory.detail: The smoke drifts slowly and heavily. Raises ATK except against bosses.

name: Nia
story:
Nia

There is a desert nation that sacrifices a young girl once very few years to their protector, an elderly dragon. Nia is the 999th sacrifice. She is blinded with poison so she will not fear the sight of the dragon, and taken to the Royal Tomb.

accessory.name: Recalled Histories
accessory.detail: Pictures drawn based on what she hears. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK.

name: Nia, Offering
story:
Nia the Offering

Nia now walks the desert with a knight who is on a quest to slay dragons. He does not say why, but there is a sadness in his voice Nia cannot abandon. She has decided to escort him to return his favor, believing in the light she sees in his heart.

accessory.name: Recalled Histories+
accessory.detail: Though blind, she sees in her own way. [5ef5f7]+1550[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK.

name: Chroma, Dragonized
story:
Chroma the Dragonized 

A dragon gazed at Chroma from its cage. Chroma had been happy to live alone until she met him. But illness had done to him what it would soon do to her as well. She drew her sword. She knew that, in her position, he would have done the same.

accessory.name: Black Wing Headband++
accessory.detail: Living with the curse as human and dragon. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Alicia, Lady of Fire
story:
Alicia the Lady of Fire

The orphanage's children had loved Phyllis, who died defending the town from dragons. Alicia took it hardest. She lost her soul and smile, and now dedicates her life to burning dragons with her magical fires, at once infernal and mournful.

accessory.name: Candy Bow++
accessory.detail: Will one day burn away in her own fire. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kyte, Historian
story:
Kyte the Historian 

Kyte's reputation as a bard was unsurpassed, and now the king himself was to honor him in person. Kyte imagined all the secret lore he would now have access to. At the capital, he was given a warm welcome by Michael, captain of the guard.

accessory.name: Writer's Hat++
accessory.detail: Came to a sad end, along with its owner. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Nicola, Wanderer
story:
Nicola the Wanderer
 
Nicola aimlessly wandered the desert until he came upon the hut he lived in once. The door opened, and his wife and children welcomed him home. Soon, the mirage created by the Glutton Queen would turn to sand, and he would once again continue wandering.

accessory.name: Flask of Wandering++
accessory.detail: Has pointed across the ocean for years now. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Licht
story:
Licht

Licht came from the future looking for his sister, Corona, but the battery on his only means of time travel died upon arrival. He was offered help by a boy named Kylt--the same name as a scientist who is an enemy of the state in the future.

name: Alan, Guard Captain
story:
Alan the Guard Captain 

Alan, his army of 1,000, Luka, her dragon people, and the heroes of lore listened as Princess Maria roused them before the battle that day. A sharp wind blew in, and a dark shadow fell on the city. The dragons had arrived. Alan drew his sword.

name: Cain, Dragon Knight
story:
Cain the Dragon Knight

The time had come. Cain quietly removed the seal over his left eye. The Eye of the Evil Dragon throbbed ominously in the first light of day. Firm in resolve, Cain mounted his dragon and flew to the capital, looking more alone than he ever had.

name: Luka, Tome Restorer
story:
Luka the Tome Restorer

As Alan, his 1,000 men, Luka, her dragon people, and the heroes of lore battled the dragons, an onyx dragon flew at the Cathedral where Queen Maria was. A black knight leapt off its back. Cain had returned to fulfill the Prophecy.

name: Maria, Holy Princess
story:
Maria the Holy Princess

One by one, the dragons perished at the hands of the thousands of warriors gathered to defeat them. Suddenly, a dark wind blew in, dropping off a black knight at the feet of Maria. The next moment, his spear had pierced her chest.

name: Daria
story:
Daria

Daria had been brought up in darkness, blindfolded since the day she was born. She never wondered what it would be like to be able to see, as her other four senses served her perfectly well. But then, her Evil Eye was opened.

accessory.name: Flower of Darkness
accessory.detail: An eerie flower that grows in the dark. [5ef5f7]+1050[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK & REC.

name: Daria, Evil Eye
story:
Daria the the Evil Eye 

Daria ran, for there were those who intended to rob her of the light she had found. Her Evil Eye had revealed a world full of flowers that she took delight in cutting. But the flowers didn't exist, and all she cut were the lives of other people.

accessory.name: Flower of Darkness+
accessory.detail: Only grows in the world that she sees. [5ef5f7]+1550[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK & REC.

name: Gilva
story:
Gilva

The A. Smith Trading Co. is a criminal syndicate that controls all illicit trade with ships that sail the skies, the deserts, and the Eight Seas. The man at the top is Gilva Apollos, the last heir to the once powerful Apollos family.

accessory.name: Pirate's Compass
accessory.detail: Always point to the treasure he seeks. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Gilva, Pirate King
story:
Gilva the Pirate King 

Just as Gilva was looking for something exciting, he received word of the Forbidden Library. For Gilva, the world was his plaything, and there was no doubt in his mind that everything in the world would eventually fall into his hands.

accessory.name: Pirate's Compass+
accessory.detail: Now pointing at Hall of Forbidden Tomes. [5ef5f7]+650[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Varsh
story:
Varsh

Either due to arrogance or carelessness, Varsh had been expecting one dragon when he entered the lair of the fire dragon. He faced six. As he closed his eyes to meet his fate, another Hunter came between him and the dragons.

accessory.name: Hunter's Tag
accessory.detail: A tag given to all members of Gurt. [5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, Ups chain bonus.

name: Varsh, Fire Vanquisher
story:
Varsh the Fire Vanquisher

Varsh was now a deputy of Gurt, the dragon hunting team that had rescued him all those years ago. One day, he received word from his men about the dragon attack on Light Valley. Quickly, he gathered Victor and his own elite squadron.

accessory.name: Hunter's Tag+
accessory.detail: Varsh suggested it and designed it himself. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, Ups chain bonus.

name: Bakk
story:
Bakk

Bakk was 1 of the 5 Dons of criminal syndicate A. Smith Trading Co., and the last of the Wingfolk who once ruled the skies. He lent his flying ship to the syndicate on one condition: That they rid Babel of the Invaders who killed his people.

accessory.name: Azure Horn
accessory.detail: A symbolic horn worn on a Wingfolk's head. [5ef5f7]+1050[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK & REC.

name: Bakk, Sky Lord
story:
Bakk the Sky Lord
