Once, the Wingfolk ruled the heavens, the Angels the skies. They fought bitterly, but at least they were free in their own kingdoms. Then the Invaders arrived, calling themselves "gods." They hunted the Wingfolk and Angels for sport.

accessory.name: Azure Horn+
accessory.detail: The grave marker for a warrior friend. [5ef5f7]+1650[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK & REC.

name: Lilith
story:
Lilith

Lilith is a Demon, the oldest indigenous species in the Western Realm and the origin of Wingfolk and Angels. Lilith is one of the more humanlike and intelligent Demons, but it is unknown if Lilith is her name or the name of her species.

accessory.name: Moonstone
accessory.detail: A moon ore containing the light of the moon. [5ef5f7]+850[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP & REC.

name: Lilith, Moonlit Maiden
story:
Lilith the Moonlit Maiden

Lilith is 1 of 7 ancient indigenous species on record. Each is distinct, including one resembling the dragons created by the gods--the original that the gods simply copied. The so-called 7 Ancients all hate dragons with a passion.

accessory.name: Moonstone+
accessory.detail: There are seven stones for the seven moons. [5ef5f7]+1450[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP & REC.

name: Serena
story:
Serena

There is a land known as the Middle between the sky and the heavens, made up of 5 floating islands. Serena is an Angelic Army captain stationed on the largest island, Centras. Her skill with the bow is deadly to dragons and her hated Wingfolk alike.

accessory.name: Lightspeed Arrow
accessory.detail: This deadly arrow does not miss its target. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK.

name: Serena, Speed Archer
story:
Serena the Archer of Speed 

Winds ensured the Middle never stayed in one spot, which was why it had never been invaded--until the day the wind died. As Serena watched the four islands around Centras begin to fall towards the earth, she heard an odd, catlike laugh.

accessory.name: Lightspeed Arrow+
accessory.detail: Yet, it was devoured and scattered away. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK.

name: Zizir
story:
Zizir

[FF1493]GD6019 Month 56, Waterday[-]\nThe sea is in a foul mood today. Winds are raging, waves are crashing, and lightning is flashing. Know this, young Kukul. If you wish to know the sea, observe the world around you; it reflects the sea's mood.

accessory.name: Sage's Mirror
accessory.detail: An ancient mirror with not one smudge on it. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, Ups chain bonus.

name: Zizir, Lord of Mirrors
story:
Zizir the Lord of Mirrors 

[FF1493]GD7019 Month 56, Waterday[-]\nThe sea rages, Kukul, as it did 1,000 years ago when I told you how the world reflects the sea's mood. The reverse is also true, as all things are cyclical. My own cycle will end soon--but I'll be back soon enough!

accessory.name: Sage's Mirror+
accessory.detail: Usually pointed at a beautiful woman. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, Ups chain bonus.

name: Nikram
story:
Nikram

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 5007

Title: The Servant of the Gods

name: Nikram, Proto Apostle
story:
Nikram the Proto Apostle 

Nikram saw the corruption poisoning the heavens and hated how it threatened to destroy the idyll that the gods he served--the Creators--had sought. The three mortals who had been allowed to set foot into his kingdom deserved to be returned to dust.

name: Velt
story:
Velt

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 5011

Title: The Messenger of the Gods

name: Velt, 4th Apostle
story:
Velt the 4th Apostle 

This war between the gods and the humans troubled Velt, one of the Three Apostles of the heavens. He loved the creatures of earth; yet, he did not want to inconvenience the other Apostles. In the end, he talked himself into heading for battle.

name: Elrik
story:
Elrik

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 5010

Title: The Prisoner of the Gods

name: Elrik, 3rd Apostle
story:
Elrik the 3rd Apostle 

Elrik and two others who had been taken prisoner became Apostles that day.\nElrik abandoned his name and diary. He knew some would call him a traitor for this, but he decided he had a better chance of protecting his friends in this position.

name: Schmett
story:
Schmett

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 5009

Title: The Deluder of the Gods

name: Schmett, 2nd Apostle
story:
Schmett the 2nd Apostle 

Schmett was one of the Three Apostles of the heavens. She performed the tasks of the gods with beauty, grace, and accuracy, sidelining the two other Apostles. And yet... She looked up at the skies above, her eyes full of regret.

name: Zhi'ura
story:
Zhi'ura

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Immediate Classification: No. 0016

Title: The Chained Away Guardian

name: Zhi'ura, Freed God
story:
Zhi'ura the Freed God 

Zhi'ura awoke in the holy land of Babel after her minion finished his task. Gods and disciples hailed the arrival of a new Lord and a new era of peace. Fools, she thought. When I go, so Babel shall fall and usher in a new world with no borders.

name: Alptraum
story:
Alptraum

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 2122

Title: The Keeper of the Endplace

name: Alptraum, Eternal Curse
story:
Alptraum the Eternal Curse 

Trash--people, objects, and books that no longer serve any purpose--are all brought here and kept for eternity by Alptraum, the Endplace's keeper. He is under a curse that will only be lifted if he prevents anything from leaving for 1,000 years.

name: Nanashi
story: [FF1493]AKIBA UNIT[-]\n The main character of [FF1493]"AKIBA’S TRIP: Undead & Undressed"[-] and your personal avatar. A male otaku who signed up for a part-time job that pays in rare character goods. However it turned out to be a ruse. He wound up becoming a human guinea pig for vampirism experiments. Fortunately, he was rescued by a mysterious girl. He works with friends in the Akiba Freedom Fighters to find out what's going on.
cutin: For the sake of our town!
For the sake of our town!
I'm going the way I believe in.

name: Shizuku
story:
[FF1493]AKIBA UNIT[-]\n The mysterious girl who saved Nanashi from his vampiric
Fate. It is her mission to hunt down "Synthisters" humans. It is yet unknown what mysterious power she possesses.

name: Rin
story: [FF1493]AKIBA UNIT[-]\n A Pop idol in Akihabara who's got incomparable beauty, skill as a singer and a real attitude. No holding back, no sucking up, and no regrets! She is now on a commercial for a big pharmaceutical company.

name: Kati
story: [FF1493]AKIBA UNIT[-]\nA Finnish transfer student who is in love with anime and games. She works as a “bar maid” at MOGRA and became a member of Akiba Freedom Fighters. She frequently uploads videos of herself dancing to anime songs. She loves to cosplay too. She has dedicated herself to helping Nanashi return to human form.
cutin: Oh, you are the bad guys!
It's about time for you to rest.

name: Licht, Electric Boy
story:
Licht the Electric Boy

During the day, Kylt left Licht at home as he went to work at his master's workshop. At night, he helped Licht repair his time travel device. Licht could not believe Kylt would go on to become an enemy of the world--but soon he would understand.

name: Autumn Spirit
story:
Autumn Spirit

[FF1493]For fusion and evolution[-]\nThis melancholic-looking Spirit appeared as the sun was setting one cold autumn day. It looks hungrier than the typical Spirit.

name: News Spirit
story:
News Spirit

[FF1493]Gift (Fusion, Evolve)[-]\nThis valuable spirit was born to communicate people's feelings to one another. A bit more open than other spirits.

name: The Masked Veta
story:
The Masked Veta

Opening Theme\nHe fights crime dressed in black / Saves cities coming under attack / (Veeetaaa! Veeetaaa!) / He fights to make the world better / That's right, he's the Masked Veta

accessory.name: Heart of V
accessory.detail: I'll destroy evil even if I destroy myself! [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC.

name: The Masked Veta, S. B.
story:
The Shining Beacon Masked Beta

Closing Theme\nIt's a bright world under a dark star / Protected by another dark star / In every fight and every case / The mask stays on his face / He knows the world's full of creeps / That's why the Hero never sleeps

accessory.name: Heart of V+
accessory.detail: You will never take away our hope! \n[5ef5f7]+650[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] REC.

name: Levia
story:
Levia

The Velbloods once ruled a third of the continent. The eldest daughter Levia could single-handedly slay a dragon as well as beautifully perform songs with her twin sister. This brought her renown, but also the seeds of a tragedy.

accessory.name: Blue Twin Pendant
accessory.detail: The pendant emits a deep, blue light. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Levia, Frost Dragoness
story:
Levia the Frost Dragoness 

Levia's late mother gave her three things: a green dragon she commanded; her twin sister, a weak child prone to crying; and the song given to the twins birthed by every Velblood woman. When the song is sung, all is good; when it dies, tragedy strikes.

accessory.name: Blue Twin Pendant+
accessory.detail: Incomplete without its other blue half. [5ef5f7]+1450[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Kickory
story:
Kickory

The Kickory is the oldest of the ancient species indigenous to the Eastern Realm, and is ruler of the Primeval Forest in the west of the realm. It is a highly intelligent creature, but avoids all contact with species that live outside the forest.

accessory.name: Sylvan Tadpole
accessory.detail: Drifts through the air of the forest. \n[5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Kickory, Forest Guardian
story:
Kickory the Forest Guardian 

The Kickory is protected by the trees and plants of the Primeval Forest, which have developed thought, speech, and movement. They suggest that the 7 Ancients, such as the Kickory, hold the key to the evolution of all life forms.

accessory.name: Sylvan Frog+
accessory.detail: A wise, affable frog living in the forest. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Gilgamesh
story:
Gilgamesh

All that no longer served a purpose--trash--ended up here, where everyone was put under a curse that they could not defy.\nThey feared punishment at the hands of Gilgamesh, who himself was cursed to punish defiers until, he hoped, he was freed.

accessory.name: Discarded Sack
accessory.detail: Wailing can be heard coming from inside. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK.

name: Gilgamesh, Contractor
story:
Gilgamesh the Contractor 

The curse was also called a contract, as it could be freed by fulfilling certain obligations. But Gilgamesh's curse was to punish those who defied the curse, and no one dared defy the curse anymore--until a certain young man was sent here.

accessory.name: Discarded Sack+
accessory.detail: Emits a foul odor. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK.

name: Cupid
story:
Cupid

[FF1493]Hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you hate you[-] kill you.

accessory.name: Heart of Mad Love
accessory.detail: The volatile heart of one starved of love. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC.

name: Cupid, Love Desirer
story:
Cupid the Love Desirer

Cupid was starved of love and so removed his eyes, clipped his wings, and made him her prisoner; and now, he was dead. Who could satisfy her lust? Perhaps this white-haired criminal who was executed several times but would not die--he might do.

accessory.name: Heart of Mad Love+
accessory.detail: Grind, brew, and feed it to one you love. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] REC.

name: Rem
story:
Rem

For months, Rem had been having the same dream, of warriors in books of lore leaping from the pages to fight dragons. To enhance the dream, she had bought the finest bed and even a Sleep Helmet. One night, as she lay down, a star disappeared from the sky.

name: Rem, Dream Fulfiller
story:
Rem the Dream Fulfiller 

All around were buildings and creatures she'd never seen, and people dressed in strange outfits. Was Rem dreaming? But no, the wind passing through her hair and the light making her squint were all real. Suddenly, she saw Luka and ran up to her.

name: Redrum
story:
Redrum

Dragoturn Sickness had caused half of Redrum to turn into a dragon--which was strange, as it normally caused the victim to turn into a dragon or die in severe pain. The partial transformation caused her bones to ache and slowly corrupted her mind.

name: Rosaria
story:
Rosaria

There is a tower with a flower garden at the top beneath a glass ceiling. Rosaria lives here alone among the Dragonbane, as the flowers are the only thing keeping her alive. But, one spring day, she escapes the tower to see the outside world.

accessory.name: Dragonbane Flower
accessory.detail: Has the power to slow a certain disease. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] HP.

name: Rosaria, Floral Remedy
story:
Rosaria the Floral Remedy 

Rosaria woke up to the familiar sight of the Dragonbane garden. She had collapsed the moment she left the tower and was rescued by the knight who sat in the garden. He turned to her with a smile and introduced himself as Michael.

accessory.name: Dragonbane Flower+
accessory.detail: Binds her to the tower for her protection. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] HP.

name: Kagura
story:
Kagura

Kagura had two sisters. The gods had tasked the sisters with governing Zipang, but Kagura and her elder sister did their best to keep their youngest away from the task--not out of warmth, but because they did not expect anything of her.

accessory.name: Black Fire Headdress
accessory.detail: A vow exchanged and kept with her sister. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] REC.

name: Kagura, Black Inferno
story:
Kagura the Black Inferno 

Kagura stood over her younger sister. Zipang would need to come to an end for now, but her sister was in her way. Suddenly, her sister grabbed her feet. Tears streaming down, Kagura aimed her blade at her sister's heart.

accessory.name: Black Fire Headdress+
accessory.detail: Though steely, she smiles on the inside. [5ef5f7]+1450[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] REC.

name: Vlad
story:
Vlad

In the north is an old castle resided by Vlad, who has lived for over 4,000 years. He has been both hailed as a hero and hunted as a Sinner, but no one remembers today. And now, he has abandoned his castle to search for his self.

accessory.name: Bloody Cocktail
accessory.detail: A secret recipe that takes a day to cook. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] REC.

name: Vlad, Vampire King
story:
Vlad the Vampire King 

There are those in this world hunted simply for being born different. As one such Sinner, Vlad knows the pain of being the target of irrational hatred. This is how he has come to defend a certain boy suffering from dragonization.

accessory.name: Bloody Cocktail+
accessory.detail: Serves as a supplement for his blood needs. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] REC.

name: Minato Hojo
story:
Minato Hojo

Unlike the FAZ series of automatons, the HOJ series requires no human parts to build and can be mass produced with ease. Over and over again, they destroy before getting destroyed, their memories passed on to new bodies.

accessory.name: Part No. Unknown
accessory.detail: Isn't used in official production lines. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Minato H., Cognizant
story:
Minato Hojo the Cognizant 

The one flaw of the HOJ series is its overly advanced AI, which has caused them to question their own existence, as well as the purpose of the war they fight. It is not that they have grown a conscience; it is more sinister than that.

accessory.name: Part No. Unknown+
accessory.detail: Provides knowledge, emotions, and hope. [5ef5f7]+650[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-100[-] ATK.

name: Diablo
story:
Diablo

Diablo are demons who were created by Liliths in the Age of Nothing. They appear in chronicles of the Genesis War, where they slayed thousands of dragons with the Crimson Hunters. However, their current whereabouts are unknown.

accessory.name: Demonic Wings
accessory.detail: At first, its wings offer people hope. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] HP.

name: Diablo, Demon Lord
story:
Diablo the Demon Lord

Diablo are hard to predict, having fought both dragons and humans, and even their masters, the 7 Ancients. Rumor has it they are working with a group of mercenaries to take down the Empire, but who knows how long that alliance will last.

accessory.name: Demonic Wings+
accessory.detail: By the end, they are hated and shunned. [5ef5f7]+1250[-] ATK, [d9419a]-100[-] HP.

name: Demi Mayu
story:
Demi Mayu

Hi! I'm M, a super secret spy from the future! I go around different periods in history to make sure important people, things, and events aren't doing anything to change the future. Ever heard of "saving the future?" Well, that's what I do!

name: Demi Zetterman
story:
Demi Zetterman

You want to be a hero? Then here's what you need to do! Number One, you need to be honest about what you're not so good at, and try to do better! Number Two, you need to work your butt off! And Number Three, you need to be good to your friends!

name: Totol
story:
Totol

[FF1493]GD 4984 Month 23, Waterday[-]\nI once had a dream where there were all kinds of vehicles, even ones that could fly! I decided I was going to make that flying vehicle some day. I'd fly across the world to the kingdom where my girlfriend lives.

name: Totol, Lord of Flight
story:
Totol the Lord of Flight

[FF1493]GD4999 Month 13, Waterday[-]\nWhat a great day for a flight! I'm going to fly to the Eastern Realm and pick up my girlfriend in this. It's a bit small for me, and the wings look a bit flimsy, but if I believe, I'm sure I'll get there in one piece!

name: Frosty
story:
Frosty

[FF1493]GD ---- Month --, Snowday[-]\nI went to the beach, and there was all this snow and all this stuff the sea brought in. There was this thing that looked like a big fish, and it had a long neck, and it attacked me, so I hit it back and took it home!

name: Frosty, Lord of Winter
story:
Frosty the Lord of Winter 

[FF1493]GD ---- Month --, Snowday[-]\nI went to the beach, and there was all this ice and all this stuff the sea brought in. There was this person wearing these weird clothes, and he was frozen so I warmed him up, and he said that he can fly!

name: Woody
story:
Woody

[FF1493]Wood Log 002[-]\nI do not know whether I was born a tree or if my soul was transferred into  one. All I know is I was given life by my master who sleeps atop my head, and it the duty of us woodfolk to protect him.

name: Woody, Lord of Trees
story:
Woody the Lord of Trees

[FF1493]Wood Log 155[-]
The season has come when flowers and animals alike come to life. My master is in a good mood and rolls about all day. I...

Oh dear. Never fear, I shall protect my master from this dragon.

name: Dilacroc
story:
Dilacroc

Although Dilacroc was the young king of the violent Razorjaws, he was a pacifist who believed in resolving issues through discussion. Yet, he also trained in combat in preparation for that foe who only understood the language of violence.

name: Dilacroc, Razorjaw Lord
story:
Dilacroc the Razorjaw Lord 

The charred remains of friends sprawled across the ground, stripped of the scales and fangs that were highly prized in the outside world. The air filled with the stench of burnt flesh and blood. Only one thought filled Dilacroc's mind: Revenge.

name: New Year Spirit
story:
New Year Spirit

[FF1493]For fusion[-]\nThis rare Spirit was born right in that moment when one year ends and another one begins. It leans forward more than the typical Spirit.

name: D'Artagnan
story:
D'Artagnan

Everyone who lived in the capital knew the name Duke D'Artagnan. The publishing tycoon had spent his entire fortune for the good of the city, whether on facilities or upgrading the army. His real intentions, however, where unknown to anybody.

accessory.name: Book of Revenge
accessory.detail: A whistle-blowing book masked as a thriller. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: D'Artagnan, Tome Burner
story:
D'Artagnan the Tome Burner 

The Forbidden Tomes contained information on raising the dead and summoning ungodly beings. D'Artagnan sought the destruction of these foul books, and together with a certain syndicate, had tracked them down to the Forbidden Library.

accessory.name: Book of Revenge+
accessory.detail: Brings about a large-scale act of revenge. [5ef5f7]+1400[-] REC, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Undine
story:
Undine

[FF1493]Report 225[-]\nThere is a paradise that exists at the bottom of the sea. The kingdom is ruled by the God of the Sea, and his daughter is the lovely Undine. But, she broke the taboo of rescuing a land-dwelling prince as he drowned.

accessory.name: Pearl of Yearning
accessory.detail: A sphere that shows one's desired object. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Undine, Sea Princess
story:
Undine the Sea Princess 

These are the 225 pasts of Undine as related by Undine herself. I have no reason to believe she is lying. This fascinates me, and I would like to further study why she has so many pasts and how they have shaped her.\n      --Diebold Maxwell

accessory.name: Pearl of Yearning+
accessory.detail: Only one desire has remained unwavering. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] ATK, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Dundelon
story:
Dundelon

Equipped with his giant suit of armor and cannon arm, Dundelon was the strongest knight in the guard; but he was also known as the kindest man in the capital. Dundelon, however, knew that it was his friend who was the kindest in the capital.

accessory.name: Bond of Friendship
accessory.detail: His friend was looking for this purse. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK.

name: Dundelon, Shining Knight
story:
Dundelon the Shining Knight

Dundelon suffered from a condition that caused him to grow abnormally fast. He was soon treated as a freak, and he hid under a bridge at the edge of the capital. One day, a young man named Schultz called out to him, and it began a lifelong friendship.

accessory.name: Bond of Friendship+
accessory.detail: Never found it, but it remains their bond. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] ATK.

name: Kokol
story:
Kokol

[FF1493]GD5151 Month 22, Lightday[-]\nMaster sent me to the Western Realm to look for a Kingforce to prepare him against the Invaders, but I can't find it! Maybe someone in this city can help me. Hm? Mmm...smells good! I'll investigate that first!

accessory.name: K.S.P.
accessory.detail: Short for "Kokol's Special Pastry."\n[5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] REC.

name: Kokol, Lord of Pastry
story:
Kokol the Lord of Pastry 

[FF1493]GD5151 Month 23, Lightday[-]\nThis thing they call "pastry" is like nothing I've ever seen! This must be the power we need now in the East to fight back those Invaders! Ah, what deliciousness these Kingforces are made of.

accessory.name: K.S.P.+
accessory.detail: Salty, as Kokol mixed up salt and sugar. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] HP, [d9419a]-150[-] REC.

name: Halphilia
story:
Halphilia

A corpse lies sprawled, either burnt by a dragon or ravaged by a beast. The flapping of wings can be heard descending onto the corpse, soon replaced by the sound of bird feet landing. She feeds on the corpse, her face as blank as that of a bird's.

accessory.name: Cleansing Feather
accessory.detail: They shower souls that have not found peace. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] REC.

name: Halphilia, Lady Vulture
story:
Halphilia the Lady Vulture 

The harpies are so small in number that each has its own name. Harphilia is the 7th confirmed harpy. They are often depicted as evil because they feed on the dead, but this act allows the souls of the deceased to depart the world.

accessory.name: Cleansing Feather+
accessory.detail: The corrupted flesh is decayed and cleansed. [5ef5f7]+1550[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] REC.

name: Apollon
story:
Apollon

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 1300

Title: He Who Belongs to Myths

accessory.name: Fire-Ice Stone
accessory.detail: Contains the fire and ice that ruined all. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK & REC, Ups weakness damage.

name: Apollon, God of Hope
story:
Apollon the God of Hope 

There was once a village that prospered as long as it followed an ancient custom...until a god of fire and ice commanding both fire and ice dragons turned the village into dust. The truth about what caused this has been lost in the past.

accessory.name: Fire-Ice Stone+
accessory.detail: The tragic result of a whole village's hope. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK & REC, Ups weakness damage.

name: Djinn
story:
Djinn

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 1298

Title: He Who Exists in Myths

accessory.name: Stone of Inferno
accessory.detail: Contains the fires of furious emotions. [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Djinn, Fire Elemental
story:
Djinn the Fire Elemental

Djinn was once a human\nwho lived in a village sandwiched between Fire and Ice Mountains. After extreme periods of heat and cold that lasted many days, the village sent a young couple to the gods of the mountains to appease them.

accessory.name: Stone of Inferno+
accessory.detail: He lives on in legends as an avatar. [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Shiva
story:
Shiva

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 1299

Title: She Who Sleeps in Myths

accessory.name: Stone of Crystals
accessory.detail: Contains the ice of sorrowful emotions. [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Shiva, Ice Elemental
story:
Shiva the Ice Elemental

Shiva was once a human. When her village suffered the wrath of the gods of Fire and Ice Mountains, they sent her and her brother to the gods to appease them, as dictated by ancient custom--but they did not know of the child she bore.

accessory.name: Stone of Crystals+
accessory.detail: She remains imprisoned in legends. [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alpha
story:
Alpha

Warning: Access and release prohibited.
Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 2001

Title: He Who Shall Devour All Souls

accessory.name: Soul Core
accessory.detail: Controls the soul. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK; [5ef5f7]+1900[-] HP when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Alpha, Soul Weapon
story:
Alpha the Soul Weapon 

Using the power of souls, the natives were pushing back against the Creator. In return, he developed Alpha, the first weapon. It consumed all the world's souls and brought it to an end. The Creator then quietly sowed the seeds of a new beginning.

accessory.name: Soul Core+
accessory.detail: Handle with care. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP; [5ef5f7]+2000[-] HP when also equipping Final Core. (Stack: N)

name: Ukon
story:
Ukon

He who opens the gates.

name: Ukon, Gate Opener
story:
Ukon the Gate Opener 

Ukon and Sakon had been guarding the gates since they were born, but none ever tried to pass. Ukon wondered if there was a point to all this--but as Sakon did not speak, he pondered this alone. One day, he hoped, he would get to open the gates.

name: Sakon
story:
Sakon

He who closes the gates.

name: Sakon, Gate Closer
story:
Sakon the Gate Closer 

The gates had never been opened, nor had any ever passed through. As long as the secrets beyond the gates remained unknown, Sakon was cursed to keep every thought to himself in silence. This was a problem, especially when his nose tickled.

name: Shusui
story:
Shusui

Shusui serves the Emperor Kotowari in the land of Zipang. All that happens in this land is recorded in his writing. After recording thousands of accounts, Shusui notices something: His records seem to be predicting future events.

name: Shusui, Monk of Dreams
story:
Shusui the Monk of Dreams 

All that he had written had come to pass. War had broken out, the land had burned, and people had died. Shusui stood alone in a charred field, the sun setting behind his back. From now on, he vowed, he would write the future that he desired.

name: Zio
story:
Zio

He wakes to the sound of gentle waves and finds himself on a beach. The moon's reflection is distorted on the water's surface. He does not know where he is--nor who he is for that matter. The waves continue to roll in, offering no answers.

accessory.name: Blue Amnesia
accessory.detail: Its luster is gone, forgotten in the past. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dragons, Fire enemies.

name: Zio, Forgotten Past
story:
Zio the Forgotten Past 

He comes to with a start to the sound of pounding rain, roaring dragons, and bellowing warriors. All around him are bodies of countless dragons and soldiers. He does not know where he is, but he knows his purpose. He draws his sword.

accessory.name: Blue Amnesia+
accessory.detail: He stands in an abyss of complete amnesia. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, Fire enemies.

name: Vell
story:
Vell

There are those in this world called Sinners, freaks of nature who are partially dragonized, perhaps, or enjoy eternal youth. These "mistakes" are captured, bound, and destroyed in an island prison run by Vell, the Original Sinner.

accessory.name: Rusted Padlock
accessory.detail: Eternally placed on feet, hands, and neck. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-100[-] HP.

name: Vell, Prison Lady
story:
Vell the Prison Lady 

The gates open to two wolves--or girls?--in black and white who fire thousands of rounds at the gate. But the white-haired man has not a single scratch. The two girls smile and part to make way for the master of the prison.

accessory.name: Rusted Padlock+
accessory.detail: Only those who earn her kiss are freed. [5ef5f7]+650[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-100[-] HP.

name: Pino
story:
Pino

[FF1493]GD4825 Month 55, Lightday[-]\nGrandpa's feeling better today. He wasn't coughing so much, and he ate more bread than usual. He was strong enough to wind my key, so I'll get to live a bit longer now. I wish Grandpa had a key too, so I could wind his for him.

accessory.name: Rusted Life Force
accessory.detail: A key for prolonging the life of a toy. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Pino, Broken Toy
story:
Pino the Broken Toy 

[FF1493]GD5882 Month 56, Lightday[-]\nGrandpa's doing OK today. He hasn't eaten in days, but he's ssssleeping without coughing. He hasn't wound my key in aaaaa while, so my body  is verrrryyyy stiff. I hope I can stiiilllll be a real boy somedddddd--

accessory.name: Rusted Life Force+
accessory.detail: As it rusts away, so does the toy's life. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Benten
story:
Benten

Before it had a name, the place was a paradise for the Tengu, winged beings ruled by the crafty and boisterous Benten. She and the Tengu recently fought off some winged creatures she had never seen, but something about them troubled her.

accessory.name: Tengu Mask
accessory.detail: The mask of one who leads the Tengu. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Benten, Sky Lady
story:
Benten the Sky Lady

In an instant, the winged creatures had set the forests and hills ablaze. One by one, Benten's men fell to the ground as their wings turned to ash. As Benten kneeled in the ashes, wingless and alone, a god looked down from above with glee.

accessory.name: Tengu Mask+
accessory.detail: With a spurt of blood, it flies into the air. [5ef5f7]+1450[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Ghies
story:
Ghies

[FF1493]Top Secret[-]

name: Ghies, Anonymous
story:
Ghies the Anonymous

To: Schpritz\nI've captured the Sinner Kristof. We can't allow Uberblood to cause any more damage; we must confine it at once. In the meantime, I'll keep my eyes on Oliver. Over.

name: Kristof
story:
Kristof

[FF1493]Research Log 3856[-]\nI have discovered what I call Ubdeath, a state of death beyond ordinary death. Dragons, creatures of the Eastern Realm, the Seven Ancients, and Hades must hold the secret to it. I will find it and make it mine.

name: Kristof, Researcher
story:
Kristof the Researcher

[FF1493]Research Log 0001[-]\nMother died today; maybe it's all Father's fault. He was obsessed with the "truth," of a death that lay beyond death. Mother called it a "taboo," but always talked about it. It's now time for me to seek out the "truth."

name: Nazna
story:
Nazna

Like her parents, Nazna was a hunter who knew the forests like the back of her hand. Her tribe did not hunt more than needed and lived in peace with the animals. Nazna's best friend was a Longclaw, an animal with whom she would meet in secret.

name: Nazna, Beast Protector
story:
Nazna the Beast Protector 

The Longclaws attacked Nazna's tribe. Who knows how it started. In the silence that followed, Nazna looked out at the piles of dead Longclaw and humans. Her parents were dead, and so was her animal friend. At that moment, Nazna made a vow.

name: Demi Le Fay
story:
Demi Le Fay

[FF1493]GD5511 Month 15, Lightday[-]\nI'm going to play a new prank! I thought about it all night--okay, not all night, since I had to sleep, but I did brush my teeth before going to bed and... Anyway, the prank! It's a great prank, and, um...I forgot.

name: Demi Fenris
story:
Demi Fenris

For the umpteenth time, she rebuilt her house. It was always a wreck after the night of a God Moon, and she could never figure out why. As she pondered who the culprit could be, a red-hooded, beast-hunting girl called out her name.

name: Seyfried, One-Eyed
story:
Seyfried the One-Eyed

His torn arm flew into the air as blood gushed out of his stomach. His nemesis was far stronger than a dragon. Seyfried fell to the ground and bit his shattered blade. A powerful Dragonslayer then sprouted from his right arm.

accessory.name: Tragic Veil++
accessory.detail: A vow made--a chain that cannot be broken. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Seyfried, Lava Breaker
story:
Seyfried the Lava Breaker 

The Lost Blonde was gone. All that remained were dead Imperial soldiers and the half dragon madman who killed them: Eizel. Seyfried stared at the man who was once his father and gripped the sword that sprouted from his right arm.

accessory.name: Tragic Wrap++
accessory.detail: Swordless and armless, Seyfried fights on. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [d9419a]-450[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Seyfried, Ice Breaker
story:
Seyfried the Ice Breaker

Seyfried could not see or hear. He could feel his senses dying. Something cracked. It was his body. He was turning back into a rock. But, he had no regrets. He had lifted a young girl's curse and had come to the end of his journey.

accessory.name: Tragic Shroud++
accessory.detail: The curtains silently close on Seyfried. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [d9419a]-450[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Yamato, Blazing Fire
story:
Yamato the Blazing Fire 

The one-eyed god laughed with angry ridicule as she released her magic, but Yamato did not move. With an earth-shattering roar, his blade absorbed the magic; then the world stopped, sound vanished, and a blinding whiteness spread.

accessory.name: Glittering Pipe++
accessory.detail: Justice and future? Here's me winning 'em![5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Yamato, Blazing Light
story:
Yamato the Blazing Light 

The eye had not opened. Setsuri's arrow brushed past Yamato's cheek--the first and last time she would show mercy. Yamato calmly reached for his sword, and Setsuri fired a second arrow at his head. As it struck him, the eye opened.

accessory.name: Flickering Pipe++
accessory.detail: The sun that'll rise, I'll seize it too![5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-400[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Yamato, Blazing Dark
story:
Yamato the Blazing Dark 

Yamato barely deflected the blade before it hit his master, then forced the swordswoman away from her intended victim. His master was covered in cuts, but none fatal. It was not until later that Yamato realized this had been intentional.

accessory.name: Smoldering Pipe++
accessory.detail: Me and her and master, I'll defend 'em all![5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-400[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Brunhilde, Shiny Light
story:
Brunhilde the Shiny Light 

Deep in Babel was a land only open to the One True God. Brunhilde had come to destroy the souls of historic gods that rested here and defile the land by covering it with her slave blood. This would be her third and final act of vengeance.

accessory.name: Bared Fangs++
accessory.detail: Her bared fangs break as her hope is dashed. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Brunhilde, Shiny Fire
story:
Brunhilde the Shiny Fire 

[FF1493]Report No. 265205[-]\nNivram, director of the West Continent Control Bureau, was found burnt to death at the bureau's gates. It has the signs of a dragon attack, but no dragon could have entered Babel. We will continue to investigate.

accessory.name: Punished Fangs++
accessory.detail: Her bared fangs burn as she begs for mercy. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Brunhilde, Shiny Water
story:
Brunhilde the Shiny Water 

[FF1493]Report No. 265208[-]\nValkrum showed signs of having been tortured, and with malicious intent. He was tortured with water, a crude method apparently similar to one practiced by humans. This may be our biggest clue yet to the culprit's identity.

accessory.name: Abused Fangs++
accessory.detail: Her bared fangs dampen in the rain of abuse. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Valzark, Dragon Rider
story:
Valzark the Dragon Rider

Valzark's mind began to wander. He gazed at the broken Doll lying beside him and imagined the life she would live. By the time she awoke, he would no longer be in this world. His eyes blurred with the first and last tears he would ever shed.

accessory.name: Core of Blue Dreams++
accessory.detail: It will eventually live on in the Doll. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Valzark, White Dragon
story:
Valzark the White Dragon

The blue disciple stood in the pouring rain, a broken Doll in his arms. He faced two disciples in white and black: Hope and Despair, but, to Valzark, they offered neither. The white one struck first; the next moment, her white armor turned red.

accessory.name: Core of Twin Dreams++
accessory.detail: It will yield neither to black nor white. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-450[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Valzark, Black Dragon
story:
Valzark the Black Dragon 

The black disciple fell. Her right hand landed on top of the left hand of the white disciple. Till death do you part, huh, thought Valzark as he gripped the hand of the Doll he held. The black storm clouds swirled, and Anubis arrived.

accessory.name: Core of Dead Dreams++
accessory.detail: Even the gods' thunder cannot break it. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-450[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Amagi, Lady of Duality
story:
Amagi the Lady of Duality 

The soldiers wandered the hill in the light of the rising sun, the war over at last. Amagi searched in vain for someone among them, the man she needed to help rebuild Zipang. A familiar voice called out to her. She turned; tears of joy ran down her face.

accessory.name: Girdle of Duality++
accessory.detail: The tool will one day bear a god's child. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Amagi, Lady of Light
story:
Amagi the Lady of Light 

Amagi had grown up with two souls: He and She. He was stubborn and doubted nothing; it was Him that had instilled her with the unbending beliefs she lived by. As time passed, both He and She vanished, to be replaced by Amagi.

accessory.name: Girdle of Whiteness++
accessory.detail: The sash stifles and binds the white soul. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Amagi, Lady of Shadow
story:
Amagi the Lady of Shadow 

Amagi had never liked She, who was completely selfish and did not sit well with her. She was like a deep darkness that threatened to conquer all and make all events suit her needs. She instilled Amagi with a very tiny greed: a dream.

accessory.name: Girdle of Blackness++
accessory.detail: The sash releases and shows the black soul. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Karma, Tragic Beauty
story:
Karma the Tragic Beauty 

She had told herself she was not going to cry; but the tears kept coming. As he lay in her arms dying, she wanted to tell him so many things, but no words came. For a moment, she stopped crying; there on his face was the first smile she had ever seen.

accessory.name: Tragic Arm Sling++
accessory.detail: A symbol of the future she vows to fight for. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Karma, Uncursed
story:
Karma the Uncursed 

Karma lifted her bruised body off the ground, her mouth full of blood. She steadily aimed her bow at the man who stood on the burning deck of the Lost Blonde: Smith Apollos. She was no longer afraid. With a confident smile, Karma let loose an arrow.

accessory.name: Tragic Arm Wrap++
accessory.detail: She smiles; she will not go down alone. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Karma, Eternal Sadness
story:
Karma in Eternal Sadness 

The captain who lost her ship headed to the ocean. The taciturn mage built an orphanage to protect children. The kindly boy decided to follow Karma, whose purple cloth was now wrapped around her bow instead of her neck. A new chapter had begun.

accessory.name: Tragic Armband++
accessory.detail: The cloth around her arm flaps in the wind. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, Ups chain bonus, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maxwell, Godly Sage
story:
Maxwell the Godly Sage 

As he lay on the ground,  Maxwell knew his life was slowly draining from him. The black fog coalesced and turned into another him, who now looked down upon Maxwell. Suddenly, everything clicked, and Maxwell sent forth his solution into the world.

accessory.name: Crying Bird++
accessory.detail: Peep. Peep. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Maxwell, Illusory Sage
story:
Maxwell the Illusory Sage 

Maxwell, shrouded in a black fog, flew into the capital on one of the dragon invaders, his dark eyes fixed on the other Maxwell on the ground below: the White Genius and "solution" created by the Blue Genius to defeat the Black Genius.

accessory.name: Guiding Bird++
accessory.detail: A bird that guides one towards good fortune. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] RE [d9419a]-450[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Maxwell, Dark Sage
story:
Maxwell the Dark Sage 

BP. BPBP. ALL IMPOSTERS ELIMINATED. AM NOW TRUE SEEKER, INHERITOR OF ALL SOLUTIONS. TO COMPLETE MISSION, MUST DESTROY ALL PAST BY BURNING QUEEN OF TOMES AND FORBIDDEN TOMES, THEN CREATE FINAL SOLUTION. BP. BPBP. PBP.

accessory.name: Whispering Bird++
accessory.detail: Suddenly, it speaks: "There is none." [5ef5f7]+1000[-] RE [d9419a]-450[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Isabella, Tricky Empress
story:
Isabella the Tricky Empress

All had gone as planned. The dragons had invaded the capital, and the man with the Eye of the Evil Dragon had killed Queen Maria. The world would soon be hers, Isabella thought--but no plan ever goes entirely as planned.

accessory.name: Demonic Shell++
accessory.detail: A strange voice can be heard from the shell. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Isabella, Fire Empress
story:
Isabella the Fire Empress 
Isabella hated Alan. She hated his selfless regard for his men's safety over his own and the trust he had earned at the palace as a result. So, she conceived a plan to murder his best friend and frame Alan for it.

accessory.name: Shell of War++
accessory.detail: A shell of beginnings that will upend all. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Isabella, Dragon Empress
story:
Isabella the Dragon Empress

Isabella hated Luka. She hated her newly acquired ability to use Forbidden Tomes. Such powers could foil her plans--but could also play into her hands. So, she conceived a plan to permanently imprison the heroes of legend who had been summoned.

accessory.name: Shell of Answers++
accessory.detail: A shell of endings that will upend all. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Dione, Lady of the End
story:
Dione the Lady of the End 

Thousands of dragons flew into the capital. The End of Time was drawing near. Would it mark the end of the world or a beginning? Or "D"--Genesis? Dione's quest for freedom was about to end. The next instant, a cold blade pressed against her neck.

accessory.name: Crimson Finalizer++
accessory.detail: Waits at the edge for the color to change. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Dione, Lady of Nothing
story:
Dione the Lady of Nothing
 
She had seen things in dreams: her arms, legs, and head flying through the air. But, to dream was to be free, and that was why she had come, in spite of these dreams, to put an end to it all. The 72 gods who surrounded her edged forward.

accessory.name: Green Slicer++
accessory.detail: Its color changes from contact with blood. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [d9419a]-450[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Dione, Lady of Genesis
story:
Dione the Lady of Genesis 

Dione found her friend dead, having fought the gods to protect a mere Doll. Yet, this Doll now sat beside her friend, caressing her head with undeniable compassion. She had become human and attained the freedom her protector had sought.

accessory.name: Crimson Burier++
accessory.detail: It is now crimson, and forever will be. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] HP, [d9419a]-450[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Valtols, Heavenly Guard
story:
Valtols the Heavenly Guard 

He thought her appearance impure, dressed in rags that barely qualified as clothing. Yet, her will was strong, and Valtols found purity in that impure stubbornness. A pure impurity--a fitting final foe for him before the End of Time arrived.

accessory.name: Headband of Purity++
accessory.detail: Anger dyes the world and stone a deep red. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Valtols, Heavenly Judge
story:
Valtols the Heavenly Judge 

Valtols walked the halls of Babel and saw that god with the umbrella who had a baffling love of all that was impure. As they passed, she whispered, "There is no one more impure than our Creator." His golden blade struck her fast.

accessory.name: Pureblood Headband++
accessory.detail: Impurity changes the color of the stone. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Valtols Heavenly Death
story:
Valtols the Heavenly Death

Pitiful, Valtols thought, as he looked at the god slumped before him. He turned to the 71 gods she had killed and grimaced at their impure forms. Suddenly, he dropped his sword; a blade protruded from his chest. The god had not been finished.

accessory.name: Supreme Headband++
accessory.detail: As the world ends, the stone's color changes. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Natal, Infernal Flames
story:
Natal the Infernal Flames

Natal moved through the burning castle carrying a young man who bled from a deep wound in his back. Zipang was about to enter an age where gods would no longer be needed, and she was prepared to die to ensure that future would come to pass.

accessory.name: Bear-Cat Ornament++
accessory.detail: All that remains is her bear-cat ornament. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Natal, Dancing Flames
story:
Natal the Dancing Flames 

Natal's sister Setsuri often caressed her head, whether she was happy, sad, angry--or the day her mother died. To Natal, Setsuri was home, the one place she was always happy. But now, it was gone; it would live on only as a memory.

accessory.name: Pink Bear-Cat++
accessory.detail: From one sister, she received kindness. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Natal, Black Flames
story:
Natal the Black Flames 

Natal had never seen Kagura smile. She had once asked Setsuri about this, and she had replied that Kagura would someday remember how. As Natal watched Kagura die, a gentle smile on her face, she finally understood.

accessory.name: Red Bear-Cat++
accessory.detail: From the other sister, she also got kindness. [5ef5f7]+300[-] ATK, Ups counter chance, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Nefteria, Dying Star
story:
Nefteria the Dying Star 

Whatever Nefteria did, her Doll would always try to imitate her. That was how they communicated. As the light began to fade from her eyes, Nefteria thought about how happy she had been with the Doll. Her mind raced with memories of precious moments.

accessory.name: Necklace of Cycles++
accessory.detail: Worlds come and go, but the bond remains. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-250[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Nefteria, Destroyer Star
story:
Nefteria the Destroyer Star 

Nefteria's mind raced with \nmemories of invaluable encounters. She had been prone to breaking things, even more so when she was trying to be careful. A smith came to Babel once and crafted her a glass spear that looked only too breakable.

accessory.name: Endless Necklace++
accessory.detail: Very rarely placed as wager when gambling. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-450[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Nefteria, Drunken Star
story:
Nefteria the Drunken Star 

Neftria's mind raced with memories of good friends. She had never met a god who could drink as much as Dione. The night they met, they drank barrel after barrel, neither wanting to admit defeat. When dawn came, they were still laughing away.

accessory.name: Eternal Necklace++
accessory.detail: Very rarely placed into a pawn shop. [5ef5f7]+1000[-] ATK, [d9419a]-450[-] HP & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Schelk, Dashing Wind
story:
Schelk the Dashing Wind 

At a library in Water Valley, Luka picked up a book she had read many times: "Living with Dragons." She wondered about the king of Light Valley who had written the book. She had not seen him in a while and hoped he was doing well.

accessory.name: Gale Feathers++
accessory.detail: The winds carry it to one's true love. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Schelk, Blazing Wind
story:
Schelk the Blazing Wind

Schelk met Victor at a banquet when she had just been made queen of Fire Valley. Several men had been laying on the floor around her. It was only when her foot struck his nose that he realized she had been drinking--and was a horrible drunk.

accessory.name: Redwind Feathers++
accessory.detail: Red means passion, and are sent by women. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Schelk, Dragon Wind
story:
Schelk the Dragon Wind 

The arrow hit the dragon in the eye. Schelk nocked another arrow and studied the people at its feet. Five were dead. The young girl Luka sat petrified; she didn't respond to his calls. The dragon raised its claws; Schelk let loose his second arrow.

accessory.name: Bluewind Feathers++
accessory.detail: Blue means love, and are sent to family. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Frau, Machine Abettor
story:
Frau the Machine Abettor 

Everything was now over. Frau thought he was being strangely silent: was he broken, or did he shut down, having completed his mission? It looked like he could still time travel, though. Frau thought about where and when they would go next.

accessory.name: Snail-Like Speaker++
accessory.detail: Fulfills its duty even if it costs its life. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Frau, Machine Booster
story:
Frau the Machine Booster 

Frau was in the Age of Light. V had pierced the space-time fabric with "nails" that would, over time, create cracks that could shatter the future. O-6 had removed these "nails," but left behind "holes" that would still affect the future.

accessory.name: Excitable Speaker++
accessory.detail: Weak to electricity, making its life hell. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Frau, Machine Rider
story:
Frau the Machine Rider 

Both V and I will be gone soon. I have fulfilled my duty, although I wish I didn't have to leave her behind. She has no one to talk to except me, and can't even wake up in the morning without me. Why just the other day she tried to make bre--

accessory.name: Confusable Speaker++
accessory.detail: Sometimes mistaken for the host body itself. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Noa, Cycle Creator
story:
Noa the Cycle Creator 

Noa opened her eyes in the dark. What happened to V? And why did the world still exist? The door opened suddenly, and Noa understood at once. There stood the Emperor she knew, as a young man she had never known. A Pureblood; a copy.

accessory.name: Science Visor++
accessory.detail: Can also predict the next day's weather. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Noa, Disasterologist
story:
Noa the Disasterologist 

Noa had now created seven lives--the original model and the A to F series--at the command of the Three Elders. These slaves of the Empire would one day realize the horror of what they had done. So, Noa secretly created G, their salvation.

accessory.name: Visor of Fire++
accessory.detail: Can also measure heat. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Noa, Vortexologist
story:
Noa the Vortexologist 

Noa didn't hate the woman general who oversaw her. She wasn't a Pureblood, nor was she fanatically loyal to the Empire, but she was determined about her own goals. Noa liked such instability; if it grew big enough, it would bring about great change.

accessory.name: Visor of Water++
accessory.detail: Can also measure water pressure. Ups weakness damage, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Amaterasu, Death
story:
Amaterasu the Death Goddess

The girl called out the boy's name over and over again; he did not awaken. How fragile these humans are, Amaterasu thought, to die so easily, leaving behind nothing. She had arrived at her desired solution; she had no need to stay here any longer.

accessory.name: Burning Souls++
accessory.detail: They also call such vessels "gods."[5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Amaterasu, Scarlet
story:
Amaterasu the Scarlet Goddess

Setsuri's parents ran a metal workshop. One day, she opened the door to find the white workshop dyed a deep red. In the center was a beautiful woman twirling an umbrella. At the back were the disfigured remains of her parents.

accessory.name: Luminescent Souls++
accessory.detail: A piece of a beautiful soul: Setsuri. [5ef5f7]+900[-] RE [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Amaterasu, False
story:
Amaterasu the False Goddess 

Kagura took shelter from the rain under a bridge. She had no home, no food, and no job. She went to sleep clutching the charm her parents had given her. Soon, she awoke to find a beautiful woman in red, standing in the rain with an umbrella.

accessory.name: Colorless Souls++
accessory.detail: A piece of a cold soul: Kagura. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Marianne
story:
Marianne

You know District 7 of St. Cruz? Used to be a town of bars and gambling dens run by Gilvo the Diamond. Queen Marianne paid it a visit one day, and Gilvo decided to kidnap her. That's when Don walked into town with his red cape and gun.(02)

accessory.name: Queen's Earring
accessory.detail: A symbol of holy, immaculate thoughts. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Marianne, White Queen
story:
Marianne the White Queen
 
Don didn't actually save Marianne then. In fact, she used the kidnapping plot to run away from the castle. Destroyed Gilvo's prized bar along the way, one thing led to another, and THAT'S when Don came to the rescue. Gilvo's never forgiven him.(03)

accessory.name: Queen's Earring+
accessory.detail: Light creates shadow; shadow creates sin. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Walter
story:
Walter

Walter is an odd hatter who lives in a certain tiny kingdom. He knows that everything he does, from his tea parties to the riddles without answers he asks people, is simply a repetition of that which has already been written.

accessory.name: Hatmaker's Hat
accessory.detail: A hat made for a hatter by a hatter. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Walter, Mirror Prophet
story:
Walter the Mirror Prophet 

Everyday, Walter's clock shows the same date. But, today, something is odd. A monster he's never seen burns the card soldiers, while the Queen of Hearts loses her head, her blood drenching a young girl. That was the day Walter's clock started moving.

accessory.name: Hatmaker's Dove Hat+
accessory.detail: Modified for a dove, his only friend. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Sandy
story:
Sandy

[FF1493]GD7021 Month 32, Darkday[-]\nI did it again. I robbed the house, but then found the old man living there collapsed. I called for help, ran off when people gathered outside, but then a monster attacked a little child. I drove it away, but forgot my loot.

accessory.name: Thief's Cloth
accessory.detail: For wrapping the loot one has stolen. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Sandy, Handy Bandit
story:
Sandy the Handy Bandit

[FF1493]GD7021 Month 34, Darkday[-]\nLife in the West isn't bad. I went out thieving, and the old man I saved the other day offered me lunch. Then, the parents of the child I saved made me dinner. Oh, and I got something for helping out the local doctor, too!

accessory.name: Thief's Cloth+
accessory.detail: Fills up with gifts more often than loot. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Asura
story:
Asura

The day Asura became chief of the Hiten tribe, he swore at his father's grave to destroy the Tengu. He recalled the day three of them came to him on a strange winged creature and dropped his father's mangled corpse in front of him.

accessory.name: Asura's Chestplate
accessory.detail: Armor worn by one who leads the Hiten. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Asura, Lord of Hell
story:
Asura the Lord of Hell

The Hiten and Tengu had once agreed to a truce to combat a certain foretold disaster. Asura no longer remembered the comfort he had felt at the banquet celebrating the truce, nor the Tengu girl whose hand in his had felt comforting.

accessory.name: Asura's Chestplate+
accessory.detail: Asura's burning rage covers it with blood. [5ef5f7]+150[-] HP & ATK, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Oliver
story:
Oliver

Oliver left home to save the world, but his ship capsized. A bird then guided him through a desert to a dragon with whom he lived until a god came along. As they drank, there was a knock on the door. Oliver opened it--and no one's seen him since.

name: Oliver, Hyperblood
story:
Oliver the Hyperblood Man 

Cut, stitch together, break, and fix.\n\nMy life's a patchwork.

name: Augustus, King of Fire
story:
Augustus the King of Fire

The old warrior battled the Red Dragon atop an active volcano. It was the mightiest foe he had ever fought, but finally, he had split its face in half. As it screamed, he stared back calmly, remembering the men and wife he had left behind.

accessory.name: Cape of Triumph++
accessory.detail: Stitched into it is a vow to return home. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Luke, King of Water
story:
Luke the King of Water 

Luke stood before the Glutton Queen's castle. Ursula was in there; now was the time to fulfill his vow. This was the quickest way to lift the curse put on him and Ursula. Liveia and Mary would be here soon, and he didn't want them getting involved.

accessory.name: Medal of Vows++
accessory.detail: Its crack reminds Luke of their painful vow. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Alain, False King
story:
Alain the False King 

Alain looked at his Holy Sword. Who had deemed it holy? A god? A king? It didn't matter. Since pulling the sword out of her chest, the blade had become just an instrument for killing. Alan closed his eyes and thrust the sword into his neck.

accessory.name: Crystal of Deceit++
accessory.detail: The crystal is in fact Alain's lying soul. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Eizel, Mad King
story:
Eizel the Mad King
 
Eizel lay in the Imperial hospital, dragonization worsening due to the Evil Eye that had already taken his soul and sight. His wife nursed Eizel back to health, but then the blood of a traveling woman destroyed what good was left in his heart.

accessory.name: Helm of Madness++
accessory.detail: The dragons must die to end the curse. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Joseph, Torment King
story:
Joseph the King in Torment 

Joseph had formulated a plan to destroy the White Hunters. The other rebel groups led by Rudolph and Clemence had surrendered. He would send them in to attack. In the confusion, Robin would lure them straight to him. He would have Theodore's head yet.

accessory.name: Wings of the Ether++
accessory.detail: Will eventually return to the Moon Rainbow. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Phyllis, Flame Queen
story:
Phyllis the Queen of Flames 

The Hellfire Spear burnt bright, still fuelled by Phyllis' soul as she slew dragon after dragon. She had no home anymore; her life was not important. But then, she remembered. The orphanage. That one little girl. And then, her spear burnt out.

accessory.name: Fire of Life++
accessory.detail: The soul burns until it has turned to ash. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Ursula, Savior Queen
story:
Ursula the Savior Queen 

In the light of the two moons, two shadows fell to their knees. The arrow had pierced through both their hearts. But, there were no regrets. The Glutton Queen's curse tying Luke's life to Ursula's home had finally been broken.

accessory.name: Crystal of Bondage++
accessory.detail: Prevents the freedom to either live or die. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Angelica, Knight Queen
story:
Angelica the Knight Queen

There were those who cried and screamed in pain; those covered in rock-like dragon scales; those who had turned into dragons and eaten their fellow men. Neither Angelica nor Artorius had seen evil of this scale, and it shattered their faith.

accessory.name: Tiara of Light++
accessory.detail: They vowed to share a life of eternal joy. [5ef5f7]+8%[-] chance of critical hit.

name: Viola, Despair Queen
story:
Viola the Despair Queen

The gods ordered Viola and Fiona to destroy a Doll, a manmade human created in the same way as Spirits. Her name was Octavia. Normally, the gods would not have made such a fuss; a disciple, however, had dared accept the Doll as a true human.

accessory.name: Crown of Despair++
accessory.detail: A ray of hope, found within the despair. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Fiona, Hope Queen
story:
Fiona the Hope Queen 

She fell through the sky. Viola's soul had left her body, but just before it did, she realized she was free; even the gods could not prevent death from parting her and Fiona. But, when she landed, her right hand was on top of Fiona's left.

accessory.name: Crown of Hope++
accessory.detail: A deep despair, hiding inside the hope. [5ef5f7]+900[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Foster, Weapon King
story:
Foster the King of Weapons 

Foster wanted to free the world from the tyranny of dragons. So, he invented weapons to help people combat them. Many dragons were slain with these tools, but so were many humans. People began to fear the weapons and called Foster a demon.

accessory.name: Wildfire Arrow++
accessory.detail: Finally used against humans as well. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Turner, King of Grief
story:
Turner the King of Grief 

The smell of rain filled the room. Rain seemed to follow his wife wherever she was; but she always smiled. Even now, as Turner gripped her cold hand, she smiled. When her smile at long last vanished from her face, the rain finally stopped.

accessory.name: Raindrop Charm++
accessory.detail: Eventually, it settled on one rain patter. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Edwards, Lonely King
story:
Edwards the Lonely King

Edwards smiled as he watched the 5 children play in the small garden outside the small house. A woman, also smiling, left the house carrying a basket of laundry. Then a man he did not know left the house. Still smiling, Edwards walked away.

accessory.name: Locket of Distance++
accessory.detail: The locket will never be opened again. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Smith, Hungry King
story:
Smith the Hungry King 

Smith had formed an army of trained killers: 100 hungry "dogs" picked from slums around the world. \nThe Bandit King would not stop him now. Eventually, Smith and his men would go on to rule the world under the guise of a trading company.

accessory.name: The Don's Bracelet++
accessory.detail: Symbolizes the sweet joy of taking a life. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Robin, Executed King
story:
Robin the Executed King 

Robin climbed the wooden steps. He had done what he could to restore the House of Apollos. But, now, the future ahead lay in darkness. At the top of the 13th step, a hood was placed over his head. Light poured through the holes over his eyes.

accessory.name: Unicorn Mask++
accessory.detail: Once unmasked, Robin is innocent no more. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Rachael, Explosion Queen
story:
Rachael the Explosion Queen 

Dozens of baby dragons sat in a circle tied to pegs. In the middle was Rachael. Sparks lit up in the air one after another until a beautiful rainbow of flames engulfed the babies. Rachael prepared for the onslaught of dragons that would come.

accessory.name: Crimson Embers++
accessory.detail: It was all that was left of the dragon. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Mary, False Queen
story:
Mary the False Queen 

The Glutton Queen was barely standing as she stood over the body of the Sea Princess. Mary smiled. As she walked to the victor, the Glutton Queen dropped her sword and fell to the floor. Mary raised her arm and plunged it into the Glutton Queen's chest.

accessory.name: Shell Ornament++
accessory.detail: A strange voice can be heard from the shell. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Rosa, Queen of Evil
story:
Rosa the Queen of Evil 

Rosa had told her she would get better soon; a lie, told so she could complete her experiment to dragonize her own daughter. Perhaps that was the only form of love Rosa was capable of; but it left her daughter with a permanent curse.

accessory.name: Miracle Bouquet++
accessory.detail: Joy, embarrassment, laughter, and tears. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

Nora the Queen of Cures 

Nora arrived at a town of medical facilities. She found the Abnormalities Monitoring Ward: a white cube with no windows, as if designed to prevent anyone from getting in or out. A silver-haired man came out of the entrance.

accessory.name: Cursed Blooddrop++
accessory.detail: A curse created from cursed blood--a cycle. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Loretta, Glutton Sage
story:
Loretta the Glutton Sage

Witches who once housed the soul of the Glutton Queen sat on their knees, their arms ripped off. They looked down upon she who had successfully fused her soul with that of the Glutton Queen. Loretta let out a catlike laugh, and her head flew into the air.

accessory.name: Laughing Cat Boots++
accessory.detail: A childhood memory: Rain. A cat-like laugh. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Paprika
story:
Paprika

A spider lived in the Forbidden Library. It spent its days reading books that made it recall its past as a human. It kept a diary of these memories with its thread; this eventually became the Book of Magic that gave birth to Paprika.

accessory.name: Book Spinner
accessory.detail: A spider who spins his web of thoughts daily. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP.

name: Paprika, Scarlet Spider
story:
Paprika the Scarlet Spider

The spider woke up that morning to find a girl called Paprika, claiming to have been born by its Book of Magic. She put it on her shoulder, saying they needed to find its true form. It did not notice that one of its legs had turned to stone.

accessory.name: Book Spinner+
accessory.detail: The web burned; the girl quietly laughed. [5ef5f7]+1500[-] REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP.

name: Sanders
story:
Sanders

In the future, wars are fought primarily between two factions: the Seventh Empire--which seeks human evolution through AI and machines--and the rebel King's Law Army. Sanders, a former hero, leads a third force: a mercenary group called Vulture.

accessory.name: Mercenary's Dagger
accessory.detail: Played a role in many of Vulture's stories. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Sanders, Colonel
story:
Sanders the Colonel 

Sanders and his Vulture mercenaries were fighting dragons, knee deep in the layer of black ash that covered most of the world due to all the wars. They had only been paid a bit of food and water, but for Sanders, the fight was the thing.

accessory.name: Mercenary's Dagger+
accessory.detail: The hand never forgets the warmth of blood. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-150[-] HP.

name: Esther
story:
Esther

Esther was in charge of supplies at the Rainbow Diner. She had never seen the reclusive chef, but loved her food. One day, she was told the chef had fallen ill, and the store came close to shuttering. Esther made a decision and entered the kitchen.

accessory.name: Secret Recipes
accessory.detail: A recipe book compiled over many years. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, Ups weakness damage.

name: Esther, Supplier
story:
Esther the Supplier 

Esther slayed a crimson dragon. In the Rainbow Diner's kitchen, she had found a note: "Gone to find Rainbow Dragons." The chef was not ill, after all. But, as the diner's supplier, she knew it was up to her to find this Rainbow Dragon.

accessory.name: Secret Recipes+
accessory.detail: The Topapo Stew is highly recommended. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK, Ups weakness damage.

name: Twinkle
story:
Twinkle

[FF1493]GD4988 Month 1, Lightday[-]\nI can't see anything! Is it broken? I can't tell the future if I can't watch the stars! And the stars didn't look so good the last time... Oh, I know! I bet Totol can fix it. I'll go ask tomorrow.

accessory.name: Star Mirror
accessory.detail: Can find any star in the universe. \n[5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Twinkle, Star Boy
story:
Twinkle the Star Boy 

[FF1493]GD4988 Month 15, Lightday[-]\nYay! It's fixed! Now I can watch the stars! The King's going to want to know his future quickly. But, shouldn't I thank Totol first? Nah, I'll do that later. And I'm not saying that just because I wanna watch the stars!

accessory.name: Star Mirror+
accessory.detail: Shows a vast darkness swallowing the stars. [5ef5f7]+750[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Dilal
story:
Dilal

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 0013

Title: He Who is Chained by the Gods

accessory.name: Items of Binding
accessory.detail: Chain and collar for binding a wild god. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, Ups chain bonus.

name: Dilal, Heaven's Knight
story:
Dilal the Heaven's Knight

Dilal had been imprisoned in Babel for millennia by the gods who feared him; now, his cell door was opening. With Dilal and the shards of the 3 Old Gods and 7 Ancients, the Empire had all it needed to destroy the dragons and rule the world.

accessory.name: Items of Binding+
accessory.detail: The humans free him to take on the gods. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, Ups chain bonus.

name: Vilder
story:
Vilder

The demon blade has no name, as it changes shape into whatever object the user desires. This is the only weapon of mine that I refuse to name, for I despise it. I shall now bury it deep beneath the holy mountains.\n[FF1493]Page 3[-]

name: Vilder, Mighty Smith
story:
Vilder the Mighty Smith

My wife died soon after my daughter's birth--the curse of the demon blade. It offers absolute power in exchange for misery; there is no escape but death. I will now die here at the bottom of the Abyss with this blade.\n[FF1493]Page 682[-]

name: Black
story:
Black

One half of the Oracle's 6th Avatar. Considered a failure, Black was set to be destroyed but was let out the Prison of Time by his white half. He gained form by possessing a body he found at the bottom of the Abyss, but lost most of his Oracular powers.

name: Black, The One Eyed
story:
Black the One Eyed 

The Oracle's 6th Avatar, Black awakened the power of the Evil Eye of Time and hunted down the other Avatars with his black dragon. In the end, the Empire seized him, using his body to resurrect a certain weapon. Only his Eye remains.

name: White
story:
White

This incomplete half of an Avatar of the Oracle, itself an artificial creation of the Snow Dragon, switched places with its dark half in the body of the 6th Avatar after it was put in the Prison of Time for being a failed replica.

name: Oracle
story:
Oracle

This artificial creation of the Snow Dragon has no soul. It multiplies as long as the Snow Dragon lives; and as long as one Oracle exists, the dragon can resurrect itself. There were once thousands of Oracles, known as the White Dragon People.

name: Olga
story:
Olga

Of the 5 Dons of the A. Smith Trading Co., none were more loyal to Gilva Apollos than Olga of the Winds. It earned her full command over the heaven-sailing Lost Rain, but even that could not erase the pain where her wings used to be.

accessory.name: Severed Feathers
accessory.detail: Once fluttered in the winds as she flew. [5ef5f7]+400[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP.

name: Olga, Pilot of Hope
story:
Olga the Pilot of Hope

Olga lost her wings when those from the Western Realm captured her and chopped her wings off. She suffered much pain, both physical and mental. Just as she was losing hope, a man with a single bird by his side appeared to her.

accessory.name: Severed Feathers+
accessory.detail: Despite her loss, she regained the sky. [5ef5f7]+800[-] ATK & REC, [d9419a]-250[-] HP.

name: Julien
story:
Julien

The Black Fang is a group of Sinners led by Chrono. Julien is Chrono's right-hand man, but is himself not a Sinner; it is his spear, Canossa, that is the Sinner--a Forbidden Weapon given life by an Evil Eye--and its sin has become his burden.

accessory.name: Magic Transceiver
accessory.detail: A transceiver made with spellcraft. \n[5ef5f7]+500[-] ATK, Ups chain bonus.

name: Julien, Dark Spy
story:
Julien the Dark Spy 

Late one night, Julien stands on the parapets of the Black Fang's castle, talking to a woman on his transceiver. When the conversation ends, the sun has begun to rise. Lt. Julien Law of the Empire's Zero Battalion has ended his mission.

accessory.name: Magic Transceiver+
accessory.detail: The heart pains at his own words of betrayal. [5ef5f7]+600[-] ATK, Ups chain bonus.

name: Zeke
story:
Zeke

Though Zeke is covered head to toe in scars and metal shards still lodged into his flesh, he is as calm as a lake on a day without wind. He does not talk about his past. It would only scare people; he does not want others suffering for his sake.

accessory.name: Fang of Sacrifice
accessory.detail: Stands firm even as it absorbs all damage. [5ef5f7]+1050[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC.

name: Zeke, Sacrifice
story:
Zeke the Sacrifice

He dashed after the girl. Alarms rang as the men in the towers fired at them. "Don't go that way," he cried, in vain. Finally, he caught up, his hand grabbing hers. There was a click, followed by an explosion; he didn't wake up until years later.

accessory.name: Fang of Sacrifice+
accessory.detail: Embraces pain as long as there is suffering. [5ef5f7]+1750[-] HP, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK & REC.
