name: Gawain
story:
Gawain

Gawain takes the tea to his master. He has timed it so the tea is just the right temperature by the time he delivers it. He arrives; his master wakes a minute later, roused by the smell of tea. And so, another day begins at the Forbidden Library.

accessory.name: Librarian's Tea
accessory.detail: A special blend made by a librarian. \n[5ef5f7]+950[-] HP, [d9419a]-100[-] HP & ATK.

name: Gawain, Librarian
story:
Gawain the Librarian 

Gawain shelves the books with utmost precision. Once his master has read a new book, she pours over every book she has read to look for even the slightest discrepancy that affects the timeline she has established in her head.

accessory.name: Librarian's Tea+
accessory.detail: Enjoy with a treat made by a librarian. [5ef5f7]+1450[-] REC, [d9419a]-100[-] HP & ATK.

name: Lilia
story:
Lilia

[FF1493]GD---- Month --, -----day[-]\nWhen I lost the necklace my father gave me, I threw a fit. Mother tried to calm me down by giving me her necklace, but it did not placate me. So, she told me she would look for it the next day. She never came back.

name: Lilia, Fiery Sweetness
story:
Lilia the Fiery Sweetness

[FF1493]GD---- Month --, -----day[-]\nAs time went by, I grew stronger. I vowed never to cry again until I had achieved what my father, the king, and my mother sought: a Western Country freed from the clutches of the Invaders who took my mother.

name: Godfrey
story:
Godfrey

Godfrey once believed all were equal in the eyes of the Lord. But the gods who had rapidly climbed the ranks now looked down on him as an inferior being, one unworthy of being a god. Slowly, the kindness in his heart began to waver.

name: Godfrey, Triumphant
story:
Godfrey the Triumphant 

One day, Godfrey arrived at an idea: If he sought equality, he would have to defeat all who stood above him and impose it. And so, he sought out the absolute power he needed to return the world to a state of pure equality.

name: Shogun
story:
Shogun

[FF1493]Do You Need Assistance?[-]
Looking to start a proxy war, crush a rebellion, or mediate a fight?
Call JASON! We offer equipment repairs, combat knowhow, and soldier training!

Contact us now at:
3-535 West Panzile.

name: Shogun, Raging Bull
story:
Shogun the Raging Bull

Jett drank the liquid. It didn't quench so much as burn, this "alcohol" recently imported from the West. He was tailing a man--Shogun--drinking on the other side of the room. Suddenly, several shots rang out. That was when it all started.

name: Teddy
story:
Teddy

[FF1493]Teddy's Notes[-]

name: Teddy, Professor
story:
The Professor Teddy

[FF1493]Teddy's Notes: Decoded[-]\nCrystallized jelmols can be fused with just about any life form, on one condition: that they come from the Western Country.

name: Amber
story:
Amber

[FF1493]Do You Need Assistance?[-]
Looking to infiltrate a big corporation or sneak into a hidden base? Call JASON! Our recon is fast and sharp, and we leave no trail behind!

Contact us now at:
3-535 West Panzile.

name: Amber, Agile Fox
story:
Amber the Agile Fox 

She lost everything that day, including her heart. That made her the ideal agent, willing to commit any vile act without hesitation. Eventually, she was given a codename, A, for Amber--for her soul was trapped forever in a very deep place.

name: Hakuhi
story:
Hakuhi

Hakuhi serves the Emperor of Zipang in the capital of Yamato--named after the hero who defeated the gods. The Emperor doesn't rest, and Hakuhi worries if he takes ill, the land will be plunged into war again. Unfortunately, her fears come to pass.

accessory.name: Horned Headgear
accessory.detail: Her late mother's horn has been sewn on. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Hakuhi, Silver Lord
story:
Hakuhi the Silver Lord

Mist perpetually covers this forbidden mountain. Hakuhi and a few others know of a certain legend who lives there. With the Emperor ill, only he can keep the kingdom from falling apart. They find this Sword God, unchanged from 20 years ago.

accessory.name: Horned Headgear+
accessory.detail: A new horn has begun growing underneath. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Joy
story:
Joy

The thief and folk hero known as Joy--named after the grinning mask he always wears--is able to steal any treasure, no matter how intricate the traps protecting it. His gleeful approach to every job is his way of showing respect to his loot.

accessory.name: Thief's Disguise
accessory.detail: Initially worn to hide his true identity. [5ef5f7]+950[-] REC, [d9419a]-150[-] HP & ATK.

name: Joy, Laughing Thief
story:
Joy the Laughing Thief 

Joy was attempting that night to steal the highly protected Black Dahlia. As he entered the castle grounds, he saw a girl being chased by a couple of knights. It was only after knocking out the knights that Joy realized what he was getting into.

accessory.name: Thief's Disguise+
accessory.detail: Now a popular mascot with children. [5ef5f7]+1550[-] REC, [d9419a]-150[-] HP & ATK.

name: Blu
story:
Blu

[FF1493]Specie: Rainbow Empress[-]\nThe Rainbow Empress: a  butterfly so rare, only 20 sightings have been confirmed around the world. I guess that means this rabble of Rainbow Empresses burning before me are the last of their kind.

accessory.name: Deadly Honey
accessory.detail: The nectar can get any living being drunk. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Blu, Collector
story:
Blu the Collector

[FF1493]Specie: Razorjaws[-]\nDespite their primitive jaw structures, these creatures seemed to fancy themselves as civilized.\nWell, fire can put an end to that notion. I took their scales and fangs; Gilva couldn't care less if they're alive or not.

accessory.name: Deadly Honey+
accessory.detail: Promises extinction to all creatures. [5ef5f7]+100[-] HP & ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Nadia
story:
Nadia

It's been a year since I left the Box. I was a Carrier Bird who sorted letters and delivered them around the world. But, it was the letters in the Blue Mailbox I cared about the most; undelivered mail waiting to be destroyed.

accessory.name: Revealing Light
accessory.detail: Sheds light on unknown addresses. [5ef5f7]+500[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK.

name: Nadia, Postwoman
story:
Nadia the Postwoman 

Today, as always, my Blue Mailbox is filled with undelivered letters. I left the Box to dedicate my life to delivering these letters to the final resting places of those who were meant to read them--to find a home for these lonely letters.

accessory.name: Revealing Light+
accessory.detail: The letter becomes a path paved with hope. [5ef5f7]+750[-] HP & REC, [d9419a]-200[-] ATK.

name: Roar
story:
Roar

Roar cowered in the cold rain. He had left behind his family and friends in that horrible prison, and now he hated everything, including himself, for his cowardice. He looked up; a scarecrow mockingly smiled at him. That was where everything started.

accessory.name: Fiery Arrow
accessory.detail: Burning arrows fired by Jacqueline. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Roar, Solitary Beast
story:
Roar the Solitary Beast 

Roar dodged each flaming arrow, making sure a few grazed his mane. People loved it; he was now the top attraction at the Jack O'Lantern Circus, along with Aila the tin girl's spear dance. The applause did nothing to soothe his soul, however.

accessory.name: Fiery Arrow+
accessory.detail: Fired with all intent of hitting Leon. [5ef5f7]+1600[-] HP, [d9419a]-250[-] REC.

name: Dora
story:
Dora

The girl never realized the screams were her own. [FF1493]The Empire had executed her parents...[-] The gadget attached to her head sent one electric shock after another. [FF1493]...For she was a perfect fit.[-] Soon, the girl was no longer there; there was only Dora.

accessory.name: The Love of D.S.
accessory.detail: Destruction is her way of showing affection. [5ef5f7]+200[-] HP & REC, Ups counter chance.

name: Dora, Soul Crusher
story:
Dora the Soul Crusher

Every mission was a game to Dora, and every game involved her earning the friendship or love of her targets--for nothing would hurt her victims more than being betrayed by someone they trusted. That was the only thing she lived for--and it pained her.

accessory.name: The Love of D.S.+
accessory.detail: She loves, destroys, goes mad, and laughs. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, Ups counter chance.

name: B.S-002-xx
story:
B.S-002-xx

[FF1493]SPECS[-]
Model:B.S-002-xx
Power: Imperial Magic Reactor
Weapon: Electromagnetic Spear Gun
Notes: Needs to be fused with test subject
Lasts: 72 hours (Depends on test subject)

name: Beretta.S.
story:
Beretta.S.

Every time she killed the dragon, it would return--an Imperial experiment to test the endurance of the their undying dragon. In Round 802, the dragon finally bested her. She awoke fused to a machine, and was told her name was Beretta.

name: Zoya
story:
Zoya

At the bottom of the sea live the Zoya. Young Zoya are protected by shells made of the carcasses of other creatures and feed only on the dead. Many die young from falling into deep trenches, unwittingly climbing to shore, or starvation.

name: Zoya, Deep Sea
story:
Zoya in the Deep Sea 

The Zoya are peaceful, and therefore many die young. Those that live for centuries shed their shells and emit a bright light from their heads. This attracts more prey, but it is in the service of the only method of survival the Zoya know.

name: Waspell
story:
Waspell

Men carry "food" in their skinny arms, smiling even as their eyes are dead. They are lined up to feed Queen Waspell. She has plenty to eat, but it is never enough. Soon, the only life left on the island is Waspell and the men.

name: Waspell, Insect
story:
Waspell the Insect Empress 

Waspell's powers allowed her to control all who lived near her. The men worshipped her, while the women became her "food." And, when the women were gone, the men became her food. She would sprout wings and then fly away, leaving nothing behind.

name: Mula
story:
Mula

Mula has lived here for eternity, observing the ways in which humans have defined "crime" and "punishment." Her soul is missing, her body drowned in shadows, and her eyes blinded by the sun; but the giant eye she carries in her hand sees all.

name: Lloyd
story:
Lloyd

Lloyd was set for a life in the clergy, even before he was born. All his life, he was taught that there was one god, and that all mortals who proclaimed themselves as such were his enemies. In this, Lloyd was more devout than anyone else.

accessory.name: Symbol of God
accessory.detail: He grips it and offers it to his "God."[5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: The Radical Lloyd
story:
The Radical Lloyd

Lloyd never doubted the word of his god, which he had heard and obeyed all his life. So, he executed everyone in his convent. He then executed dragons, which brought to him the false gods he had been taught about. He executed them as well.

accessory.name: Symbol of God+
accessory.detail: All enemies of "God" require his justice. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Wolvol
story:
Wolvol

[FF1493]GD7018 Month 50, Darkday[-]\nI think it was fate. One rainy day, I was walking through the woods, when I detected a trace of blood in the air. I followed it to a boulder, under which were his parents. They'd died trying to protect this little guy.

accessory.name: Rain-Soaked Pet
accessory.detail: A pet that refuses to take to its master. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Wolvol, Wolfskin Hero
story:
Wolvol the Wolfskin Hero

[FF1493]GD7018 Month 54, Darkday[-]\nThis little guy's been a pain ever since I brought him home. He doesn't bite anymore, but he tips over food and kicks sand in my face. Still, I can't get mad. At night, he comes into my bed and cries like he did that day.

accessory.name: Rain-Soaked Pet+
accessory.detail: Secretly fears losing someone again. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Thea
story:
Thea

Everyone knows who Thea is, but they've never seen her. She travels in their dreams, flitting from dream to dream with quiet grace. Thea herself has no idea if she exists or not; all she knows is she's been flying through dreams for millennia.

accessory.name: Dream-Travel Feather
accessory.detail: Needed to fly from dream to dream. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Thea, Dream Savior
story:
Thea the Dream Savior 

Thea had become aware of a change in everyone's dreams. Something known as a dragon had begun appearing, causing destruction and mayhem. Their appearance was not an issue to her; their destruction, however, needed to stop.

accessory.name: Dream-Travel Feather+
accessory.detail: Once lost, she'll be stuck in that dream. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Orcus
story:
Orcus

There was once a paradise where the harvests were rich and the people were happy. Then, the famine came. It lasted for years and years. Finally, the people took up weapons and marched against their king. The king began to panic.

accessory.name: Ashes of Despair
accessory.detail: Covers a land that was once rich in harvest. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Orcus, Death Bringer
story:
Orcus the Death Bringer 

When King Orcus came to, he was holding a sword. In front of him spread a field scattered with the bodies of his subjects; the people who betrayed him. In that moment, the king vowed to destroy this paradise and turn it all into dust.

accessory.name: Ashes of Despair+
accessory.detail: Eden was cursed and put to eternal rest. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Kylt, Magic Maker
story:
Kylt the Magic Maker

Kylt packs his bags. The executioner asks if she has any final words. He looks around the empty room. She shakes her head. He silently opens the door. The axe goes up. He cries at this act of betrayal. She closes her eyes and smiles.

accessory.name: Spellcraft Remedy++
accessory.detail: Suppresses the effects but does not cure. [5ef5f7]+700[-] HP, [d9419a]-300[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dark enemies.

name: Meril, Fallen Sister
story:
Meril the Fallen Sister

Meril's brother lay in her arms, blood pouring out the large hole in his chest. She had loved him; it was a sin she learned to live with. But, all at once, the memory left her. She gave a catlike laugh and began to feed on her brother's corpse.

accessory.name: Rosary of Penance+
accessory.detail: Eaten away in the light of the moon. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-300[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Fire enemies.

name: Leo, Lord of Orphans
story:
Leo the Lord of Orphans

Breakfast, school, lunch, dinner, bath time: that was the daily routine they set up after taking over the orphanage. At the end of the day, Leo looked at the date: Nine years since leaving the Lost Blonde, and two since she passed away.

accessory.name: Polar Bear Bag++
accessory.detail: Packed with memories from those days. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] REC, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Light enemies.

name: Bonny, Magical Lolita
story:
Bonny the Magical Lolita

She brings excitement and pain to past and future! She might look sweet, but don't be fooled! She'll tie you up, crush you, smash your head! Beat you and squash you and drown you in a sea of blood! She's the Magical Lolita, Bonny the Witch!

accessory.name: Flitting Partner++
accessory.detail: Starts singing when in a good mood. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, [d9419a]-300[-] ATK, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Cypher
story:
Cypher

Cypher had been favored to win the tournament, an exam taken by all first year Royal Knights. But it came to an end fast with the arrival of a warrior in armor as black as his eyes--Cain, who would go on to become Cypher's best friend.

accessory.name: Azure Dreams
accessory.detail: The blue reflects the dreams of a knight. [5ef5f7]+600[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Massive[-] boost vs. Dragons, Fire enemies.

name: Cypher, Blue Fang
story:
Cypher the Pale Blue Fang 

Months after that chaotic tournament, Cypher was called away from training to join a team charged with slaying a certain dragon by order of Queen Maria. It would be him, Allen, Luca, and Cain: the four heroes who saved the Capital.

accessory.name: Azure Dreams+
accessory.detail: The blue shall turn even deeper over time. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, [5ef5f7]Deadly[-] boost vs. Dragons, Fire enemies.

name: Noir
story:
Noir

Alain and Noir searched for Queen Jeanne as they always did. It was hard work, but Noir enjoyed it. He felt comfortable being in the shadows of Jeanne and Alain--those great lights he looked up to constantly. But it all changed that day.

accessory.name: Crystal of Beginning
accessory.detail: Sword, armor, and name: all stolen. [5ef5f7]+700[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Noir, Shadow Breaker
story:
Noir the Shadow Breaker

Noir saw Alain, his back turned to him. He stood in front of a knight who lay in a pool of blood, a sword protruding from her stomach. The knight said something, and Alain grabbed the sword. He then pulled Jeanne's sword out of her.

accessory.name: Crystal of Beginning+
accessory.detail: A dragon-like growth covers the blade. [5ef5f7]+1350[-] ATK, [d9419a]-200[-] HP.

name: Three
story:
Three

[0040FF]SecretArea
=========================
DEFECT_IN_RTDSYSTEM
ErrorCode:0x17146883,0x0000003
dlrow_dne.exe(223)
\nTechnical information:
STOP : 0x000003(0x17146883)[-]

name: Three, Glutton of All
story:
Three the Glutton of All 

Hellooo? Can you heeear meee? Doesn't matter. Meowhehe. I'm Standard Weapon Mk 3, or Three for short. See, I'm contacting you like this, because... Oh, look, I'm getting distracted again. I just wanted to say I'm almost ready, and will be taking everything, soon. Meowhehe.

name: Babal
story:
Babal

[FF1493]GD---- Month --, -----day[-]\nIf you are reading this, I hope you are a bringer of peace--for it would mean I have lost. As I studied the Invaders, I discovered they were not our true enemy--and that we would need to broker a truce with them. (Pg. 2)

accessory.name: Stone of Leadership
accessory.detail: The fire in the stone continues to burn. [5ef5f7]+600[-] REC, Ups chain bonus.

name: Babal, Uniter
story:
Babal the Uniter 

[FF1493]GD---- Month --, -----day[-]\nHaving negotiated a truce with the Invaders, I left for the Western Realm. We had secretly opened back channels to the West, so I trusted negotiations would go smoothly. That was my first mistake. (Pg. 8)

accessory.name: Stone of Leadership+
accessory.detail: One day, the fire shall shine over all. [5ef5f7]+700[-] REC, Ups chain bonus.

name: Valist & Jill
story:
Valist & Jill

Woke up under a bunch of rubble. It was dark, but I could see colors--and that I was now a machine.\n[FF1493]-------------------------[-]\nI woke up, rubble all around me. There was no light, but I could see. That's when I realized I had become a machine.

accessory.name: Coexisting Souls
accessory.detail: Two hearts, so many different bodies. [5ef5f7]+300[-] HP & REC, Ups weakness damage.

name: Valist & Jill, Twin Souls
story:
Valist & Jill the Twin Souls

Looks like I'm stuck with some girl. Jill. What the hell were they thinking, putting us together?!\n[FF1493]-------------------------[-]\nI wish this Valist person inside me would go away. He upsets me so much! And this ugly body...how will I ever get married now?!

accessory.name: Coexisting Souls+
accessory.detail: Produced from various parts of many people. [5ef5f7]+400[-] HP & REC, Ups weakness damage.

name: Eureka
story:
Eureka

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 0001

Title: She Who Shall Burn All Tomes

accessory.name: Tome Burning Fires
accessory.detail: A dark fire that burns Tomes into nothing. [5ef5f7]+800[-] REC, Ups weakness damage.

name: Eureka, Tome Destroyer
story:
Eureka the Tome Destroyer

All that Eureka saw felt hollow--all part of a never-ending war. A cycle of emptiness. She burned her Forbidden Tomes so the history in them would never be repeated again. Yet, it repeated, and so, she decided to reverse the course of the world.

accessory.name: Tome Burning Fires+
accessory.detail: Removes every written word from history. [5ef5f7]+900[-] REC, Ups weakness damage.

name: V
story:
V

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 9999

Title: She Who Shall Destroy All Time

accessory.name: Final Core
accessory.detail: V's core; so powerful it could destroy time. [5ef5f7]+100[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: V, Final Weapon
story:
V the Final Weapon

A young woman from the 32nd District was chosen to carry the DNA of the Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, and Omega and become the V prototype. The hope was that she would be able to control the strong-willed Omega DNA--but a bomb was put in her brain, just in case.

accessory.name: Final Core+
accessory.detail: Reproduced through much weapons research. [5ef5f7]+100[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Very insane[-] boost vs. Neutral enemies.

name: Lancelot
story:
Lancelot

Lancelot takes breakfast to his master on a silver tray as he does everyday, though she has barely eaten in a millennia. She will awake to the smell of the tea brought by the White Librarian, and begin another day at the Forbidden Library.

name: Lancelot, Secretary
story:
Lancelot the Secretary 

Lancelot cleans the pens to the sound of numerous clocks ticking. Many pens are used to write every book, as every fact his master writes reflects the entirety of history. By using different pens, she makes connections between facts more clear.

name: Raul
story:
Raul

Raul hated books. He saw them as giant clusters of lies packed with words that showed only what the writer and reader wanted to see. But more than anything, he hated books because of his foster father, the publishing magnate d'Artagnan.

name: Raul, Book Detester
story:
Raul the Book Detester 

Raul was born to a family that had long enjoyed the trust of the Capital and  the regard of the locals. But his family was ruined by a novel rumored to be based on their real-life criminal exploits. The author was the man who took Raul in: d'Artagnan.

name: Joel
story:
Joel

Once night fell, Joule would tell Joel stories-- about the world, music, books, Forbidden Tomes. In the morning, the door to their cellar would open, and Joule would be lifted out by his chains, smiling reassuringly down at his little brother.

name: Joule, Joel
story:
Joule with the Joel's Soul

Joule stood before a dead couple and their 5 kids. His body was etched with every detail about his little brother--except for the illness that took his life 21 days ago. His enemies vanquished, Joule fell into a deep sleep--and Joel awakened.

name: Basson
story:
Basson

Basson never rued the fact that he was born from a book. It was who he was. Since his birth and life meant nothing to him, he was able to live in the "now." He took up music, in hopes he would one day encounter music he would never forget.

name: Basson, First Player
story:
Basson the First Player

The Quintet played on, their sound rough and discordant. Finally, the sound died, only for the silence to be broken by laughter. It was Fluta, their leader. The other four joined in. Basson was happy; this was the "now" he had sought.

name: Orbo
story:
Orbo

Orbo was a Spell Breaker. Having been born from a book, he had no family or friends. And so, alone he played his music day after day--until one day, his master brought home four others like him. He put them in a group and called them the Quintet.

name: Orbo, Second Player
story:
Orbo the Second Player 

Orbo enjoyed nothing more than playing music with his friends behind his master's back. By now, the Quintet had become quite good, their harmony improving by the day. Orbo finally had someting like a family--but it was not to last.

name: Horun
story:
Horun

For Horun, his purpose in the world was to satisfy his master. By making his master happy, Horun also felt happy, whether he was being hit, kicked, or choked; whether he had his flesh seared by hot iron, his hair pulled, or his bones broken.

name: Horun, Third Player
story:
Horun the Third Player 

As Horun washed the blood from his face one day, he was met by four others like him, born from books. They invited him to play music with them. "I want my master to be happy," he said. "Are you happy?" one of them asked. A tear fell from Horun's eye.

name: Clarine
story:
Clarine

Clarine had even fewer memories than the others in the Quintet who were born from books. She was a mistake, a product of an abandoned manuscript. She could not remember even the strange sound she would sometimes hear in the distance.

name: Clarine, Fourth Player
story:
Clarine the Fourth Player 

Clarine was the deftest of the Quintet, the blank pages in her past quick to absorb her lessons. As she played, relishing the look of surprise on her friends, she was joined by Fluta, and then Orbo, and finally Basson. That was their first concert.

name: Fluta
story:
Fluta

Born from a book, Fluta did not have dreams. She was stitched together from the pasts of many strangers; nothing she did or thought felt true to her. She had no dreams of her own and simply trained to become a Spell Breaker as she was told.

name: Fluta, Fifth Player
story:
Fluta the Fifth Player 

Having met four like herself, Fluta at last had a dream. She would keep practicing with her Quintet--behind their master's back--until their tiny concerts had finally reached audiences around the world. Alas, her dream was not to be.

name: Lily
story:
Lily

When Lily writes, her words lift off the pages and become men and women, and objects that define them. And so, she is kept asleep. She sleeps until that day the world begins to change and her master requires the use of her powers.

name: Yurika Lily
story:
Yurika Lily

The time nears. Lily quietly opens her eyes.

name: Erasing Spirit
story:
Erasing Spirit

[FF1493]For Mega Fusion Reset[-]\nThis artificially created product of science can be used in Mega Fusion to reset all bonuses the unit has earned through Mega Fusion.\n[FF1493]Gold and units used in the fusions will not be returned.[-]

name: Venom
story:
Venom

For Venom, making poison was an art. It was not about killing the victim; it was about making them suffer helplessly for as long as possible until the inevitable happened. And now, he had created his masterpiece: a poison that invaded the mind.

accessory.name: Ancient Blood
accessory.detail: A drop of cursed blood sealed for centuries. [5ef5f7]+800[-] HP, Ups weakness damage.

name: Venom, Poison Maker
story:
Venom the Poison Maker

Venom had created poison for the Empire from a dragonization crystal. He now needed a test subject he could monitor closely. At that moment, his wife, pregnant with the their second child--Sigmund--walked in. Venom touched her stomach and smiled.

accessory.name: Ancient Blood+
accessory.detail: With the curse freed, the cycle begins anew. [5ef5f7]+900[-] HP, Ups weakness damage.

name: Setsuri
story:
Setsuri

Setsuri trudged through the blazing castle with the sister she had raised like a daughter on her back. Suddenly, Setsuri stopped and gently laid down her sister. Ahead stood a god burning with rage. Setsuri nocked and let fly her final arrow.

accessory.name: White Hair Ornament
accessory.detail: A vow she once made to her little sister. [5ef5f7]+150[-] ATK & REC, [5ef5f7]Insane[-] boost vs. Water enemies.

name: Setsuri, White Fire
story:
Setsuri the White Fire

Blazon

O, Princess! Take my hand in marriage! For you, I would burn in fires and swim in boiling water! Meet me at the Pond of Magma when the Land of Fire begins to rumble!

Blazon de Volcane

story:
Blazon the Fiery Knight

[FF1493]To My Dearest Princess[-]
Princess! My great love! Did my burning passion perhaps make you recoil?! Fear not! My fires may singe your heart, but my embrace is as warm and gentle as a blanket!

Blazon de Volcane

Princess! Why have you rejected me?! Is there another man?! If so, I will destroy him! But if even this does not move you, I will burn you into ashes and clasp you to my chest in the Land of Fire to declare my eternal love for you!

story:
Eisover

[FF1493]My Beautiful Princess[-]
O, Princess. Will you not take my hand in marriage? I would walk through the coldest blizzard just for you. Meet me at the Abyss of Crystals when the Land of Ice begins to freeze.

Eisover LeFrost

story:
Eisover the Freezing Knight

[FF1493]To My Beautiful Princess[-]
O, Princess. My beautiful princess. Please do not fear my iciness. Though my love may freeze the world over, my embrace will protect you from such a glacial outcome.

accessory.name: Inner Eye+
accessory.detail:
It will never see anything but the Abyss.
[5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC, [d9419a]-500[-] HP & ATK.

name: Machina
story:
Machina

Over time the Holy Sword, Holy Grail, and Holy Crown have faded from the history of the Capital. They still exist, still under the control of a group of shadows with no form that calls itself the Order. They are the Capital's true rulers.

accessory.name: Ancient Cog
accessory.detail: A cog that never rusts, no matter how much time has passed. [5ef5f7]+1300[-] REC, [d9419a]-400[-] HP & ATK.

name: Machina, Holy Overseer
story:
Machina the Holy Overseer

No one has seen or heard them, or knows if it even exists. What is known is that the Order is ruled by Machina, a collective entity of beings who have controlled human history from the shadows. They--or rather, it--is one of the Seven Ancients.

accessory.name: Ancient Cog+
accessory.detail: Its composition, age, and purpose are all unknown. [5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC, [d9419a]-500[-] HP & ATK.

name: Kikyo
story:
Kikyo

The lord and vassals of the castle only visited the room a few times a year. A princess lived inside with her magic mallet that could grant any wish. She was kept there not to be hidden, but to keep her ignorant and pliable as a tool.

accessory.name: Red Bowl Fragment
accessory.detail:
A memento of her onetime servant. 
[5ef5f7]+1300[-] REC, [d9419a]-600[-] HP.

name: Kikyo, Ogre Princess
story:
Kikyo the Ogre Princess 

Rumor had it that an ogre lived in that castle with a magic mallet that could seize the wish of any who came near. Brave warriors and spellcasters ventured into the castle; those who fled with their lives spoke not of an ogre, but of a woodpecker.

accessory.name: Red Bowl Fragment+
accessory.detail: Imbued with her feelings for the servant who traveled across the ocean. [5ef5f7]+2000[-] REC, [d9419a]-1000[-] HP.

name: Sun Spirit
story:
Sun Spirit

[FF1493]Embodiment of the Sun[-]\nThe sun nurtures new life.

name: Rain Spirit
story:
Rain Spirit

[FF1493]Embodiment of the Rain[-]\nThe rain quenches lands that have burnt into ash.

name: Star Spirit
story:
Star Spirit

[FF1493]Embodiment of the Stars[-]\nThe stars fall upon lands\nthat have been destroyed by wars.

name: Moon Spirit
story:
Moon Spirit

[FF1493]Embodiment of the Moon[-]\nThe moon shines down on despondent lands that weep day and night.

name: Isabella, Imprisoned
story:
Isabella the Imprisoned

The world had taken her parents, taken her home, and taken her heart. She never had a place, and she eventually realized she never would. And, so, she decided to destroy the world and create a new one--one where she belonged.

name: Baby Spirit
story:
Baby Spirit

All roads eventually lead to the same destination. This is a symbol of hope for the new road that the world and its people are about to embark on.

name: Glen
story:
Glen

Glen was born to a tribe of nomadic herders known as the Kamulina. After dragons destroyed his tribe, Glen decided to travel to the Capital and join the Royal Knights--not for revenge, but to stop similar tragedies from happening again.

name: Glen, Swordsman
story:
Glen the Swordsman 

Though he had killed many dragons and saved many people during the assault on the Capital, Glen and his friends were given no credit. Disillusioned, Glen gave up on the Royal Knights and set off on a new path with his three newfound friends.

name: Glen, Champion
story:
Glen the Swords Champion 

Glen is a Fire Swordsman seeking to rid the world of dragons, inspired by the knight who saved him when dragons destroyed his people. "We all go home," she had told him, and then he knew--that real strength was being able to save others.

name: Livio
story:
Livio

Born in the Empire, Livio was forced to leave the Imperial Army after being struck by a mysterious illness. He has since roamed the world looking for a cure. Recently, he has learned of the Forbidden Library where all knowledge is kept.

name: Livio, Great One
story:
Livio the Great One
 
Livio learned that the Forbidden Library near the Capital was burned down years ago, but that another library exists somewhere in the world. He has now set off on a new path in search of this library with his three newfound friends.

name: Livio, Great Curse
story:
Livio the Great Curse

Livio is a Dark Spearman who is searching for a cure to his illness. He has learned of a Moonbow Library that appears only once so often--like a mirage. Though this tip offers him little hope, he has no choice but to pursue it.

name: Saya
story:
Saya

Since the Great Cataclysm 17 years ago, many cases of amnesia had come to light. Saya was one such victim. She had no memory of her mother or father, but her grandmother in the Capital found her. Since then, Saya visited her once a month.

name: Saya. Archer
story:
Saya the Archer
 
After bravely defending the Capital from dragons, Saya went to the hospital to find her grandmother afflicted with amnesia--and clasping a letter to Saya about her parents. She has now set off on a new path with her three newfound friends.

name: Saya, Bright Archer
story:
Saya the Bright Archer

Saya is a Water Archer who travels to restore her memory. The letter left by her grandmother said her parents live in the Eastern Realm. She now travels to pick up the fragments of her memory before returning to her grandmother.

name: Elphi
story:
Elphi

Elphi was a priestess who could hear the voices of dragons. Her father was Chief of Rainbow Valley, the dragon people's home. While in the Capital on an official visit, she became lost in the city's alleyways--and suddenly heard dragon voices.

name: Elphi, Priestess
story:
Elphi the Priestess

By detecting the dragons early with her ability to hear their voices, Elphi helped reduce casualties. But now her Dragonblood Crystal was cracked--an ill omen. She has set off on a new path with her three newfound friends to prevent further disaster.

name: Elphi, Listener
story:
Elphi the Listener

Elphi is a Priestess of Light who travels to stop a potential disaster. Two of four Dragon Listeners have gone missing--had Elphi been the actual target of the assault on the Capital? She now travels to uncover a massive conspiracy.

name: Karen
story:
Karen

Karen's late mother had inflicted a curse upon her, one that slowly corrupted her body and would eventually corrupt her mind. There was one way to slow the curse: decapitate other victims of the curse--dragons--and bathe in their blood.

name: Karen, Red Shoes
story:
Karen the Red Shoes Girl

Every night, Karen had the same nightmare: her laughing as she chopped off limb after limb. Yes, she spent all day cutting off dragon legs to bathe in their blood and slow her curse--but she didn't realize her bloodlust was rising dangerously.

name: Cthu
story:
Cthu

Originally summoned from a Tome as the Glutton Queen, Cthu was meant to exist only temporarily. But by devouring a certain Tome, she gained new flesh and was able to return in her true form. She now seeks to devour all--including her many pretenders.

name: Cthu, Glutton Queen
story:
Cthu the Glutton Queen

It was a massacre. Cthu's sword, claws, and fangs decimated the pretenders of evil. She grinned in the light of the moon, and the pretenders did so as well--desperate and bloody. Cthu emitted a strange catlike laugh and continued her slaughter.

name: Lucius
story:
Lucius

Lucius was wise, strong, and beautiful. As a soldier and minister, he led the people in healing the wounds left by the Great Cataclysm. People saw in him the Knight King of yore--and wise Lucius knew this meant the throne was his to take.

name: Lucius, Fool
story:
Lucius the Fool

The good king's name had already been shattered, his countless acts of misrule having now caused more suffering than the dragons. Lucius changed the minute the crown was placed on his head. Was this his true nature? Or was there something else?

name: Kojiro
story:
Kojiro

In Zipang, there are men and women known as Blades whose duty is to protect the Emperor. The greatest of them is Kojiro, the woman who defeated the Sword God Musashi and is said to be the equal of the legend known as the Fire God--her master.

name: Kojiro, Black Blade
story:
Kojiro the Black Blade

Kojiro and Musashi were raised to become Blades--the Emperor's guards. Kojiro was known for her speed, Musashi for his power. Eventually, they came to lead the Eight Blades. But a crisis was triggered the day Musashi attacked the Emperor.

name: Voof
story:
Voof

I'm Voof, and I came here to the Rainbow Diner to become the best dog chef in the world! Too bad it's closed, but I can give you a taste of... What do you mean, you're not hungry? You're not a bird, are ya? Wait...you kinda look like a bird.

name: Voof, Food Seeker
story:
Voof the Food Seeker

I've gotta say, grandma, I didn't think one old woman would be running the "best restaurant in the world." ...Whoa, be careful with that! You could hurt yourself. Let me just get that, and... Who're you, lady?! And where's that old woman?!

name: Jetterman
story:
Jetterman

[0040FF]6:30: Emma's Flower Class[-](18)
[0040FF]7:00: Jetterman[-](NEW)
It's Jetterman, the most awesome superhero in the history of TV! Watch him fight the super-evil Bugguns with super-cool silver bullets! He's also got a sidekick who's a stone cold fox!

name: Jetterman, Steel Will
story:
Jetterman the Steel Will

[0040FF]2:30: Test broadcast[-]
[0040FF]3:00: Jetterman[-]
Daniel and Erika get to Dr. Molton's lab in time, but they can't use his secret weapon until they pay off his debts! Erika sells a few paintings in the doctor's collection--but she's about to die!

name: Aegis
story:
Aegis

With every thrust of his spear, another soldier collapses and explodes. Hundreds of robots still remain, all firing at him. He could dodge the shots, but instead he blocks them with his shield. The girl on his back must not be hurt.

name: Aegis, Shield
story:
Aegis the Shield

She was seeking a key. She had little time left, but she trusted him, and so continued probing. As she crossed from Level 3 to 4, 5, and 6, her senses sharpened, she found the "key," she reached out, tou--\nShe woke up.

name: Wilhelm
story:
Wilhelm

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 0132

Title: The Origin of All Sin

name: Wilhelm, Original Sinner
story:
Wilhelm the Original Sinner

Wilhelm is kept at the lowest level of a certain prison. He is the Darkest Sinner, a product of many experiments. All Sin can be traced to him, and so, he lives here by choice-- to prevent the creation of new Sins and keep his heart empty of dark rage.

name: Elga
story:
Elga

Elga is a traitor who now fights against the Empire that created her. She needs regular maintenance to prevent her flesh from decomposing. Elga has a companion called G--a tiny satellite that can communicate with her via telepathy.

name: Elga, Rebel
story:
Elga the Rebel

Elga was created by the Empire, and so once did exactly as told--burning towns and killing their men, women, and children. She would feel things she could not process--but once she discovered this to be anger, she cursed her past actions.

name: Leva
story:
Leva

[FF1493]Stuff to Tell My Sister![-]
.Tiny people in the East
.Giants in the North
.The masked immortals
.Land of pitch darkness
.King of the land where everyone's asleep
.Land of seven moons
.The "holes" and "nails" leading to other worlds

name: Leva, Lady of the Sea
story:
Leva the Lady of the Sea

Leva is a trouble-prone tomboy and the younger of two sea princesses. She travels the Seven Seas, using her lovely voice to calm raging seas and dragons alike. When she comes home, she tells her bedridden sister all about her adventures.

name: Yuri Hojo
story:
Yuri Hojo

Yuri Hojo dashed out of the house. She'd been late 3 days in a row; one more would put her in hot water for sure. As she rounded the corner, she bumped into something big and instinctively pulled out her weapon. There stood a Robo Dragon.

name: Yuri Hojo, Golden Girl
story:
Yuri Hojo the Golden Girl

Yuri Hojo arrived at the Combat Base, late for the fourth day in a row. As she imagined the fate in store for her, she was given a mission so out there, she thought she was in a movie. She was to travel back in time and end this war.

name: Kairos
story:
Kairos

Kairos leads the Empire's unit charged with killing Impures--Uberbloods; the Dragonized, Insectized, and Demonized; Immortals; and others suffering from mutated blood. Kairos was given the post when he destroyed a group run by Impures a few years ago.

name: Kairos, Punisher
story:
Kairos the Punisher

It was 15 years ago that Kairos changed his name. He once secretly fought with the Impures--until the day he shot someone important to him. Just before, they had made a pact--one that Kairos quietly waits to fulfill.

name: Cassandra
story:
Cassandra

Cassandra, who served the Queen, feared this Alice. She had won over Walter the Hatter and was now making her way to the castle. She did not want to wake the Queen, who was in hibernation--it was not worth losing her head over.

name: Cassandra, Dutiful
story:
Cassandra the Dutiful Servant 

The Queen slept most of the year, and during that time, it was forbidden to enter the castle. All in the tiny kingdom knew and feared this rule. But, thought Cassandra, not Alice. Suddenly, the castle shook; the Queen of Hearts had awakened.

name: Loleta
story:
Loleta

Far above the skies is the Holy Land in what was once Babel. Its ruler is Loleta, disciple to the Glutton Queen. She awaits the day when the spells will be broken so she can throw the kingdom into darkness once again.

name: Loleta, Ruler of Magic
story:
Loleta the Ruler of Magic 

Since the Great Cataclysm 17 years ago, both the gods who fell to earth and the humans who they once fought continued to engage in pointless war. This was good as far as Loleta was concerned, but not good enough. She wanted even more chaos.

name: Organa
story:
Organa

Organa lost her wings and fell to earth in the Great Cataclysm. She has lost her memory and her knowledge--and has even lost the immortality that all fairies possess. She has been aging for the 17 years since the disaster, inside a cage.

name: Organa, Sacred Spirit
story:
Organa the Sacred Spirit 

Organa's cage hangs from the World Tree that gave birth to her. It reaches to the heavens and is always hidden by thick clouds--which is why so few people have ever seen it. Dragons avoid this home of the Soul Vessel.

name: Sekt
story:
Sekt

Sekt is a Doll who hunts gods--though a goddess created him. He has a book with the details of every god, and a coffin that forever entraps the eternal souls of the gods while transferring their powers to him. There is no flaw in his design.

name: Sekt, God Killer
story:
Sekt the God Killer 

The culling of gods had been the goddess's idea. With Babel fallen, all the gods did was waste the limited supply of Souls. So, she created a Doll that would cull them and hopefully make them learn from their past mistakes.

name: Angela
story:
Angela

This story has not yet been written.

name: Angela, Knight Captain
story:
Angela, Knight Captain 

This story has not yet been written.

name: Angela, Knight of Honor
story:
Angela, Knight of Honor

This story has not yet been written.

name: Albert
story:
Albert

This story has not yet been written.

name: Eris
story:
Eris

Eris was born to a family of apple farmers in the village of Eldoir. Since her parents died from a mysterious illness three years ago, she has run the farm with her little sister. The apples here are blue, but their hue grows deeper by the day.

name: Eris, Dragonized Girl
story:
Eris the Dragonized Girl 

All of Eldoir had been struck by dragonization, spread from Fort Vastark. The top half of Eris was already dragonized. The Empire planned to destroy the village and hide the evidence; but standing in their way was the dragon that was Eris's sister.

name: Nyte
story:
Nyte

The village had raised Nyte like a son and now it burned at the hands of demons. Curie and Orcey, the closest thing he had to family, were in peril. Suddenly, the warrior in him was awakened--by a sword flying through the sky and into his chest.

name: Nyte, Warrior
story:
Nyte the Warrior
 
It was said that only the sword could defeat the archfiend, and now that it had lodged itself into Nyte's flesh, the two moved as one. As Nyte grew into a powerful warrior, the sword slowly took shape, awaiting the rebirth of the archfiend.

name: Curie
story:
Curie

Curie is a white wizard who travels with Nyte, the warrior she raised like a brother, to defeat the archfiend. It started when demons burned their village a year ago, and Curie intends to play her part to the end--though only grayness lies ahead.

name: Curie, White Witch
story:
Curie the White Witch 

Avia unlocks the gates. Nyte, the four chosen ones--and one animal--enter Ash Valley, a land bereft of colors. But, there is no archfiend--not until now. Only Nyte does not know. And, by not telling him, Curie has played her part.

name: Marciella
story:
Marciella

Marciella is a martial artist who travels with the warrior Nyte to Ash Valley. She joined him and his band after losing to him in battle in the City of Sand. She is sure her six siblings are being held by demons and seeks to rescue them.

name: Marciella, Fighter
story:
Marciella the Fighter 

Marciella charges at the archfiend. Six years ago, she was taken away and taught to believe the archfiend was the first enemy who would be worthy of her. She knows she is ready to play the part of worthy adversary, even if it means her own death.

name: Nestor
story:
Nestor

Nestor is an astrologist who joined Nyte and his band in the City of the Moon. He has precisely plotted their journey so far by reading the stars, but he is also a rascal who vanishes every night and gets into trouble--a role he enjoys very much.

name: Nestor, Clown
story:
Nestor the Clown 

The witch and mage, and now the fighter had been killed by the archfiend. \nA thankless role, Nestor thought. He'd fooled the boy by playing the fool, but the script now called for him to reveal all. He was killed for it--and so the story began.

name: Avia
story:
Avia

Avia is the last of the bird dragons, found abandoned with the baby Nyte. Together they grew up, and now Avia guides Nyte on a hero's quest. With its high intellect and animal instincts, it leads the inexperienced Nyte and his companions.

name: Avia, False Bird
story:
Avia the False Bird 

Avia always speaks [FF1493]the truth[-]: that Nyte is [FF1493]the warrior[-] destined to [FF1493]put the archfiend to eternal sleep[-] with his sword. His path [FF1493]is not set in stone[-], and he [FF1493]may[-] die. But, the future is [FF1493]a blank canvas[-], and can yet be painted with [FF1493]rainbow colors[-].

name: Derst
story:
Derst

Derst is a knight in onyx armor who makes repeated attempts at Nyte's life. He wields a spear covered entirely in blades that cause his sword hand to drip blood. He is the only one with no role in this drama--an understudy watching from the wings.

name: Derst, Shadow
story:
Derst the Shadow 

As Derst makes his way to Ash Valley to seize the archfiend's throne, he is confronted by the witch, the mage, the fighter, and the clown--but no sign of Nyte. Derst, the understudy with no role to play in this drama, fights his final fight.

name: Kirik
story:
Kirik

Kirik belongs to a tribe called the Key Guardians. By order of his chief, he has been trying, in vain, to hunt the bird dragon Avia that travels with Nyte. He seems to want to warn Nyte about some kind of danger, but his tribal tongue is unintelligible.

name: Kirik, Hunter
story:
Kirik the Hunter 

The Primeval Forest gives Kirik powers. An eighth arrow unerringly pierces his target. Again, the prey falls to the ground, cracks open like an egg, and yields a ninth one. One last chance--an army of Key Guardians fire at the bird dragon.

name: Orcey
story:
Orcey

Orcey is a black mage accompanying the warrior Nyte to the land where the archfiend is said to sleep. His powerful magic has protected Nyte at every point, each spell cast without emotion--all in the service of leading Nyte to his gray end.

name: Orcey, Black Mage
story:
Orcey the Black Mage
 
Curie lies dead in front of her brother Orcey. Nyte, having lost his greatest love, will now direct his anger to the world--as the archfiend. Orcey knows he has played his final part; he will now battle the boy he loves like a brother.

name: Night
story:
Night

The archfiend had a dream of a warrior, forced to follow his fate on a path that he believes leads to a rainbow-colored future.\n-------------------------\nThe warrior dreamed of an archfiend who with his sword killed everyone he loved for a gray future.

name: Lady Acquire
story:
Lady Aquire

Lady Acquire is a girl who is able to travel between the real world and the 2nd-and-a-half dimension she lives in. She only travels here to play the games that don't exist in her world, and to visit her own personal mecca: Akihabara.

name: Sheep Spirit
story:
Sheep Spirit

[FF1493]For fusion[-]\nThis rare Spirit was born suddenly from a dream on the first day of the year. It is more of a sleepyhead than the typical Spirit.

name: Elkia
story:
Elkia

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 0003

Title: He Who Controls All Fire

name: Elkia, Crimson God
story:
Elkia the Crimson God 

Magma-like liquid poured from the wounds of the giant flame dragon as it writhed on the ground. It glared with its green eye at Elkia, who removed his fiery spear from the dragon and aimed the tip at that eye. The dragon would now obey him.

name: Almafi
story:
Almafi

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 0004

Title: She Who Controls All Water

name: Almafi, Blue God
story:
Almafi the Blue God 

As she stood on the water surface, she sang a song no human could hear. The raging sea went calm as every ship sank without a trace. Sleeping below Almafi was a giant dragon who would awaken as the song ended and signaled the dawn of a new age.

name: Lu-Wonne
story:
Lu-Wonne

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 0005

Title: He Who Controls All Light

name: Lu-Wonne, Radiant God
story:
Lu-Wonne the Radiant God

The harvest had been the biggest he had seen in 1,000--no, 7,000 years. As Lu-Wonne flew through the comet-filled sky to the World Tree on the back of a giant dragon, he turned to his cargo with an evil grin and began to plant his seeds.

name: Dormia
story:
Dormia

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 0006

Title: He Who Controls All Darkness

name: Dormia, Dark God
story:
Dormia the Dark God 

The war had ended. The giant hairy dragon lay with its head bowed, as if vowing allegiance to the man who stood before it--Dormia. Another man walked up to Dormia, and he too bowed in loyalty. It was Schneider, supreme commander of the Empire.

name: Riella
Riella, Shining Petal
story:
Riella the Shining Petal

The Four Knights, willed into being by the World Tree, were put in the care of Aurelia and El. They were the envy of all fairies, but only Riella knew that the secret of their blood would be their undoing lest they always prove their worth.

name: Magna
story:
Magna

For Magna, the World Tree was a continent-sized playground full of undiscovered areas and life forms. As a child, she often became lost in this sprawling maze; every time, Aurelia found her with some new species Magna had collected.

name: Magna, Fiery Explorer
story:
Magna the Fiery Explorer

Magna's curiosity could not be sated. She found tear-inducing mushrooms, vines that picked at her pouch like thieves, and mud-like sap that shone like a rainbow in the moonlight. With no one to come look for her, Magna continued exploring.

name: Giusse
story:
Giusse

Giusse is one of the Four Knights of the World Tree and a troublemaker. He now languishes in prison, punished by El for starting an inter-tribal fight. In the moon's light, Giusse closes his eyes, hoping to see "her" in his dreams again.

name: Giusse, Black Butterfly
story:
Giusse, Black Butterfly

Dead Insects fell off the burning World Tree. High above in the sky, "she" looked down at Giusse. Then the rain came, and "she" turned her back and flew off into darkness. The dream always ended there. Someday, he too would fly off like "her".

name: Fran
story:
Fran

One of the Four Knights, Fran is responsible for healing the scars that remain in the World Tree from a long time ago when it was almost burnt down by humans. For this, she needs the foul blood and flesh of the Insects--her mortal enemies.

name: Fran, Arboreal Stream
story:
Fran the Arboreal Stream

At the roots of the World Tree is a place where pristine waters gush out, four-leafed plants grow, and only a single beam of sunlight enters. It is Fran's secret--along with a beautiful wing fragment she found at the bottom of the water here.

name: Aurelia
story:
Aurelia

After the World Tree was almost burnt down by the Insect King and Queen, Aurelia spent centuries healing it back to life. This took a toll on her. Today, she lies comatose, protected by Four Knights who know that if she dies, so does the Tree.

name: Aurelia, Tree Goddess
story:
Aurelia the Tree Goddess

Aurelia is with a guest-- the only human to have climbed to the top of the World Tree. She enchants Aurelia with objects and tales from the outside world. In return, Aurelia gives a seedling of the Tree to Rosalie--who will go on to murder the Tree.

name: El
story:
El

Insects covered the World Tree, spreading their foul poison. As Aurelia fought their King at the top, her sister El flew to the roots--there was only one way to save the Tree. Awaiting her was the thing that was once her sister Welza.

name: El, Tree Servant
story:
El the Tree Servant

El has commanded the Four Knights since Aurelia fell into her deep sleep. The World Tree's denizens say she is haunted by her previous failure to save the Tree and the Knights, but, no. El made a vow a long time ago--when she still had her sisters.

name: Welza
story:
Welza

Welza had never had to work, as her two sisters dealt with all threats to the World Tree. As a result, her wings failed to grow beautifully--and a small darkness began to grow in her heart. It was then that she met the injured Insect.

name: Welza, Mutant
story:
Welza the Mutant

Welza looked down upon the burning World Tree in the pouring rain. Beside her was the Insect King, wounded badly. His plan to seize the World Tree had been thwarted by her sisters. Holding the King in her arms, she flew off into the darkness.

name: Rei
story:
Rei

Warning: Access and release prohibited.

Dossier Designated for Classification: No. 0007

Title: She Who Controls All Disasters

name: Rei, God of Nothing
story:
Rei the God of Nothing

Darkness enveloped the world, bringing the era to an end--but not the real end. Her pawns had simply brought about the evil needed to start the world anew. Rei continued down her path towards the ultimate end, dragging along four broken Dolls.

name: Fire Fairy
story:
Fire Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nWhen the Queen captured the Four Knights, I thought it was all over for the World Tree. But even at that darkest moment, my heart was telling me that something wasn't quite right.

name: Mish, Fire Fairy
story:
Mish 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nThe Insects preyed on us fairies. So, why hadn't their Queen given over the Four Knights to their King yet? In fact, as far as I can see, not one fairy living in the World Tree has been killed or eaten.

name: Water Fairy
story:
Water Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nAll of a sudden, we saw something flying towards us--and they quickly grew in number until they had covered the skies and blocked out the sun. As our world fell into darkness, we saw their hideous King and Queen.

name: Clover, Water Fairy
story:
Clover 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nAll I could do was shake in the face of this huge army of Insects. They were spinning my friends into cocoons. I watched helplessly as their Queen came for me--but she was thwarted by Sir Fran, one of the Four Knights.

name: Light Fairy
story:
Light Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nThe Fairies were in a panic. Insects and their Queen were invading the World Tree--and now they had learned that Sir Fran had been captured. Sir Riella and the rest of us in her battalion quickly prepared for battle.

name: Rose, Light Fairy
story:
Rose 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nOur plan was to have one unit distract the Insects and their Queen while the elite unit went after the King. But, it was quickly dashed. Right in front of our eyes, Sir Riella was spun into a cocoon by the Queen herself.

name: Dark Fairy
story:
Dark Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nDark forest. Cocoon. Capture. Many. Flee. Fail. Insects. Queen. Thread. Mouth. Eyes. Arms. Legs. Breath. Dark. Dark. Dark. Voice. Voice. Giusse. Help.

name: Fal, Dark Fairy
story:
Fal 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nCocoon. Gap. Peek. Hear. Talking. Giusse. Queen. Reach out. Hand. Parry. Hand. Giusse. Screams. Giusse. Angry. Queen. Traps. Giusse. End. Giusse. Cocoon.

name: Neutral Fairy
story:
Neutral Fairy

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nWhen Insects and their King invaded the World Tree, I was beside where Lady Aurelia and Lady El lay, waiting for "her" to arrive to fulfill her destiny. The cocoon she spun me into was cold, but strangely comforting.

name: Tinver
story:
Tinver 

[FF1493]Memories of a Fairy[-]\nInside the cocoon, I had a dream about the day Lady Aurelia fell into her sleep. As she closed her eyes, she told me how much she still loved her sister--but instead of regret, she showed only a gentle smile.

name: Queen Welza
story:
Queen Welza

Cocoons hung in the air from every level of the World Tree. The fairies who lived there and the Four Knights had been captured by the Insect Queen--they would now be safe from whatever was about to happen. Welza readied herself.

name: Queen Welza, Protector
story:
Queen Welza the Protector

Their likes and dislikes. Their passions and fears. Dreams. Aurelia. El. All this she had wanted to talk about, and it was now too late. But, each of the four had sprouted a pair of beautiful wings--and that was all that mattered to her.

name: Cypher, Dual Fangs
story:
Cypher the Dual Fangs

The two swords wielded by the blue-eyed knight--to do his will and protect his lord--will come to be wielded by another. The two pale-blue blades will one day become a single blue fang and slay the Dragon of Darkness.

name: Kiga
story:
Kiga

After 3 years at the A. Smith Trading Co., Kiga had yet to make any sort of mark as an apprentice navigator or errand boy. Yet, he went about his business as usual with a warm smile, only focused on the mission assigned to him.

name: Kiga, Undying Ice
story:
Kiga, Undying Ice

Thirty arrows flew at Kiga in the light of a full moon. He cut them down with his two blades and studied the girl who had come from the seas with contempt. The next moment, her limbs flew through the air--and a war had been prevented.

name: Neun
story:
Neun

Neun ignored the witch's orders as usual and went to the Capital. There was no purpose to her visits, but to simply live her all too brief life; doing otherwise would mean she had broken the chains that had once bound her for no reason.

name: Neun, Undying Evil
story:
Neun, Undying Evil

Neun finally found the girl on a rainy day that was also curiously bright and sunny. An evil grin spread across her face, and the girl returned an equally sinister smile. When the last raindrop hit the ground, "Three" and "Nine" both lay dead.

name: Lyonne
story:
Lyonne
Lyonne lost his arm for the 8th time hunting down the witch's enemies. He didn't mind the loss so much as the one enemy who got away, and the shadowy doctor who treated him--a certain yellow rabbit--knew better than to bring the subject up.

name: Lyonne, Undying Beast
story:
Lyonne, Undying Beast

Lyonne lost his 9th arm capturing the 3 enemies now in the Fool King's custody. Once, they had been gods. Now, they were selling out their allies. They told Lyonne where to find the Sky God--their leader. Lyonne prepared to lose his 10th arm.

name: Pavone
story:
Pavone

No place in the Empire was crueler than the East No. 3 Alliance District. No one who ended up there ever saw the light again. Yet, people still ran businesses there, as some things could only thrive in that pure darkness deep below the Empire.

name: Pavone, Undying Beauty
story:
Pavone, Undying Beauty

Pavone's bar specialized in contraband alcohol and  dancers so exquisite that even the Empire's elite would come. Pavone used the cover they gave to trade information behind their backs--like to the blue-haired woman she was meeting tonight.

name: Squill
story:
Squill

No one in the unit has a name, as names only give identity. No one in the unit has renown, as no one in the unit seeks it. No one in the unit dies, as no one in the unit is alive to begin with. As far as anybody knows, the unit does not exist.

name: Squill, Undying Crown
story:
Squill, Undying Crown

Squill tracked humidity, temperature, density, and numbers so the storeroom, a large chamber below the Capital, was in perfect condition. Yet the witch did not entrust him with the key to the Door, so he did not know about the bodies that lay inside.

name: Elpis
story:
Elpis

The witch lived in a tiny castle deep inside the forest. None who ever met her came back the same; so for 100 years, the doors had remained shut. But they had now opened to let in Lucius the Good, and the Queen he carried in his arms.

name: Elpis, Undying Soul
story:
Elpis, Undying Soul

A long spiral staircase descended into an abyss below the Capital. There, halfway down, the witch talked to a creature who did not respond--for it had been asleep for 17 years, imprisoned here after almost devouring the world.

name: Rhinoss
story:
Rhinoss

Unable to infiltrate target destination. Over.

name: Rhinoss, Undying Curse
story:
Rhinoss, Undying Curse

Infiltrated destination. Confirmed the following: an old dragon who was once human; a cursed one drenched in the blood of death; an immortal sword master who detests blood; two werewolf sisters; and a baby dragon with no name. Over.

name: Soul Spirit
story:
[FF1493]Symbol of Friendship[-]

A very special Spirit given to you by a very special friend. Cannot compare to other Spirits.

name: Jett the Fisherman
story:
Jett the Fisherman

This is Jett, after his childhood dream has come true.\n\nYou could say it's Jett in his one true form.

name: Amber the Explorer
story:
Amber the Explorer

This is Amber, after her
childhood dream has come
true.

You could say it's Amber in her one true form.

name: Shogun the Fireball
story:
Shogun the Fireball

No dreams or anything here.

Just Shogun, burned by the failings of his colleagues once again.

You could say it's Shogun  in his one true form.

name: Nash the Dog
story:
Nash the Dog

Nash opens his eyes to find his head in the lap of a girl singing a song that suggests a future as bright as the sun shining down on him. She touches his cheek and, in his naivety, he promises a joyous future for the two of them.

name: Nash the Lone Wolf
story:
Nash the Lone Wolf

Snow melts on her cheek from the last traces of warmth left. Her lips are shut, never to part into song again. The happiness Nash has hoped for has crumbled into dust. No meaning lies ahead for him. And so, he sets off on a path for revenge.

name: Silva of Unit 6
story:
Silva of Unit 6

Odd-jobbers were the most respected people in the underworld. Of the 700 in town, the top ones became legends, admired by all other odd-jobbers. Silva was one such admirer, a counterfeiter who would one day reach the top by ousting the Red Handyman.

name: Redd of Unit 6
story:
Redd of Unit 6

Reddo was a transporter, one who carried goods for the underworld. He was always late as a matter of caution, but this time the strategy backfired. As he lay on the ground, pummeled by assailants, the Hatter silently arrived on the scene.

name: Blueton of Unit 6
story:
Blueton of Unit 6

Blueton refused to tie himself to any of the many occupations offered in the underworld. He cherished his freedom, so his only interest was in crushing anyone who dared threaten it--like this newcomer who called himself the Hatter.

name: Yellen of Unit 6
story:
Yellen of Unit 6

Yellen sold flowers--but mostly the Memorica. One whiff of its aroma could wipe out anyone's memory, but only the bad parts. Underworld bosses often hired her for memory wipe jobs--which was how she came to visit the Hatter one day, bouquet in hand.

name: Purpa of Unit 6
story:
Purpa of Unit 6

Purpa was always alone, ever since her father vanished and her mother abandoned her as a baby. She grew up soaked in the poison that permeated this town to become a Scrapper. One day, she was hired to "scrap" the Hatter.

name: Rabby the Conductor
story:
Rabby the Conductor

[FF1493]Aaron is nervous. Carrol is unfazed as usual. And Anastasia is ready to shine. Rabby raises his hand, and the Crimson Quartet begins to play the opening song of the Kingdom's first Founding Day Festival. It is an age of remarkable peace.[-]

name: Angelica, Savior Queen
story:
Angelica, Savior Queen

[FF1493]Bells ring throughout the Capital on a warm, sunny day. In front of a large crowd, the Knight King, the hero who rid the land of the First Dragon, kneels before Angelica. Then he speaks the words that fulfill his vow of eternity from long ago.[-]

name: Edgar the Babysitter
story:
Edgar the Babysitter

[FF1493]As usual, Edgar was at a loss. His fierce face had caused the children to cry, but putting on the mask designed to make them laugh made them cry even harder. Still, he tried to get his twins to laugh, Walpurgis watching with a warm smile.[-]

name: Ayame, Family Woman
story:
Ayame, Family Woman

[FF1493]Ayame follows the path from her house until she is at the fields, where the man once known as Zero plants rice, tending the land he saved. She waves, and he waves back. Together they eat the rice balls she has made, enjoying the peace.[-]

name: Joel XXXX
story: Joel XXXX

name: Earth Spirit: Fire
story:
Earth Spirit: Fire

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]\nThis is material used to help the Spirit Tree grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise the tree's level.

story:
Earth Spirit: Water

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]\nThis is material used to help the Spirit Tree grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise the tree's level.

story:

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]\nThis is material used to help the Spirit Tree grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise the tree's level.

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]\nThis is material used to help the Spirit Tree grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise the tree's level.

story:
Earth Spirit: Neutral

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]\nThis is material used to help the Spirit Tree grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise the tree's level.

story:
Air Spirit: Fire

[FF1493]Spirit Tree Material[-]\nThis is material used to help the Spirit Tree grow. Used in Spirit Tree mode to raise the tree's level.
